• Dairy. Parve Restaurant.
• This place is a Sushi Shop and does offer four non-Japanese dishes: Pizza, Solyanka soup, Caeser salad and Uzbekistani dumplings.
• Many of its sushi items are named after Israeli places, including cities with many Russian-speaking immigrants, including Ashdod, Kiryat Yam, Netanya, Eilat, and Haifa.
• The restaurant does deliveries in the Moscow area.
• Kashrut is under the Kosher Russia label supervised by Russian Chief Rabbi Berel Lazar.

7775,Bali Yating Hotel,"

Nice hotel in Jinhua with 2 restaurants, bar/lounge.

column2: • Modern hotel with friendly staff.
• 5 minute walk from Chabad.
• Something you should keep in mind is that all rooms are for smokers. Our room wasn't bad, and opening the window helps.
• When we were there we found out they have rooms available that may not show online, so is good to double check with them directly.
• This hotel has 130 rooms with great internet.
• To book click here.

2701,Kosher cafe Alef,"

A Kosher cafe in Jewish Museum and Tolerance Center, Russia.

column2: • Kosher cafe Alef is situated in the lobby of the Jewish Museum and Tolerance Center; it is a cozy place, which will entertain you with its rich menu, comfortable atmosphere, quality and attentive service.

• Everybody will find something to eat in their menu: breakfast, numerous offers for dinners, light salads and appetisers, traditional forshmak and hummus, Kosher desserts and delicious full-flavoured coffee.
• You will be pleased with the variety of fish and vegetarian dishes as well as pastas, burgers, pizzas, home-made ice-cream and hand-made candies.
• Here you can have a nice dinner, hold a meeting or simply enjoy a cup of coffee.
• Their original branded products will remind you of your visit to the Museum – all the dishes from the menu can be ordered to takeaway in convenient eco-packages.
• Enjoy 10% discount on all the dishes from the menu with presentation of your ticket.

2710,Restaurant Shtetl,"

A meat restaurant in Marina Roscha Synagogue.

column2: • Restaurant Shtetl is under Pinchas restaurant complex - An original Kosher Jewish cuisine, where all dishes are cooked according to the rules of the Halacha, only from the best and freshest products.
<li>The menu of the ""Pinhas"" complex includes both traditional Jewish dishes and the most popular dishes of other countries. For the guests are profitable special offers:
• Shabbat sale.
• Friday themed meals.
• Business lunches at a price of 250 rubles.
• Breakfast buffet with a wide selection of drinks, hot, cold dishes and snacks.
• You can order food to go home or to the office.
<li>You should try their:
• Steaming steaks from fish and meat.
• Shish kebabs with juicy mutton pulp.
• Lulia-kebab, khinkali or other dishes.
• Before the meal you will be offered to refresh yourself with real birch juice.

A dairy restaurant in Marina Roscha Synagogue.

column2: • Restaurant Alef is under Pinchas restaurant complex - An original Kosher Jewish cuisine, where all dishes are cooked according to the rules of the Halacha, only from the best and freshest products.
<li>The menu of the ""Pinhas"" complex includes both traditional Jewish dishes and the most popular dishes of other countries. For the guests are profitable special offers:
• Shabbat sale.
• Friday themed meals.
• Business lunches at a price of 250 rubles.
• Breakfast buffet with a wide selection of drinks, hot, cold dishes and snacks.
• You can order food to go home or to the office.
• This restaurant is well known in Moscow. It is decorated in a classic Italian style, and the menu includes popular dishes from different countries.
<li>In the restaurant you will be offered:
• Classic milsheyski with different tastes.
• Hot dumplings and laced crêpes with fillings.
• Delicious sushi rolls.
• Fresh salads and sandwiches for a quick bite.
• Melting pasta and pizza.

976,RUBY Food & Cafe,"

Modern Kosher food and cafe in Tallinn, Estonia.

column2: • Ruby Food and Cafe has opened in Tallinn, Estonia in Rotterman City, not far outside of Tallinn’s famous old city.
• This is currently the city’s second Kosher eatery after the fancy restaurant Jeruusalemm, which is about  a 10-minute walk away.
• Menu items for the cafe include banana pancakes with fruit, salads, smoothie bowls, and roast beef sandwiches.
• Ruby’s grocery is also stocked with plenty of to-go items, like hummus, bissli, and more. Most of the Kosher items are imported from France & Israel.

7681,Bobe's Kitchen,"

Brand new, first restaurant in Peru.

column2: • First Kosher restaurant in Lima, Peru.
• It is also a dairy/pareve pastry shop, kosher market, kosher gelato shop, and kosher chocolatier.
• Catering services available.
• Varied menu with Jewish cuisine from around the world.
• Bobe’s Kitchen is kosher certified by Union Israelita del Peru (Rabbi Salomon Cohen).

997,Soultani Pizza Kosher y Café,"

A Kosher pizza and pasta restaurant in Buenos Aires.

column2: • According to Solutani, they have the best pizza and empanadas in the world.
• For dessert, we recommend the ""Panqueque de dulce de leche"", it's delicious.
<li>

column1: Don't miss the ravioles (you can ask half green and half ricota!).

column2: • Family friendly.
• This is a very well known pizzeria in Buenos Aires, one of the first ones, as they opened over 10 years ago.
• They recently moved across the street, but they keep the same menu that is a tradition for many families and tourist to eat here at every visit.
• The pizza is very good and the boios are a must have.
• The new store decoration is very nice.
• Keep in mind that their service is not as fast as it should.
• Fair and reasonable prices.

column1: ",A Kosher pizza and pasta restaurant in Buenos Aires.,"KWB’s Highlights:
According to Solutani, they have the best pizza and empanadas in the world.
For dessert, we recommend the “Panqueque de dulce de leche”, it’s delicious.
Don’t miss the ravioles (you can ask half green and half ricota!).
This is a very well known pizzeria in Buenos Aires, one of the first ones, as they opened over 10 years ago.
They recently moved across the street, but they keep the same menu that is a tradition for many families and tourist to eat here at every visit.
The pizza is very good and the boios are a must have.
The new store decoration is very nice.
Keep in mind that their service is not as fast as it should.

9312,Wafflemania,"

Casual bakery with delicious options. Great waffles.

column2: • Dairy and pareve. Cholov Yisrael.
• Casual bakery where you can enjoy salads, different types of bread, delicious desserts, and their speciality: waffles.
• Great place to stop by for a quick snack.
• Seating available inside.

1027,Al Galope,"

Long-standing Kosher grill, favourite in the historic Jewish neighbourhood of Once.

column2: <li>
<li>

column1: Best BBQ in Buenos Aires, they also offer sephardic food as hummus, kebbe, etc.

column2: <li>

column1: It is located in Once neighbourhood.

column2: <li>

column1: Excellent food but they need to improve their customer service.

column2: <li>

column1: Try to avoid Sundays or go early with patience, it gets very crowded.

column2: • Jewish families from around Buenos Aires flock to Al Galope for its juicy steaks, casual atmosphere and variety of Middle Eastern dishes, like pitas with hummus and baklava.
• Excellent choice for those with dietary restriction who don't want to miss out on the Argentine steak experience.
• You can even wash down your steak with a glass of Kosher Argentinian wine chosen from Al Galope's extensive list.

25453,La Empanadería Kosher,"

Kosher Restaurant

column2: • The Kosher Empanadería offers delicious empanadas, cakes and pizzas.
• This place offers food at home for the convenience of its customers.
• They offer prices suitable for you and your family.

column1: Meat or parve empanadas are some of their specialities.
They have meals ready for you in 7 minutes.
Dont offer delivery but they give you other options if requested.

Casual place with a small area where you can eat-in.",,"https://scontent.fsal3-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/75199838_710550626098032_195392759673126912_n.jpg?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=a26aad&_nc_ohc=h6wHWMNSzkUAX_2vpqB&_nc_ht=scontent.fsal3-1.fna&oh=c350e96b95042bfcd049dcce0d856211&oe=61B28D58

1016,Luba Cafe Store,"

Café which serves dairy / vegetarian gourmet menu in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

column2: • It is located on a fancy area. Unlike most Kosher restaurants in Buenos Aires, Luba is located in a beautiful neighbourhood, you should make time to walk around.
• The decoration is very nice. The plates are very well decorated too.
• If you are looking to go to a nice restaurant this is the one. The food is very good and they often vary the menu.
• Call before you go to reserve a table, otherwise they might be fully booked.
• The prices are high.

999,Kosher McDonald's,"

The only Glatt Kosher McDonald's in the world, located in Abasto, Argentina.

column2: • It is located on the 2nd floor of the Abasto shopping mall, be careful and make sure it is the Kosher one, because you will find a non-Kosher one on the same floor.
• They have the same menu as the regular stores, with no cheese of course, but same packaging, taste and presentation. Each menu is around $10.
• You can't miss it! McDonald’s in the Jewish neighbourhood, which was also the residence of famed tango singer Carlos Gardel.

• This is a perfect place to grab a bite whilst still adjusting to Argentine dinner time (restaurants open usually after 8:30 pm.), or before catching a tango show at the former house of the most famous Argentine tango singer Carlos Gardel.

column1: ","The only Glatt Kosher McDonald’s in the world, located in Abasto, Argentina.","KWB’s Highlights:
It is located on the 2nd floor of the Abasto shopping mall, be careful and make sure it is the Kosher one, because you will find a non-Kosher one on the same floor.
They have the same menu as the regular stores, with no cheese of course, but same packaging, taste and presentation. Each menu is around $10.
You can’t miss it! McDonald’s in the Jewish neighbourhood, which was also the residence of famed tango singer Carlos Gardel.

This is a perfect place to grab a bite whilst still adjusting to Argentine dinner time (restaurants open usually after 8:30 pm.), or before catching a tango show at the former house of the most famous Argentine tango singer Carlos Gardel.",,"https://live.staticflickr.com/3164/2350289939_1a87d91d50_b.jpg

1023,Sprinkles Sweets Kosher,"

A Kosher pâtisserie & coffee shop In Buenos Aires.

column2: • Our favourite place in Buenos Aires to go with a friend, eat a great breakfast  or ""merienda"" and chat.
• If you like sweets we recommend the cakes, you will always find one you like! They also make very good cheese cake with different variations.
• The prices are very good, specially if you order ""the breakfast special"", because it is a large portion.
• The store is small, but still comfortable, and the customer service is very good.

Successful bakery and restaurant with catering services available.

column2: • Bakery and restaurant with several branches in Argentina.
• Varied menu of baked goods and milk. Parve.
• Catering services, eat-in or takeaway available.
• They offer pizzas, sandwiches, salads, and more.
• High quality products.
• They recently opened another branch in Once neighbourhood: Tucumán 2892.
• Seating available inside.
• You can visit them on site or through their online store (only in Spanish).

column2: • This is one of the BEST bakeries in the world. KWB's staff LOVES THIS PLACE.
• Ask for Alfajor de dulce de leche, and Alfajor de maisena.
• Come with time and try EVERYTHING.
• High quality bakery with friendly staff.
• Cozy place where you can enjoy coffee with fresh baked goods.
• we recommend going early in the morning so you can have their freshest baked goods.

column2: • TWO WORDS: ""KOSHER CHURROS!""
• Didn't we say ""Kosher Churros""??? What are you waiting for.
• You may have to order them ahead of time, but... authentic, fresh, Churros.
• Malena has great cakes and delicious selection of bakery, but... we said Churros right?
• One of the first Kosher bakery in Argentina.
• They have a varied menu of local baked goods and also delicious Israeli style bread.
• Affordable prices and friendly staff.

10660,Bocasher,"

Considered the first Kosher fast food stand in a soccer stadium in Latin America.

column2: • Recently opened Kosher fast food stand – in a soccer stadium.
• The stand is located in the Boca Juniors’ “Bombonera” stadium, a city landmark.
• The innovative Kosher spot will have the words “Boca” and “Kosher” in its name: “Bocasher.” In Spanish the sound also mixes the two words because Kosher is pronounced “Casher” with an “a.”

• The stand will serve burgers, hot dogs and “choripan,” an iconic local sandwich made up of a grilled sausage called chorizo and the bread, which in Spanish is pan, at the same price of the non-Kosher food at the stadium.

column1: https://youtu.be/PrKkMrgulMg",Considered the first Kosher fast food stand in a soccer stadium in Latin America.,"KWB’s Highlights:
Recently opened Kosher fast food stand – in a soccer stadium.
The stand is located in the Boca Juniors’ “Bombonera” stadium, a city landmark.
The innovative Kosher spot will have the words “Boca” and “Kosher” in its name: “Bocasher.” In Spanish the sound also mixes the two words because Kosher is pronounced “Casher” with an “a.”

9348,Tatekosher,"

Convenience store with a wide variety of kosher options.

column2: • Convenience store in Palermo neighbourhood, next to Beit Jabad in Agüero.
• Large variety of imported and exported kosher products.
• Deliveries available.
• You can find pretty much any kosher food, from cookies to cheese.
• Sandwiches and dairy are available to eat-in or takeaway.
• Kosher sushi bar with modern decor and friendly staff.
• Catering and delivery services available.
• They also have locations at Aranguren 2887 in Floresta, and Moldes 2287 in Belgrano.
• Menu and more information, only in Spanish. Click here.

Busy bakery and restaurant. Pleasant atmosphere. Good reviews.

• Offers services such as catering, delivery, and takeouts.
• Good choice for groups or family with kids.
• Seating available outside, with an excellent environment.
• Based on reviews this is a popular choice for visitors.

• Great place for anyone, from kids to seniors.

6072,Avrons Place,"

Restaurant located in Sea Point, at the heart of the Jewish area of Cape Town.

column2: • The longest running kosher meat restaurant in South Africa, Avron’s Place on Sea Point’s Regent Road is a very popular choice amongst Cape Town’s Orthodox Jewish community.

• The humbly adorned, family-friendly eatery, which is supervised by the Beth Din, serves a wide variety of dishes, including beef ribs, burgers, mixed grills, boerewors, Cape lamb curry, vegetarian platters, pastas and sushi.

• Though prices are generally rather reasonable (particularly by kosher food standards), Avron’s drops costs further on Tuesdays with a special on its beef burger and chips (R49 instead of the usual R59).
• The restaurant also does takeaways and catering for functions and will gladly pack Shabbat meals for visitors to Cape Town.

column1:

Deli and bakery with two locations established in 1968.

column2: • Meat (Mehadrin Commission and Beth Din Mehadrin on request), Chalav Yisrael Milchik & Parev.
• Offering online next day deliveries, frozen meals, and takeouts. Hotel deliveries are available.

• There is a Spar Supermarket located at Sandringham in Johannesburg where its Bakery has been certified.
• Delis, bread, Sushi and other local foods are sold to eat in or takeaway.

Afro-Portuguese chain restaurant serving flame-grilled chicken in spicy chilli sauce.

• Fairmont is a nice neighbourhood of Johannesburg.
• Hotel deliveries are available.

4235,Levy's Of Hollywood,"

This family-owned, kosher eatery serves up traditional shawarma & kebabs in a low-key atmosphere.

column2: • For over 20 years, Levys kosher of hollywood has been synonymous with Middle Eastern fine dining.
• Liz Levy executive chef/owner takes the cuisine and culture of her homeland to the next level with a breathtaking restaurant and delicious cuisine.
• The Chef's mastery of traditional spices and flavors makes each dish an opportunity to experience classics and delicacies in new and exciting ways.
• Every plate becomes a culinary journey. Levys kosher of Hollywood also features homemade desserts to sophisticated tastes.
• For more information click here.

1067,List of Closed Waterways Kosher Restaurants,"KWB's Highlights:

column2: • Acqua Trattoria (closed)
• China Bistro (closed)
• There a China Bistro location open in Hollywood
• B&B Bistro (closed)
• Fuego moved to a new and much better location, 10 minutes south (moved)
• Karne, a steak house in the same store where Fuego used to be (open)
• Levy's Shawarma. This is their second location in the city (open)
• Noma (Dairy) is now in Waterways (open)
• The Ice Cream shop seems to have closed, but it's unclear. We've heard reports that both the Ice Cream and the coffee shops are now being run by the landlord.
• Florida’s wide array of delectable cuisine speaks to the sophisticated palates of food-savvy residents and visitors alike.
• Rustiko, although quite new, has gained a reputation for its exquisite flavors, aromas and ambiance that makes for an unforgettable experience.
• With presentation, texture and taste in mind, not a sense is left out of the experience when dining at Rustiko.
• The elegant tiled floors, vines hanging along the walls, and wood grain finishes enhance the feeling as though you’ve hopped on a plane to Italy.
• For more information click here.

column1:
4327,Carlos & Gabby's - Miami,"

Mexican eats plus a few American dishes, in simple, colorful digs.

column2: • Carlos & Gabby’s Smokehouse & Grill proudly continues in the tradition of its namesake to provide the all around best in kosher Mexican dining.

• Located in beautiful Miami Beach, another Carlos & Gabby’s has taken over!  Being close to the Miami Airport and beaches, it has been attracting and satisfying many hungry customers since November of 2015.
• With its comfortable booths, Mexican- American cuisine, and large and reasonably priced menu, this place is a perfect fit for all.
• Owners Aaron and Rachel visited the Carlos & Gabby’s of New York and fell in love with the idea of a Mexican themed restaurant. They then headed home and bought into the successful franchise.
• Different than the other Carlos & Gabby’s, this is a sit-down restaurant with waiter service. They have a large enough menu, where everybody could find something that they like.
• Other locations: Carlos & Gabby's - Riverdale, Carlos & Gabby's - Queens, Carlos & Gabby's Long Island and Carlos & Gabby's - Coney Island.

Contemporary space with cool lighting offers kosher Chinese & southeast Asian food, sushi & steaks.

column2: • If you're keeping kosher in South Florida, you don't have to settle for a falafel joint the next time you're looking for a place to eat.

• L'Chaim Asian Cuisine & Steakhouse is certified by the Orthodox Rabbinic Board with chefs who hand-pick the freshest local meats and vegetables and use a selection of imported spices, seasonings, and authentic ingredients to ensure a great kosher dining experience.
• The menu is dine-in or takeaway and offers a wide spectrum of cuisine from sushi to steak designed to satisfy a variety of dietary concerns and dining preferences.
• For more information click here.
• This place is pemanently closed.

column1:
4359,Bagel Time Cafe,"

Easygoing sandwich shop selling hearty deli fare including some kosher selections.

column2: • Fully renovated in the Summer of 2014, Bagel Time Café is a modern dairy restaurant in Miami Beach under new ownership.
• Those who know the area will remember the original Bagel Time for their basic breakfast and lunch options. Bagel Time Café however is a whole new and upgraded establishment.

• It’s been taken over by restaurant pros, Jay and Sharon Beck, who have years of restaurant management and culinary skill under their belts. They’ve turned the place into a must-visit destination. Walking into the café, it feels more like South Beach, than Miami Beach.
• The bright green décor is clean, modern and inviting. Although with free delivery anywhere in Miami you won’t even need to leave the beach to get a taste!

• Chef Jay Beck has plenty of experience in the restaurant business. He was the executive chef at the gourmet supermarket, Pomegranate in Brooklyn, as well as the chef and owner of Country Café in upstate New York.
• Bagel Time Café focuses on getting the freshest ingredients for their vegetarian, dairy based menu.
• For more information click here.

4372,26: Sushi & Tapas,"

Large menu of kosher Japanese & Peruvian dishes served in a modern, minimalist setting.

column2: • ""Twenty Six"" is out to prove that Kosher dining is cool. Promising a Kosher Culinary Experience, 26 starts with an elegant design by renowned architect Tom Telesco.
• This family-friendly restaurant includes a main dining room, sushi bar, cocktail bar, patio dining and a private event room.
• 26 embraces the multi-cultural flavour of Miami, adding unique Kosher tapas creations to the menu. The sushi and tapas  feature island spices and tropical garnishes.
• Complementing the incredible sushi and tapas cuisine will be multiple delicious choices of entrees, utilizing a wide variety of fishes seasoned uniquely.
• For more information click here.

4285,Grand Cafe Espresso Bar,"

Coffee & espresso drinks plus Israeli breakfast & lunch fare in a casual space with outdoor seating.

column2: • Conveniently located on Stirling Road, minutes from I-95, Grand Café Sandwich Espresso Bar, a European-style Hollywood cafe offers a delightful menu, with coffee and blended drinks, friendly service, both indoor and outdoor seating, and a ""warm"" South Florida culinary experience.
• Founded in January 2012, the café owners and life-long friends Shay Yaakov and Meir Zafri created menu items that were based on nostalgic childhood food memories and recipes.

• After restaurant stints in Israel, Los Angeles and Texas, Shay and Meir moved to Miami and was instantly drawn to their current location. But most importantly, the address was the same as Shay’s birthday, 29-05.

• Whether it was a stroke of luck or a sign, the Grand Café Sandwich and Espresso Bar is a foodie destination, with a discernable family-style atmosphere of regular, loyal customers and a consistently delicious menu.
• For more information click here.

4289,Foozo Artisan Pizza,"

Kosher wood fired artisan pizza restaurant in Miami.

column2: • Dairy. Cholov Yisroel. Pas Yisroel. Yoshon pizza only. Bishul Yisroel Tuna.
• Foozo is true to the Italian tradition with an urban American twist. They bring us delicious wood-fired artisanal pizza along with other cheesy creations.
• Known for always being fast and friendly, Foozo is a great place to pick up a tasty quick meal. The great thin crust pizza with an amazing combination of toppings has people coming back for more.
• Try their margarita pizza, a Foozo sandwich, or build your own salad at their salad bar. Everything is super fresh and all menu staples come with tons of topping options!

• Choose from pizzas, fresh tossed salads, our very own “foozolis”, open top sandwiches and pasta. Their goal is to make something special to satisfy your heart's content. They serve delicious gluten-free pasta as well to satisfy a wide range of customers.
• Thanks to their app and delivery service you didn't have to leave the beach to enjoy Foozo’s creations!
• Located at Ojus, 18 miles north of downtown Miami.
• Eat-in, takeaways, and delivery.
• Plenty of good reviews.
• For more information about the menu, click here.
• Extra information click here.

4242,Lenny's Pizza (Miami Beach),"

Premier kosher pizza and dairy destination.

column2: • Walking down Arthur Godfrey Road, it's hard not to notice the unmistakable scent and look of authentic New York style pizza.

• The aroma itself seems to draw people through the doors.  Owner Jason Reiz has known the restaurant business ever since he can remember and has made it his life's long ambition to bring Floridians the perfect New York slice.

• ""Our philosophy is, to bring good quality wholesome kosher food to the masses"" says Jason. Opening its doors back in May of 2013, Lenny's has established quite a sizable following. It was also featured in Miami New Times as one of Five Top Kosher Restaurants in Miami, and being the only dairy one among them, it is effectively the best for kosher pizza in the area.
• For more information click here.

1071,Fuego by Mana,"

Stylish eatery in lofty surrounds, serving Kosher steaks, plus craft cocktails.

column2: • Considered Miami's best Kosher BBQ steakhouse and smokehouse.
• From BBQ steak to house aged, cured and smoked meat selections, from good old burgers stacked with crispy 6-hour house smoked pastrami, to some latin flavoured pulled beef empanadas.
• Good luck finding a table during the winter.
• We recommend their Empanadas and all their smoked menu.

column1:
1050,The Harbour Grill,"

Sunny destination near Bal Harbour shops.

column2: • Harbour Grill Gourmet is one of the premiere Kosher restaurants in South Florida.
• It is known for using the finest ingredients as well as the best quality Kosher meats with their signature dry aging process.

• The Harbour Grill is the first to serve house-made Glatt Kosher charcuterie and high-end gourmet dishes. These high-end meats are extremely rare on the Kosher food market and they decided to make it available for you to enjoy in the comfort of your own house.
• They have recently opened their sister restaurant, Harbour Bistro, just a couple doors down.
• If you are looking for creative gastronomical dishes and in-house made charcuterie, in a relaxed atmosphere, 9427 Harding Ave. is unquestionably an address to recommend.

4308,China Kikar Tel Aviv,"

Kosher Chinese & European fare, plus Shabbat meals, in a condo-complex eatery with ocean views.

column2: • For over two decades, China Kikar Tel Aviv, has been a mainstay for Miami Beach locals and visitors alike.
• They are the longest standing Chinese kosher restaurant in town, while serving a wide variety of American dishes as well.
• Chinese-born owner, Bonnie Poon, has been in the restaurant business his whole life and amazingly spent 15 years living in Israel owning a Chinese restaurant there.
• In fact, he named the Miami Beach establishment after Kikar Dizenkof in the Israeli city of Tel Aviv.

column1:
18473,Ruthy's Place,"

Offering delicious dining and takeout to Miami, FL.

column2: • Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!
• Have you been here before? Share your tips with us!
• Are you the owner? Claim your listing!

• Café Emunah is the only kosher restaurant in Fort Lauderdale and is mere steps from the Beach! It prides itself on offering an experience for your senses and an oasis for your mind, body and soul - a physical journey into your spiritual self.
• Upon entering, you feel enveloped by the warm and serene environment. The decor is upscale but sparse and features glass tables and blue fabric on the couches.

• Materials used in the restaurant are consistent with the eco-conscious elements of mysticism: napkins from recycled paper and pale blonde wood chairs that are ergonomic and simple in design, yet comfortable.
• The restaurant is also a tea bar and lounge with comfortable couches and a small library of books about Jewish mysticism.
• Its geographically central location makes it an ideal meeting spot for people in Miami to meet up with friends from Boca and the surrounding areas in between, such as Hollywood and Delray.

• It also makes for a convenient meal on the way to and from the airport, as it is only a 15-minute drive from the Ft. Lauderdale Airport. Café Emunah is the perfect ending to a day on the beach or a yummy preface to a romantic evening stroll.
• For more information click here.

20005,Brickell Kosher Deli,"

Located at the Rok Family Shul.

column2: <li><strong>Open: Monday - Thursday 10:30am - 3:00pm
• Brickell Kosher Deli specializes in catering and delivery.
• Eat-in options are available.
• Not open for dinner.
• Shabbat take-out menu.
• Shabbat eat-in meals available.
• Check out their Brickell Eruv Map.
• If you are single, check out their YJP.
• Delivery of fresh chicken and meat to Downtown and Brickell
• They have a very useful page with information for travelers.
• The Chabad Brickell has a Mikvah available for ladies.

4312,Chai Wok,"

Kosher establishment turning out a wide selection of Chinese dishes & sushi in a casual atmosphere.

column2: • Located a few blocks off Biscayne Blvd. and in the heart of North Miami Beach, you will find Chai Wok; a casual, yet sophisticated restaurant specialising in Authentic Chinese and American fare.
• The owner Donny Gordon, is a home-grown Florida native, which allows him to have that comfortable and natural feeling with his customers.

• In fact, he doesn't even like to use that word  - ""customers"" but rather family, since he has known many of them his whole life. And many of those years, incidentally, have been in the food business  - 18 years to be exact.
• Donny owned a very popular pizza store but decided to devote his full time in elevating Chai Wok to the restaurant he can be proud of.

• When he opened the restaurant in November of 2010, he decided to follow three basic but very important principles: Good service, consistency of food and cleanliness.  And the fact that you can find him in the restaurant at all times, does not go unnoticed by his ""family"" of diners.
• For more information click here.

1495,Koshering for all occassions,"

Kosher services with vast experience.

column2: • Need a Kosher kitchen anywhere in the world?

• 5 years in the kashering and hashgacha world and taking courses for hashgacha, working with the best in the field and trusted by the most demanding clientele in the frum world, gives them the confidence to take upon themselves the responsibility of kashering and supervising in any kind of environment.
• If it's possible, they will kasher it, will never compromise or lower their standards!
• Available to travel anywhere in the world and work in the most exclusive hotels and kitchens.
<li>Brands they have worked with:

• Ritz-Carlton, Westin, St. Regis, Four Seasons, Royal Caribbean, Getaway Canyons Resort, Atlantis Resorts, The kitchen of Chef Elias Sapiens, Heladeria Aldo's (Mexico), Chabad Houses in the Caribbean, private mansions, and more...
• Handmade with natural fruits & best premium ingredients!

4253,Kosh Miami,"

Steakhouse favourites, Asian dishes, and signature tapas.

column2: • South Florida now boasts a fine meat restaurant with a French flare since Kosh opened its doors in February 2013 to the delight of vacationers and local residents.
• The restaurant is led by owner Jean-Marc Benitah who many may know from his days as the owner of Juliette in Paris. Wanting to create that magic again, he moved to Florida to open Kosh.
• The location is just 2 blocks away from the beautiful Surfside beach, and steps away from many apartments, condos and hotels, making it a great destination for that leisurely yet upscale dinner.
• It’s also only a short walking distance from the famous Bal Harbour Shul and Young Israel of Bal Harbour, which comes in handy if you want to organise a private event for one of the Shabbat meals.

• The decor of Kosh is elegant contemporary with elements of art nouveau style: modern hanging lighting fixtures live in perfect harmony with more traditional chandeliers, as do mirrors and stylish photographs on the walls.

• Dark purple and grey color scheme with velvet chairs, soft purple light, and flowers on the tables adds to the atmosphere of regal luxury. Alternatively, you can sit at one of their outdoor tables to dine in that evening breeze.
• For more information click here.

1054,Grill House,"

Restaurant offering Middle Eastern, American & Asian fare, in the heart of Miami Beach’s thriving Jewish community.

column2: • A Mediterranean-style restaurant; the first Kosher restaurant when entering Miami Beach from the airport, which is quite important, especially when you are hungry and you have just flown in.
• The restaurant features a modern beige décor including; high ceilings, dark wooden tables and chairs, as well as private booths.
• Calming background music adds to the overall ambience. They also have a beautiful outdoor patio, the largest of any restaurant in Miami, and perfect for all year round.

4280,Grill Time Restaurant,"

A wide-ranging menu & spacious, contemporary location, draw diners to this glatt kosher steakhouse.

column2: • Decorated in a gold cream color scheme, Grill Time is set in a modern atmosphere with a touch of French Italian ambiance.
• Grill Time has a strong local following, and also attracts many out-of-town visitors who take advantage of the warm weather and hot location.

• After years in the restaurant business and working with a number of different cuisines, owners Eran Yousafan and Neil Karni decided that it would be exciting to fuse a number of dishes together to make something special.

• The restaurant is distinctive because it is so much more than meets the eye. You walk in thinking Middle Eastern food but you find a variety of international dishes that will engage both your eyes and your appetite.
• The owners believe that in order to make a restaurant a success, you must strive to set yourself apart from the crowd and be unique.
• For more information click here.

column2: • Fresko is the perfect place for anyone looking to taste a mix of flavours.

• Enjoy a casual family dinner with their varied wine menu.
• Fresko offers a combination of ingredients to delight the palate and provide a warm and lively family atmosphere for every occasion.

4231,Mozart Grill,"

A modern family restaurant with a mix of old-school American diner and Israeli influence.

column2: • From the Mediterranean Sea in Israel to the Atlantic Ocean in Miami, Mozart Grill Bistro Express presents a modern family restaurant with a mix of old-school American diner and Israeli influence.
• Owners Juke and Tal Yankovich are the founders of Israel’s most famous 30 year-old franchise, the Nafis-Ghalim Restaurant chain and have brought their famous recipes to Collins Avenue.

• Located in one of the largest shopping plazas in Sunny Isles and across from the beach, Mozart Grill invites you to sit back on their silver leather booths with red lacquer tables and enjoy an authentic barbecue made simply for you.
• Their stainless steel with red and black tones add a comfortable atmosphere for lunch and dinner.
• For more information click here.

4218,Subres Grill,"

A kosher place with a homey feeling.

column2: • Glatt Kosher - Pas Yisroel - under full supervision - with Mashgiach.
• To find true hotspots when traveling to South Florida, you have to eat where locals eat, and local folks know where to find the best Middle Eastern and Mediterranean cuisines.
• SubresGrill is a relatively new restaurant which opened in December 2012 and owned by a warm Israeli couple, Eli and Etty Weinberg.
• This small quaint place has become a favorite with locals and tourists alike, with five-star reviews from grateful customers on Yelp, and other websites to attest to it.
• The restaurant is located in the middle of a vibrant Jewish neighborhood in North Miami, a few blocks to the west from Biscayne Blvd.
• The decor is simple and contemporary, in black and white hues with an addition of some purple and stainless steel, and features bar seating in addition to tables.
• Diners who walk in once, keep returning for the delicious fresh food, great service, and friendly atmosphere.
• The owner Eli shares that the key to the restaurant’s success is their love for what they do, combined with exceptional quality ingredients, and his wife’s unique cooking talent.
• For more information click here.
• OK Supervision

column2: • Meat and Pareve.
• At Lewis' Kitchen, you can drop in for their eat-in menu, including hot dogs and burgers.
• Lewis’ Kitchen carries the highest standard of Orthodox Kosher certification which is called Glatt-kosher.

• They can cater to all Kosher meal requirements in your hotel/accommodation while you are visiting Australia. Wherever you are staying, they can provide your hotel with all your meals, including breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
• As you travel throughout Australia they can deliver your meals directly to you.
• All meals arrive freshly prepared and ready to be served, so you can be assured that all your meals will meet your Kosher requirements leaving you free to enjoy your holiday or business trip.
• Located 4 miles west of downtown Sydney.

column1: Bake My Day is a boutique bakery located in Caulfield North, Victoria.

All their cakes, cookies and desserts are made on the premises from high-quality ingredients and their mission is to supply truly personalised, individual and unique creations which look and taste great.
They offer a delicious assortment of kosher, vegan and allergy-friendly treats in addition to stunning celebration cakes and edible works of art.
Whether you are dropping in for a decadent brownie and cup of coffee or consulting on the centrepiece for your big day – you will always be warmly welcomed at Bake My Day.

• Whether you are celebrating a birthday, out for a family dinner, out with friends, out with your partner or in need of a tasty, healthy takeaway meal – they will guarantee the best degustation that will leave your stomach satisfied and your taste buds wanting more.
• For more information click here.

6270,Glicks Bakeries,"

Australia's largest manufacturer of bagels and challahs.

column2: • Glicks is an Australian owned family company which is renowned for manufacturing quality breads, cakes and fine foods for both the retail and wholesale market.

• Glicks was founded in the late 1960s by Mr Mendel Glick in a small retail shop on Kooyong Road, Caulfield. In its early days the shop offered a selection of cakes and biscuits until Mr Glick revived an old European recipe and method for boiled bagels. The product was an instant sensation and word quickly spread throughout the Jewish community. Local milk-bars and delis sought a piece of the action too. Many shop keepers recognised the bagel’s appeal particularly with the development of Sunday trading. The Glicks bagel began to replace other bread items in many homes and Melbourne eateries, making the exclusive Glicks boiled bagel a crowd pleaser since its inception.
• Branches:

13940,Kosher Co-op,"

Community grocery store and catering to the kosher needs.

column2: • This is a kosher cooperative that offers a range of products specialized in kosher food from around the world.
• Products from Israel, including frozen foods, both sweet and savory, pickles, nibbles, and instant soups.
• Kosher meat and chicken, shipped from their suppliers to ensure freshness.
• Kosher wine from Australia and Israel.
• A variety of kosher chocolates and lollies.
• They offer fleishik, parev and all kind of precooked kosher meals made on their premises, for you to enjoy as an alternative to a home cooked meal.
• Fresh Challah every Friday.
• Ready-made food, delivery to all parts of New Zealand.
• Shabbat meals available if notified in advance
• For reservations you can contact them by their phone number or email co-op@wjcc.nz
• You can find different products as Mezuzah parchments and coverings, Siddurim, Tallit, Shabbat table cloths, Shabbat candles and many other.
• Parking Lot available.

3998,Candy Buffet Company,"

Candy buffet kosher by request.

column2: • The company is not entirely kosher, but they do offer a Kosher Candy Buffet using reliable Australian kosher supervision.
• Definitely seems to be a high-end, serious company for events.
• Might not be a huge help for travellers.
• From their site:

column1: Looking for a candy buffet that will blow your guests away? At The Candy Buffet Company, their team of design specialists can provide you with a feast that will dazzle both the eyes and the taste buds.

The Candy Buffet Company is the original candy buffet supplier – hundreds of rivals owe their designs to the creative genius of our professional stylists.  They will create the awe factor at your wedding, birthday or corporate event apart.
Their story began with the idea that sweets, while delicious, could also look amazing! One small display has spiralled into a national lolly buffet business.
The team at The Candy Buffet Company are more than just coworkers. The owners are husband and wife, supported by a team of hard-working & enthusiastic individuals.
All of the staff love their jobs and that shows in the quality of their work<span class=""text_exposed_show"">.

Supermarket with Kosher products and Kosher certified bakery, Chalav Yisroel

column2: • Bakery - Pareve & dairy (Chalav Yisrael).
• Romeo’s is a supermarket and health food shop specialising in organic and alternative foods.
• It is dedicated to providing environmentally friendly products that help to care for our planet and our health.
• The team at Romeo’s Organics are always there to give advice on everything, from foods and nutrition to personal products, natural medicine, and even pet care.
• With a Naturopathic Clinic on site, it is a one-stop well-being shop , with a Kosher certified bakery.
• Located 12 miles north of downtown Sydney.

14124,Gourmet Kosher ​Catering & Productos Kosher,"

Kosher supermarket offering catering and delivery services.

column2: • Characterised by their excellent service and variety of Kosher products.
• You can order your Shabbat meal through their email.
• Special dishes every day, quality ingredients, homemade and healthy preparations. Free shipping to Madrid.
• They can send you their catalog by email where you can find a variety of products available in their supermarket.
• Weekly renewing their products in the supermarket.
• In their website you can order products to be delivered t your location.
• They have a section of frozen food (borrekas, pizza, chicken breasts, hamburgers, ice cream and more).
• This store also has a section with the best of their kosher meats.
• Currently they have more than 10 varieties of dairy products, all under the highest standards Kosher Jalav Israel. You can order here.
• They offer catering services for individuals, hotels, synagogues and companies. Make your order in a personalised way, they will consider your taste and your budget!

column1:
1338,Gostijo Kosher Restaurant,"

Athens' one and only Glatt Kosher restaurant.

column2: • The only Kosher restaurant in Athens.
• Tired of eating pita and falafel everywhere you go? In Gostijo you will try authentic Greek cuisine.
• Located at Chabad Athens.
• A short 13-minute walk from the Parthenon.
• KWB's staff really liked their meals there.
• Enjoy a delicious fusion of Mediterranean flavours created by Sephardic Jews since the 15th century.
• Experience a Glatt Kosher dining occasion that’s part of a culture, history and way of life.
• Gostijo provides Glatt Kosher dishes for everyone. The food is lovingly prepared with carefully chosen ingredients, following recipes that have been handed from generation to generation.
• Sample the rich flavours in cozy surroundings, or dine al fresco in their atmospheric courtyard during summer months.
• Their specialities include Sambousak and Bourekitas (small handmade pies), Haminados eggs, Sfoungato (fluffy omelets) and Keftes de Puerro (leek fritters).
• Gostijo is more than a restaurant. It’s a place to hear live Greek and Ladino music, learn about Sephardic culture, enjoy family events and buy Kosher products from Greece, Israel and Europe.
• We even offer catering services throughout Greece so people everywhere can savour the exquisite flavours of centuries of Sephardic cooking.

5541,CashKash Glatt Kosher Restaurant,"

Kosher restaurant, Butcher and Grocery Store... all in one place!

column2: • The best way to promote a place is by word of mouth and this information reached us coming from Barcelona, Spain. A fine restaurant, butcher and grocery store all together with Kosher certification.
• Their restaurant offers fresh meat and lamb Halak Bet Yosef. It can be for delivery, eat in or takeaway.
• Reservations should be arranged not for the table but for the meals. For more information contact them here.
•  They offer to serve quality products,  having a big variety on the menu, from the typical Jewish kitchen to the local one, adapted to the laws of Kashrus.
•  For information on food delivery click this link. Be aware that their page is in Spanish.
• Delivery service to your hotel is available.
• Enquiries at cashkash@telefonica.net.

Small, convenient and well located Kosher grocery store.

column2: • BenBen is a grocery store, butcher, and cafeteria in Barcelona, Spain with great customer reviews.

• Their butcher store looks clean, well organised, and includes the option to eat at their cafeteria, which makes it a great option when you're travelling. Click this link for more information.
• Conveniently located in downtown, close to major attractions, shopping area, and hotels nearby.

Online store where you can find a wide variety of Kosher products.

column2: • Offering different online services, such as catering, sale and distribution of Kosher products and Shabbat meals. Delivery to almost all of Spain.
• They have great care about the preparation and selection of their products, ensuring that most of these are artesanals.
• Their website has a dedicated menu to a great selections of Kosher wines.

<li>A full online supermarket where you can find products such as:

• Dairy products.

• Ice cream.
• Bakery and sweets.
• Snacks.
• Cookies.
• Candies.
• Sauces and spices.
• Matzot.
• Pasta and cereals.
• Drinks.
• You can contact them and make your order by their website.

Casual Chinese restaurant with a small outdoor area.

column2: • Meat restaurant. Mehadrin.
• Chicken wings specialists. Offering a casual, modern Chinese menu.
• Friendly staff in a cozy environment.
• Located in Interlomas, 10 miles west of downtown Mexico City.

4072,Gaucho Grill / Metsuyan,"

Gaucho Grill is a contemporary Argentine steakhouse inspired by the tradition, values and culture of the gaucho lifestyle.

column2: • Mexico City is known for having great non-Kosher restaurants. Before the Gaucho Grill, there were no serious Kosher options in Mexico City.
• However, owners, father and son, Victor and Gabriel Romano, wanted to create a place that was no different from the non-Kosher restaurants.

• They exerted every effort to offer quality in each aspect of the dining experience: Food, decor, and service. That dedication was validated in 2003 when the restaurant was awarded “one of the 100 best restaurants in Mexico.”

• Decorated by a prestigious architectural firm in Mexico, the restaurant has two dining rooms, accented by candles and flowers. The decor is modern with a classical Argentinean twist. There are several plasma screens for viewing sporting events. Gaucho Grill’s house speciality is the Chateaubriand - their Prime Cut served over Papa Paja in a delicious wine and pepper sauce.

• While Gaucho Grill occupies the lower level, you will find the upstairs has more a laid back atmosphere in their second restaurant: Metsuyan. With Chinese cuisine and a sushi bar, they are the only kosher Chinese restaurant in Mexico City.
• For more information click here.

column2: • Vegetarian restaurant.
• Great place for backpackers and friends.
• Offering different falafel flavors in the pita, with a variety of fresh vegetables and homemade hummus.
• Falafel Sombrero menu presents cheap and traditional food whilst offering desserts like hot chocolate, soufflé with ice cream, and French crepes with chocolate and banana.
• Cool and friendly, a must if you are visiting Cozumel.
• Located at Av. Benito Juarez, in downtown Cozumel.

6660,Jerusalem Restaurant,"

A place to eat on the grounds of the Beit Chabad Cozumel.

column2: • Kosher Lamehadrin. Beit Yosef. Meat Restaurant.
• The menu offers a variety of Mediterranean-style dishes.
• A rich Israeli home-cooked menu that includes homemade dishes, salads, schnitzels, hamburgers and chicken breast and a range of meats. Everything is baked and cooked in the restaurant.
• Located on the grounds of Chabad of Cozumel, downtown Cozumel.
• You may contact them directly here.

• Friendly and modern environment, branch of Chocolatte Espresso Bar in New York City.
• Located below the Chabad House.

column2: • The Red Heifer Grill restaurant provides kosher meals in the popular Cancun tourist district.
• From their site:

column1: The restaurant offers a large variety of gourmet Mexican and international dishes with glatt kosher certification on weekdays. On Shabbat, the restaurant provides lavish, delectable Shabbat favorites and gourmet cuisine for all three meals. For the first time, our clients can enjoy culinary delicacies on Shabbat served in an elegant setting, with a simple reservation.

As part of Fly Luxus, ""an innovative tourist and travel agency in existence for 10 years"", with branches in Israel, USA, Argentina, Mexico and more. Kosher Luxus is committed to giving our clients the ultimate vacation experience — everything from the best-priced airline tickets, vacation spots, Hotels, and everything that goes into assuring a successful vacation.

column2: • Shabbat Menu.
• You can contact them directly here.
• You can reserve a table, a car, lodging and even flights.
• Our staff has never been to this place but have heard good things!
• Only Kosher lemehadrin option for meat in Cancun besides Chabad.
• From outside looks fancy and spacious.
• They run a Passover program. You can stay in any of the 3 hotels next to them and eat in their restaurant.

5309,Dag Dag Kosher Restaurant in Cancun,"

Fish and chips in Cancun ...and pizza!

column2: • This is a fun place where you can enjoy good food and karaoke.
• Fish and chips are their main dish. For more information about the menu click here.
• From their site:

column1: <div class=""x-el x-el-div x-el px_-font-style-normal px_-ff-_Cabin___Georgia__serif px_-fs-20 _mdpx_-fs-22 _lgpx_-fs-22 x-d-ux x-d-route px_-font-style-normal px_-ff-_Cabin___Georgia__serif px_-fs-20 _mdpx_-fs-22 _lgpx_-fs-22 x-d-ux x-d-route"">
Kosher Cancun Dag Dag, with Chabad Hejsher, real Kosher, real fresh and really delicious!

<div class=""x-el x-el-p px_-font-style-normal px_-overflow-wrap-break-word px_-word-wrap-break-word px_-word-break-break-word px_-c-rgb94__94__94 px_-fs-16 px_-fw-400 px_-lh-1p5 px_-mt-0 px_-mb-0 px_-ff-_Cabin___Georgia__serif px__CA_p_CA_ol-text-align-left px__CA_p_CA_ol-d-inline-block px__CA_p_CA_ol-pl-1p3em px__CA_p_CA_ol-ml-30px px__CA_p_CA_ol-mr-30px px__CA_p_CA_ul-text-align-left px__CA_p_CA_ul-d-inline-block px__CA_p_CA_ul-pl-1p3em px__CA_p_CA_ul-ml-30px px__CA_p_CA_ul-mr-30px px__CA_ul-text-align-left px__CA_ul-d-inline-block px__CA_ul-pl-1p3em px__CA_ul-ml-30px px__CA_ul-mr-30px px__CA_ol-text-align-left px__CA_ol-d-inline-block px__CA_ol-pl-1p3em px__CA_ol-ml-30px px__CA_ol-mr-30px _mdpx_-fs-16 _lgpx_-fs-16 x-d-ux x-d-aid x-d-route x-rt"">
Dag Dag Kosher restaurant in Cancun, opened its doors in January 2012. Since then, our menu has evolved to please the taste of our ever increasing customers.
The best real Fish & Chips around the world, made with real beer batter and using fresh Kosher fish from the fishermen in Cancun.
Our now famous pizza, with Cholov and Pas Yisroel ingredients. Our own house Mexicana Sauce on fish, pasta or pizza. A sauce that gives your tastebuds a delight.

column2: • Enquiries at: kosherincancun@gmail.com.

column2: • Fratelli la Bufala offers a complete menu specialised in classic Italian gastronomy and the best of Neapolitan cuisine.
• Giuseppe, Antonio and Gennaro la Bufala, better known as the ""La Bufala Brothers"", were born in Eboli, a charming city in the interior of Salerno.
• After the untimely death of their father, a mozzarella maker, the young brothers sold the company and started a new path that years later would bring them back together.

4955,"Gaucho Grill Restaurant, Mexico City","

Fancy Argentinian style meat restaurant.

column2: • Meat restaurant Argentinian style, where you will find varied meals already prepared, to takeaway or to eat in.
• Delivery to hotels is available.
• Located in a nice neighbourhood nearby many hotels.
• There is a terrace where breakfast can be enjoyed.
• The menu is very elaborate with an interesting variety of meals. For more information click here.
• They offer to ship Kosher food anywhere in Mexico, even directly to your hotel, ready to heat and eat. For more information click here.
• They organise events for up to 500 people. Advertising a large variety of meat, dairy and Pareve meals.
• You can contact them directly here.

5439,Shuky Kosher Meat in Mexico,"

Kosher meat restaurant in Mexico.

column2: • Meat store and casual restaurant. Kosher certified.
• Shuky Kosher produces and sells food that is strictly supervised.
• Their products reach a vast list of local clients and nearby countries.
• They include a bakery, dairy, meats, wines, and meals which can be bought in their different stores around Mexico or can be contacted for delivery. For more information click here.
• Their webpage is in Spanish. Spanish Menu.
• They have four different locations in Mexico. For more information click here.
• Enquiries.

• You can find a nice breakfast, delicious pizzas, or incredible pastas in Café Rimon, all in an Israeli style.
• Located in downtown Cozumel, not so far from the coastline.
• Enjoy a glimpse of Café Rimon here.

column1:
2254,L'aile ou la cuisse,"

Serves traditional dishes with modern taste of flavour.

column2: • L'aile ou la cuisse will be happy to receive you with a menu that reflects a perfect mixture of tradition and modernity.
• Several options are available for lunch, all at € 15. There's something for everyone: chicken sandwich, salad, fried chicken, burger ... Student have even a menu at € 10 (between 11:30 and 12:30).

• L'aile ou la cuisse delivers to you for free at the office or at home from € 15 order. So that your meals are hot and tasty, the delivery is only available in the 8th, 16th and 17th district of Paris.
• Remember to order your Shabbas from Wednesday until 24 hours in advance! All dishes are garnished with semolina and 3 salads of your choice, from a multitude of generous kemia.
• You can choose couscous, harissa, pleila, nikitouche, camounia, and more.
• L'aile ou la cuisse also has a branch in Tel Aviv.
• Meat restaurant close to Beth Loubavitch-Champs Elysées.
• Delivery services available.
• Varied menu.

column1:
3899,Setaï 19e,"

Second Setaï branch, near the Buttes Chaumont.

column2: • After creating Setaï 11th, Douglas and his team are exporting their experience and know-how in the 19th arrondissement, near the Buttes Chaumont.
• They found a beautiful establishment of 46 place settings which they totally redesigned the decoration to make it a design and avant-garde place.
• Contrasting colours between black and light wood, original relief effect with the paneling on the walls and ceiling, Setai is a modern restaurant that is unlike any other.
<li>The two young associates offer you a complete Chinese and Japanese map:

• For Chinese, fried and steamed entrees, soups, noodles and stir-fried rice, a large selection of chicken, beef, duck and fish are available in caramel, chop suey, black pepper, Szechuan, and pineapple versions.
• For Japanese, the traditional maki and sushi, california and temaki, are complemented by a nice selection of onion rolls, eggs and covered salmon, avocado, turkey or salad.
• The Setaï trays are particularly advantageous and worth a visit!
• Setaï quickly delivers all its specialties in the 19th and adjacent areas.

column1:
1716,Motorino,"

Serves real Neapolitan pizza cooked in wood fire.

column2: • Motorino is the only Kosher restaurant in Europe to offer you the true Kosher Neapolitan pizza, which will seduce you by its characteristic taste of crusty bread on the edges.
• The ingredients used are full of flavours because they have been chosen from highest quality produce.
• Whatever the dish you choose, you will have a unique experience.
<li>

column1: Urban Sushi: sushi and Japanese and American specialties Passionately, their team tailors club sandwiches, bagels, hot dogs, California, and sushi to everyone's taste upon request, allowing you to always savor more new products to go or sample on the spot.

column2: <li>

column1: Urban Sushi opens its terrace in the summer in the heart of the 17th arrondissement of Paris and also offers lunch options on-site or to go for those in a hurry. Urban Sushi guarantees delivery in Paris and nearby suburbs Urban Sushi delivers to your home, office, school.

column2: <li>

column1: Urban Sushi is a kosher restaurant under the control of Beth din in Paris.

1962,Instants Gourmands,"

Perfect place for a quick bite.

column2: • Charly and Muriel succeeded in opening this snack-sandwich shop, which also serves as an exhibition venue for artists' paintings.
• Charly, with over 20 years experience in the trade, delivers her culinary expertise after having occupied almost all the functions in the restaurant.
• The place is better for takeaway meals as it has limited seating available.
• Let yourself be tempted by a basquaise chicken, a veal stew, a chicken or beef dumplings with curry, a chicken with coconut milk or a lacquered duck.
• And to finish on a sweet note, you will choose between different flavourful cakes and mousses.
• The restaurant offers Shabbat dishes for 15 € with daily fresh and homemade products.

2163,The Famous Papy Youda by Shirel's,"

Well known fast-food restaurant in Paris.

column2: • Papy Yuda was the very first Kosher restaurant to offer hamburgers! Taste a single, a double or a triple cheeseburger or hamburger!
• They also make shawarma or falafel in french baguette, pita or in large plates.
• Papy Youda has 46 seats inside and 50 outdoor seats, so you can enjoy the sunshine when the time comes to devour a good shawarma pita or a nice hot dog!
• Remember to order your Shabbat on Wednesday, for takeaway or delivery.
• Available for private events.
• Baba Café is daily open from 11am to 10pm non stop.
• If you want to enjoy Tunisian food, like a brik, a tunisian sandwich or a banatach, Baba Café is for you!
• For your private events, Baba Café offers 2 menus: a unique salted menu, or sweet and salty one... to celebrate all your family parties!

• Resto Fleg is one of the many services offered to Jewish students by this complex located in the Latin Quarter and belonging to the Consistoire de Paris.
• Resto fleg offers students a wide range of ""hide cheap"" (sushi, sandwiches, bagels, hamburgers, salads and hot dishes).
• Non-students are also well-invited guests to eat in this friendly place.
• With 120 seats and an adjoining synagogue, Resto Fleg is a space for organising your receptions.
• Shabbat full or takeaway, trays garnished for séoudoth, birthdays, and more. Contact:  07 68 87 34 07.

column1:
2341,"Dav and Jo, Maison Guichy","

Well known restaurant with varied menu.

column2: • A few steps from the Buttes Chaumont, located on the banks of the Seine, the Dav Jo's staff will make you discover a menu where a wide selection of grills will be proposed.

• From complete fish with daily arrival to grilled Guichi's specialities, every meal delights your taste buds, not to mention the famous Royal kemia served on the table with a good appetiser to combine relaxation and flavour.
• The decoration was designed to create a unique family dinner, business meeting or private reception.
• The reception room is upstairs and has a capacity of 80 guests.
• During the summer you can enjoy a terrace that can accommodate up to 40 people.
• You can book your Shabbat to go! For two courses, Dav and Jo offers a 1/4 red or rosé wine!
• Located in the 19th arrondissement for more than 15 years, the Toda l'Akel restaurant offers a wide range of dishes.
• Discover its different Kosher pizzas with or without cheese or with a base of crème fraîche.
• You will also find a particularly popular salad card, consisting of seafood (substitute), or chavignol crotin or maybe you would prefer the Mexican salad.
• If you like, we have at your disposal salted pancakes with cheese or champignons and sweet crèpes.
• You can book the restaurant for your receptions.
• They also propose a map named corner brewery which puts at your disposal the classic brewery in Paris for example through the pavement of salmon or omelette nature.

• Their delivery service is open to the same schedules as the restaurant and delivers to you in any Paris within a shortest possible time. But if you want, they offer 10% off or soft drinks if you come to withdraw your order to takeaway.

2541,L'As du Fallafel,"

Restaurant acclaimed for its falafel sandwich, served with aubergine (eggplant) and hummus.

column2: • L'As du Fallafel is a Kosher Middle Eastern restaurant located at 34, Rue des Rosiers in the ""Pletzl"" Jewish quarter of the Le Marais neighbourhood in Paris, France.
• Their dishes are based upon North African and Middle Eastern cuisine.
• Due to the restaurant's popularity and cramped seating, the lunchtime line often extends well into the street.
• The restaurant is closed on Shabbat.

column1:
1977,HBK Voltaire,"

Kosher restaurant well known for its burgers.

column2: • The fast-food chain launched in 2011 by Avi Bensadoun now has 6 establishments in Ile de France. Check their Facebook page to check which one is closer to you.
• The HBK concept is based on its incredible offer of burgers! Variety of meats, variety of tastes, sizes, and more.
• At HBK the burgers come in beef, lamb, pressed veal, grilled or breaded chicken, fish, cheese parvé and can be tasted ""spicy"".
• Food lovers will appreciate the ""trio"" mini burgers for maximum revenue in a single plate.

• The menu is essentially American-inspired, it is also dotted with winks to Oriental-style cuisine with specialities of parguit, schnitzel, merguez and a veritable ""salad israeli"" generously garnished.

• HBK home-made specialities bring fast-food a personal touch with original products, such as sweet potatoes with maple syrup, hot dog sauerkraut, donuts ""onion rings"", salad ""hot mushrooms"" or its artisan chips.
• The HBK team delivers to you at home or in the office in the adjoining areas from 20 € of order and more, depending on the sector.

column1:
2349,Cosy Italia,"

A small restaurant that offers excellent Italian cuisine.

column2: • The house is run by two childhood friends who offer us a menu of Italian dishes based on fresh products.
• They cook all italian specialities: pizzas, pastas, risottos, fish, and more.
• Cosy Italia offers delivery in Paris in the 8th, 16th, 17th
• Whether it is for breakfast, brunch, bar mitzvah, henné, wedding, brit-mila, Shabbat hatan or ezker, Cosy Italia can welcome up to 80 persons and even offers catering services.

column1:
1995,Douieb Montmartre,"

The mythical restaurant of the district of Montmartre in the 9th arrondissement.

column2: • Here you will find Tunisian sandwiches, fricassee, bunks with tuna or potato.
• The Douieb restaurant also features a traditional Tunisian grocery store with boukha, anisette, pistachios and cashew nuts, not to mention all the variants, olives, nikitouche, etc.
• Specialising in couscous, Douieb has exceptional variety of couscous, traditional couscous with dumplings, fish couscous, couscous ganaouia, and couscous nikitouche for the best known.
• Douieb also offers its Oriental pastries: zlabias, deblas, bouscoutou, gazelle horns, makouds cakes, and yoyos.
• This place is permanently closed.
• This place is permanently closed.

column1:
1661,Nina Sushi Villiers,"

Kosher sushi chain of restaurants.

column2: • Since 2001, Nina Sushi offers a classic range of sushi in harmony with the new trends.
• At Nina Sushi, they also innovate in the way to order! Download the free Iphone Nina Sushi app and call the restaurant directly to order.
<li>Whether you're in Paris or in the suburbs, there's bound to be a Nina Sushi near you or ready to deliver! Here are other locations:
• Nina Sushi Saint-Mandé.
• Nina Sushi Saint Didier.
• Nina Sushi Montparnasse.
• Nina Sushi Neuilly.
• Nina Sushi Levallois.
• Nina Sushi Boulogne.
• Nina Sushi Voltaire.
• This place is permanently closed.
• Friendly staff and great pizza.
• You can enjoy pastas, fish, and salads as well.

column1:
25063,FLAVIO,"

kosher Italian cuisine restaurant

column2: • Flavio is your kosher Italian cuisine restaurant located in Paris, a stone's throw from Parc Monceau
• At Flavio, you can find quality cuisine, which brings together the most delicious flavors of Italy.
• At Flavio, your kosher Italian cuisine restaurant tastes many homemade preparations, made with love, care, and attention.
<li dir=""ltr"" data-placeholder=""Translation"">

column1: Try our delicious puguese pizza with a unique taste, our superb Flavio pizza, or let yourself be tempted by their tasty penne a la puttanesca.

column1:
1735,Missada,"

Restaurant offering Chinese menu and great service.

column2: • The frame of this restaurant is a fair balance between an imperial China (carved wood mahogany chairs, solid wood flooring) and a contemporary China (triangular wall sconces, large mirrors, clean decor).
• Missada has 50 seats inside and 25 seats on the terrace.
• Lunch options from 14 €.
• Delivery services available.
• You can also make room reservations for special events.
• This restaurant is permanently closed.
• Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!
• Have you been here before? Share your tips with us!
• Are you the owner? Claim your listing!
• It was a long time since the St-Paul district was quiet but the arrival of Rodchenko, a real nugget nestled in the heart of the Marais, upsets the codes of the classic Kosher restoration.
• Rodchenko is first and foremost a unique place halfway between the bistro and the cellar, the two rooms of the establishment each having their own universe.
• Coup de coeur for the lower floor which houses a surprising vaulted cellar with exposed stones in an intimate atmosphere.
• Rodchenko is part of a modern approach with one of the creative dishes you will not find elsewhere: almond zucchini crumble, mango salmon tartare basil, and more.
• With its 30 seats and its period character, the room located in the basement of the restaurant, is an atypical place totally privatisable for meetings and festive events.
• This place is permanently closed.
• This place is permanently closed.

column1:
25086,Kavod,"

Gourmet Meat Restaurant

column2: <li>

column1: Kavod is a kosher restaurant. On the specialty side, this is a meat and fish restaurant (especially on Jewish holidays).

column2: <li>

column1: You will enjoy a ribeye, an entrecote knot, a veal tongue, a veal chop or a lamb shoulder.

column2: <li>

column1: Kavod offers its customers à la carte dishes and lunch menus.

column2: <li>

column1: Among the great specialties of the chef is the terrible crying tiger. At this table, Parisians experience modern, exotic, fascinating and intriguing fusion cuisine (for example, think of a bream ceviche, flavored with coconut milk and garnished with a marriage of ginger and yuzu).

2443,Berbèche Burger,"

A famous restaurant for lovers of good meat.

column2: • Berbèche Burger is located in the 17th arrondissement of Paris.
• Berbeche offers grilled burgers that came from the best parts of the famous Berbeche butcher.
• Seating available inside and outside.
• The meat is cut and prepared by real butchers in compliance with art and the butcher tradition, preserved since 1896.
• Meat sandwiches and burgers are chosen especially from the excellent soft parts the butcher offers.
<li>Berbeche Burger has signature dishes, nowhere else found, such as Provencal veal burger or steak carpaccio sandwich with thorough cooking.

column1: Thanks to its rotisserie, you can order a roast chicken always prepared by Berbeche's butchers .

column2: • For lovers of American food, you can choose classic burger as Berbeche Burger, the speciality of the restaurant, cheeseburger, or Rossini Burger served with foie gras.

column1:
1725,Moses,"

The authentic New York deli in Kosher version.

column2: • Moses proposes to you an artisan American kitchen where the burgers, bagels, and salads are sublimated.
• From homemade buns bread to simmered sauces, to 100% pure beef, chopped on the spot every morning, the taste is in the spotlight at Moses whose team prepares your order before your eyes.
• The lunchtime menu includes a main and soft drink for € 11.
• Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!

• Saïko is located in the heart of the 19th arrondissement of Paris, near the Buttes Chaumont Park.
• With its bright colours and comfortable banquettes, Saïko is a cozy restaurant that makes you rediscover Asian cuisine.
• Speed, freshness of products and quality of service are the hallmarks of Saïko.
• Saïko offers you an elaborate menu worthy of great Chinese and Japanese gastronomy.
• Lunch menus available to dine in, takeaway or delivery.
• Delivers for free in all the 93 and in Paris.

column1:
25099,L'Inte Caffe,"

Italian restaurant and fish specialties.

column2: <li>

column1: L’INTE CAFFE opened its doors in the heart of the 8th district of the capital. The establishment it's a modern and welcoming place with its clean lines where touches of light and color mix with cherry wood, leather, and stainless steel furniture, inviting a warm and modern atmosphere in the center of Paris.

column2: <li>

column1: The restaurant consists of a first large room open to the street in season, the second room in front of our bar with 3 guest tables and a small room that can accommodate up to 14 people with its large table and video projector for all your meetings.

3857,Take Took,"

The new Asian restaurant of the 19th.

column2: • Take Took is the event restaurant! Located opposite the upper part of the Buttes-Chaumont side Botzaris, Take Took is ready to invade the 19th district of its Asian flavours.
• The Take Took team is up to this ambition with its head, Michael, the chief cook going strong with 15 years of experience.
• This restaurant succeeds in offering a varied menu that consists on sushi and Chinese food.

• No, you do not dream, all the Japanese specialities are present, from the tartars to the temaki to the sushi, california, eggs, makis, yakitoris, and the possibility to order menus midi, trays classic and large trays.
• Take Took delivers you free in the 19th and many adjoining areas (free delivery for a minimum order of 15 € lunch and 25 € the evening).

column1:
1925,La Box de Chabbat,"

Shabbat food delivery in a box.

column2: • The Shabbat Box has all the authenticity of the Sephardic Jewish cuisine proposed by joyful lurons.
• Innovative concept adapted to your modern life. With the Shabbat Box you just have to sit at the table and enjoy.
• Choose your assortment of kemia, two dishes and two accompaniments for a box for two people, all carefully served in quality boxes.
• No more oil everywhere! In addition, the Shabbat Box contains a bottle of wine and two hallots, all delivered to your home.

column1:
2001,David - Zapp's,"

The only Kosher pizzeria of the 13th.

column2: • Halav Israel restaurant.
• Located near the Yavné school, between the Porte d'Italie and Porte de Choisy, David Zapp's is the unique halavi address of the 13th arrondissement.
• In the kitchen open to the dining room, David and Benjamin are busy behind the stoves and serve you ""live"" their certified specialities.
• Relaxed atmosphere, design and comfortable setting, outdoor terrace of 20 places are the other assets of this friendly neighbourhood restaurant.
• Pastas, salads, and pizzas from 14 €.
• The restaurant will deliver you free of charge in the 13th arrondissement (order minimum 18 €).

column1:
2149,Shinzzo Manin,"

A fusion of Chinese and Japanese cuisines.
KWB's Highlights:

column2: • Shinzzo has an elegant and cosy interior, with the Yin and Yang colours, and a warm welcome… with a Halak Beth Yosef’s meat!
• This kosher restaurant will throw you into the deep and ancestral China, during your meal. In the plates, you will discover a traditional cooking, prepared with passion and expertise by the chef.
• The delicate aromas will delight your taste buds; they will excite even the most demanding gourmets. Amongst the appetising suggestions, let yourself be tempted by all the options.
• For food lovers, and loyal to the Japanese culture, Shnizzo develops a
• To satisfy all your desires, Shinzzo invites you on a flavourful journey in the heart of Japan with a complete and rich Japanese menu.
• Delivery service for lunch and dinner, at home or at the office in Paris and suburbs.

column1:
1709,Mr & Mrs Bond,"

Italian restaurant in the 17th arr. of Paris.

column2: • Mr Mrs. Bond welcomes you every day from Sunday to Thursday, for lunch and dinner.
• Offers you a menu of Italian Kosher specialities.
• Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!

column1:
2036,Chez René et Gabin,"

Restaurant specialising in oriental Tunisian cuisine.

column2: • Chez René et Gabin has established itself as the benchmark of Tunisian cuisine.
• This real institution in the Belleville neighbourhood was founded in 1988 by René Bsiri.
• Chez René et Gabin takes pride in their famous Tunisian snacks. Every day of the week you will find a special dish of the day, not forgetting the many Tunisian specialities.
• The restaurant is also famous for its takeaway Shabbat that you can order until Friday morning (early), accompanied by haloths.
• Catering services available on site for any special event.

column1:
2209,La Fille du Boucher,"

A hideaway restaurant with a unique 30's setting.

column2: • Open since 2011, La Fille du Boucher offers a unique environment and framework. This Kosher restaurant became a must for its exceptional meats.
<li>With a valet on the evening, La Fille du Boucher is a typically parisian brasserie where you feel in the 30's.

column1: Large bar, big room which can allow 70 people, mural fresco and red skin banquettes.

column2: • The meat of the restaurant comes from the best pieces, selected by the famous Berbeche butcher's. Generous and soft meat at reasonable prices. Please order 550g of prime rib of beef, or no less than 380gr of a rib steak knob!

• La Fille du Boucher also proposes a french, traditional and gourmet cook. From the fried foie gras and caramelised potatoes to the Rossini tournedos, you can also tast the slab peppery, a tartar steak or grilling, which will satisfy the most starved papillas.
• This place is permanently closed.
• This place is permanently closed.
• Tayim is located in the heart of the Ranelagh area, very close to La Muette, Avenue Mozart and Rue de Passy.
• This restaurant contains all the promises we wish from a local restaurant: a design and family framework, warmly welcome, casual and friendly environment.

• At Tayim's, everything is homemade: the fish is the highlight in recipes that will seduce your senses, the pizza (very thin crust), the mouth-watering gratins, the large choice of pastas and the many delicious desserts... You can't get wrong, freshness and expertise are Tayim's keywords!
• Tayim offers a private room at the basement to organise receptions or birthday parties up to 30 people, or working meals in privacy.
• Please contact Daniel for more information and to book a table or the private place of your dreams.

1784,Ma P'tite Poule aux Oeufs d'Or,"

Restaurant in the 2nd arr. of Paris. Well known for their grilled meats.

column2: • Offers lunch menus at very affordable prices.

• Here, all the pieces of poultry are part of the meals: poultry liver salad, chicken wings with caramelised sauce, pestles with hot sauce, the top of leg (parguit) marinated and grilled, schnitzel and chicken steak in a burger.

column1:
1886,La Suite Ristorante,"

Restaurant offering a wide array of authentic dishes.

column2: • La Suite offers you several possibilities to settle and enjoy the place. The 135 covers are spread over two floors and a terrace.
• The main room on the ground floor will seduce you with its chic and contemporary design sublimated by pink and purple reflections.
• For those who wish, a lounge bar is waiting for you to enjoy cocktails and drinks.
• In the basement, the living room of 25 place settings adopts a more natural and relaxed decoration with its exposed stone walls and low armchairs in white leather.
• The tempting menu offered by this restaurant is a reflection of its name: a wealth of possibilities in the Italian culinary style, as much as sushi options.
• Amongst the dishes recommended, the wine list is rich and flavourful.
• The layout of the premises of this restaurant also has the advantage of allowing you to organise events, such as business meetings, seminars or birthdays.
• And for the little ""more"", know that a valet is at your disposal for lunch and dinner.

column2: • You can make your own sandwich, they offer a range of first-class meats, a wide and colorful selection of salads.

column1:
1605,O'Woks 17,"

One of the very first hidden chains of Kosher sushi.

column2: • The success of O'Woks is due to strict control of the raw materials: traceability of the fish, compliance with food safety standards, daily supplies, preparation of products at the order, etc.
• Compliance with all these requirements allows O'Woks to offer you products with a freshness and an optimal quality.
<li>The public has not been mistaken and for 10 years, O'Woks has been expanding constantly with its 4 establishments in Ile de France:
• O'Woks 11th.
• O'Woks Levallois.
• O'Woks 19th.
• O'Woks delivers to you in many boroughs and in some suburbs (consult the zones of delivery and minimums of order).

• They offer an ultra-full Japanese menu in which the whole range of sushi is represented with a wide range of dishes (sushi and makis and classics, californias surrounded by avocado, salmon, turkey, and more).
• The restaurant also offers a Chinese food menu with many Asian specialities (spring rolls, sautéed noodles and rice, caramelised chicken or cashew nuts, beef basil, and more).
• This place is permanently closed.

column1:
2288,Il Palazzo,"

Restaurant in the heart of Galeries La Fayette.

column2: • In the heart of Galeries La Fayette, Il Palazzo is the ideal restaurant for your business lunch or your dinners between friends.
• In a cosy and cool environment, the chief will cook under your eyes pastas al dente or tiny pizzas.
• With 65 seats available, this Kosher restaurant is next to the famous Rue Richer, synagogues, and 9th townhall.
• A big table is specially there for birthdays or group meals, and a big screen will make you able to watch sports events.
• Il Palzzo delivers for free in all Paris and offers you lunch menus (dish+dessert) for 14,50 €.

column2: • Great atmosphere and quick service.
• Excellent pizza. They have a nice mix of various pizza toppings and spices.
• Affordable prices.
