column2: • Park Place is a kosher grill that has been open for more than five years.
• They’ve built a reputation for themselves for being “a great way to start the game” with an extensive menu to enjoy with friends along with your favourite sport.
• With friendly service and impeccable cleanliness, you’re in good hands at Park Place.
• The restaurant has got you covered on all the traditional food that sport fans will love from Buffalo Wings, Fried Chicken Buckets to Philly Steaks.
• The larger 8 ounce burgers, that are made fresh in house with high quality meat, are lean yet they maintain just enough juice and good beefy flavour which gives you the best of both worlds.

• Uniform thickness and consistency allows the flavour to develop fully within the burger. Their Skewered Grilled Kebabs deliver the lower-carb equivalent of a burger for when you want to savour the most basic grill experience.
• Don’t miss the  BBQ wings which are tasty and quite filling as well. The spicy version has a kick that will wake you up.
• For more information click here.

13881,Bubbies Bistro,"

Cholov Yisroel pizzeria with seating available outside.

column2: • Dairy Pas Yisroel - Cholov Yisroel.
• They are the area's only strictly Kosher dairy restaurant.
• Located in the North beach section of Ventnor, just a few blocks from the casinos, Bubbies Bistro serves pizza along with other Italian and Mediterranean specialities.
• Casual, family friendly, good for kids.
• Check their menu here.
• Heschcher.

13724,Nobo Wine and Grill,"

Unfortunately, this business closed due to the COVID-19 Pandemic.

column2: • Glatt kosher, mashgiach temidi.

• Nobo is ultimately about enjoyment; a place to have fun. From the sublime and cerebral, to the whimsical and comforting, guests can enjoy an innovative and progressive cuisine that draws on nature, art, history, and culture for its inspiration.
• Featuring contemporary American dishes & wine in a warm, refined atmosphere.
• ""Dressy"" environment. Dine indoor or outdoor.
• Located 12 miles northwest of Manhattan.
• Heschcher.

column1:
13773,Reuben's Glatt Spot,"

Glatt menu and dairy Cholov Yisroel menu. Takeaway or dine in.

column2: • Meat / Dairy Cholov Yisroel. Pas Yisroel upon request.
<li>All meats used are Glatt Kosher. All deliveries are certified Kosher only when sealed with tape

column1: bearing the Vaad symbol or the signature of the Mashgiach.

column2: • Please note: except for fish selections and items produced at the Sushi station, all items are to be considered meat/dairy or produced on meat/dairy equipment.
• Dairy processed in the store is Cholov Yisroel. Pas Yisroel available upon request.
• Reuben’s Glatt Spot has been serving the Essex / Union County, NJ area for over 30 years.
• Offering varied menu selections including dairy, meat, poultry, and parve.
• At the shop, all of their chefs work under the guidance of Kosher certification. Stop by the shop and try their grilled chicken or any of their broad array of menu selections.  Seating available.
• Check their menu here.
• Heschcher.

column2: • Dougie's BBQ & Grill is an American Jewish original; the United States only kosher barbeque food chain. Dougie's serves popular cuisine as kosher as it is American.
• Burgers and steaks, salads and soft drinks, hot dogs and fries, deli sandwiches and onion rings, wraps and laugh-it-up good times with family and friends, Dougie's got it all.
• Serving the greater New York Jewish community, Dougie's offers a full range of great food, as well as private party services, catering and of course, that All-American original: take out!
• Some of Dougie’s creative culinary concepts include the world’s first kosher fire poppers, buffalo wings and jalapeno slammers.
• For kosher vegetarians, dieters or those just feeling like having something light, Dougie’s boasts a full salad and wrap bar brimming with healthier alternatives.
• For more information click here.
<li>

column1: Other locations: Dougie's Express Woodbourne and Dougie's Baltimore.

10809,Butterflake Ship Kosher Bakery,"

Traditional bakery. Cholov Yisroel, dairy, nut-free.

column2: <li style=""list-style-type: none;"">
• Cholov Yisroel, dairy, nut-free bakery.

• Their Kosher bakery offers award-winning challah & pull apart challah, authentic Jewish rye bread or old world coffee cake, babka's, meltaway, pies, pastries, cookies, layer cakes, birthday cakes, low carb cheesecake, regular cheesecakes, line of fancy minature pastries, party cakes, wedding cakes, custom cakes, a state of art computer portrait/picture cakes, or their vast array of character-molds.
• Typical bakery with no seating available.
• Located 12 miles northwest of Manhattan.
• KOF-K Heschcher.

column2: • This place is permanently closed.
• Dairy / Parve.
• Bagels are parve, Pas Yisroel and Yoshon. Cholov Yisroel cream cheese available upon request. All other dairy products are non-Cholov Yisroel.
• In 1989, Super Duper Bagels opened and quickly had a line down Livingston Ave. Every morning, the smell of fresh bagels would waft down the street.
• Super Duper Bagels is now owned by the Adler Family who uses the same bagel recipe and has the same dedication to perfection inherited from the founders of Super Duper decades ago.
• A traditional bagel shop, no seating available, takeaway only.
• Located 12 miles west of Newark, NJ.
• Heschcher.

• Located 3 miles south of Lakewood Township.
• Heschcher.

4571,Stinger's Bar & Grill,"

Great venue offering bar food, pool tables, darts, televised sports events & live music.

column2: • Stinger's Bar & Grill takes pride in being the only kosher sports bar in New Jersey.
• Originally a popular night club, Stinger's was transformed into a burger bar when Ralph Epstein's family purchased the property and decided to create a kosher establishment in it.
• Located across the street from the beach and next door to its upscale sibling 656 Ocean restaurant, Stinger’s provides the setting for a casual dining environment.
• The decor is that of a classic sports bar complete with 2 bars, wooden furnishings, and 10 flat screen TVs, in addition to their 120''HD projector.
• This provides an opportunity to watch sporting events with a friendly crowd.
• In contrast to typical bars, this kosher version is family-friendly, and they serve an extensive kids menu. It provides a great service to the local community.
• For more information click here.

column1:
13815,Aron's West Orange,"

Glatt, Cholov Yisroel bakery and Kosher grocery store.

column2: • Grocery store where all meats used are Glatt Kosher. Bakery goods are Pas Yisroel and Yoshon. Dairy bakery goods are Cholov Yisroel.
• This place is a local Kosher grocery store.
• Located 8 miles northwest of Newark, NJ.
• Heschcher.
• Teudah.

column2: • Chopstix opened its doors and began serving delicious take-out and kosher delivery, and the rest is history!
• They offer an extensive takeout menu, as well as catering for business lunches and special events.
• It is a certified kosher restaurant.

13732,Poppys Bagels Pizza and TCBY,"

Casual and family-friendly bakery, offering pizzas, bagels, and ice creams.

column2: • Dairy. Parve.
• Bagels, pizzas, yoghurts and ice creams. All in one place.
• Casual and family friendly. Good for groups.
• Located 12 miles northwest of Manhattan.
• Takeaway and delivery services are available.
• Heschcher.

column1: ",,,,https://scontent-lga3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/103941341_3451533268203784_8389299893410869289_n.jpg?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=730e14&_nc_ohc=RwdmX4NilM8AX8bhAV5&_nc_ht=scontent-lga3-2.xx&oh=dc508fbfa82519eb715d9d138c9ce0c2&oe=61C24E52 https://scontent-lga3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/67174942_2708765889147196_2867113888120307712_n.jpg?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=9267fe&_nc_ohc=-XPOZumyJ30AX-czAp7&_nc_ht=scontent-lga3-2.xx&oh=7f7db8495d84fad7d606187ea09a8b3d&oe=61C21299 https://scontent-lga3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/66463648_2669567016400417_6808098019762765824_n.jpg?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=9267fe&_nc_ohc=UKz5slHkAW0AX-u5OJ0&_nc_oc=AQmuQm4e6mP13v0j_Ze4dnAun4293e6JGmRBHjVdyj1O123IntVMF5scLct74hHZRz4&_nc_ht=scontent-lga3-2.xx&oh=390fe7f46638be8a8294bf5d9c09f01e&oe=61C152DB https://scontent-lga3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/69180638_2758286350861816_8661845555854442496_n.jpg?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=9267fe&_nc_ohc=SYkiNMoXlPIAX97krwD&_nc_ht=scontent-lga3-2.xx&oh=402ded4e8fda42d64d413b6def7b0dad&oe=61C1970B,,,,Bakery,Pareve,"204 W Englewood Ave, Teaneck, NJ 07666",North America,USA,,New Jersey,,,moderate,40.9011610,-74.0068533,RCBC,https://www.rcbcvaad.org/rcbc-kosher/list-of-rcbc-kosher-establishments,(201) 862-0800,https://poppysbagels.com/,,https://www.facebook.com/poppystcby/,,saturday,custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""06:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""19:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""06:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""19:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""06:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""19:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""06:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""19:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""06:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""14:00"";}",closed,,,custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""07:00"";}",16/10/2018,24/1/2020,,,,

column2: • Menu offers culinary creations from Japan, Malaysia, Vietnam, and the Canton area of China.
• They are also located in Brooklyn.
• Fresh, delicious, cooked-on-the-spot food.
• Kashrut insight: Glatt Kosher, Vaad Harabonim of Flatbush, Kehilas Kashrus and RCBC Supervision.
• With a cuisine labelled as “Asian Fusion,” this steakhouse which was established in 2011 by Yamin Dayan under the name Chaiko Tapas.
• Estihana got a name and menu facelift in 2014 when Dayan who also owns Estihana in Brooklyn decided to combine his classic Chinese and Sushi menu with his current steakhouse restaurant.
• The result makes Estihana Teaneck, the only full service Chinese, Japanse, Asian, Sushi & Steakhouse restaurant in the area.
• In fact, this has also allowed Manhattanites who have missed their Estihana fix in the city to be able to take a short drive over the bridge and enjoy it once again.
• The menu offers creations from Japan, Thailand, Malaysia, Vietnam, and the Canton area of China.
• The restaurant has an Asian-style feel with silky wooden tables that line the restaurant with a sushi bar at the entrance.
• A quiet place for a date, family engagement or business meeting, you can enjoy good food at any time.
• You are surrounded by beautifully designed lighting, calming music, in a well mannered, casual bistro service.
• For more information click here.

4602,Estreia,"

Minimalist, warm steakhouse featuring upmarket, kosher entrees along with top-shelf wines & spirits.

column2: • A restaurant as beautiful and elegant as Estréia, which translates as ‘premiere debut’ in Portuguese, needs to be visited.

• This is an upscale treat for New Jersey folk who do not want to travel all the way to Manhattan for fine dining. Estréia, an ultra-modern steakhouse serves as the posh spot in the quiet neighbourhood of Lakewood, NJ.

• Two partners, Itchie Rosenbaum & Shloimie Green provide a rich and refined ambience for their guests with Estreia’s contemporary decor, custom classic table cloths, white china, and wine bottles racked on the wall.
• For more information click here.

25593,Giddy's Pizzeria,"

Real Italian food with kosher supervision

column2: • Giddy's Pizzeria offer homemade products such as: dressings, sauces, appetizers, vegetarian “chicken” and “meat” products and, of course, pizza.
• The food is always made fresh on request, as the customer deserves.
• Satisfy your sweet tooth with an order for a dessert cake like Chocolate S’mores Pizza with a special homemade Chocolate Marshmallow Banana sauce or Chocolate Banana Pizza.

4630,Teaneck Doghouse,"

Quaint stone tavern & sports bar with kosher food, a full bar, athletic memorabilia & games on TVs.

column2: • Teaneck Doghouse is a one of a kind eatery in Bergen County, under the supervision of Rabbi Zushe Yosef Blech, Hasgachat Kashrus of Kehillas Bais Ben Zion, Monsey, NY.
• It serves as the only Kosher sports restaurant in Bergen County that also serves alcohol.
• Teaneck Doghouse provides the only real Sports location in the area with 28 TV’s and the ability to show all sporting games and events.
• This eatery is the go-to location for those looking to enjoy a kosher, family friendly sports viewing environment.
• The Teaneck Doghouse is a place where the whole family can come, eat, drink, and have fun watching a game and hang out.
• For more information click here.

column1:
13874,Esti's Besty's Vegetarian Restaurant,"

Dairy Cholov Yisroel Casual restaurant serving American, Mediterranean & Italian cuisine.

column2: • Dairy Cholov and Pas Yisrael.
• Vegetarian and vegan options.
• Esti's Bestys offers a unique combination of American, Mediterranean, and Italian cuisine.
• Family orientated and family-owned restaurant located in Cherry Hill, New Jersey.
• Check out their menu.
• Everything is made daily and fresh to order.
• Located 14 miles east of Philadelphia.
• Heschcher.

column2: • Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!

column2: • The Bakeristor Cafe is determined to bring the very best in Chalav Yisroel and Pas Yisroel Artisan Food and drink to those seeking it out here in our Hometown, Sunny Side Linden, NJ.
• A place to dream while trying to escape the daily stresses of life and simply a comfortable place to meet your friends over a muffin and coffee.
• With the growing demand for high-quality, hearty kosher breakfasts and lunches, gourmet coffee, delicious fresh-baked goods, and excellent service, The Bakeristor's vision is to be just that.

13760,Petaks Glatt Kosher,"

Takeaway and catering services only.

column2: • Glatt takeaway and catering.
• Petaks Glatt Kosher has been catering to the TriState area since 1928 with the highest standards in Kosher cuisine.
• Located in Fair Lawn, New Jersey, Petak's attracts customers from Bergen and Passaic Counties and beyond, for their ample selection of Glatt Kosher delicacies.
• From an overstuffed hot pastrami on rye to matzah ball soup the way Bubby used to make, to the thinnest slices of lox you can find anywhere.
• No seating available. Prepared Glatt Kosher meals come ready to eat, just heat and serve.
• Located 18 miles northwest of Manhattan.
• Heschcher.

column1:
4625,The Green Chicpea,"

Bright counter-serve featuring kosher Middle Eastern grub such as falafel, hummus & shawarma.

column2: • The Green Chickpea welcomes you to a delicious meal filled with freshly made falafel and hummus.
• Being minutes away from the dorms of Rutgers University, this place is a hot spot for young adults looking for great falafel.
• They have been a hit since opening in August 0f 2013.
• Furnished with green tables and white chairs, this restaurant is a modern place where you can come for a quick and delicious meal.

• Owner Marty, who once had a restaurant in Manhattan that attracted many locals as well as travellers, started this falafel joint when his wife had created a personal cookbook, and started serving people an easy meal that was tasty, yet on the healthier side.
• “The Green Chickpea” was not a randomly chosen name. The “Green” represents the freshness and quality in all of their products, and the “Chickpea” represents falafel, their signature dish.
• Chef Ronit Weber, who was born in Holon, Israel, has 25 years of informal culinary training in Mediterranean style cooking.

• Some of his signature dishes are the Shakshuka Platter,  two eggs poached over a Turkish salad, and the Sabich sandwich which is served on pita with hummus, a Hardboiled egg, tahini, roasted eggplant, cucumbers and tomatoes.
• They also have speciality drinks like Turkish Coffee, and refreshing Jalapeno Lemonade.
• For more information click here.

4577,Snap's Kosher,"

Relaxed kitchen offering varied kosher fare, including sushi, sandwiches, burgers & fried chicken.

column2: • With much anticipation Owner Yossi Weisz opened the doors to Snap's, located in Lakewood, NJ in November 2016.
• He has been in the restaurant business for over 15 years. Yossi woke up one day with an idea that ""snapped into his head"".
• Weisz decided to turn his Kosher deli that offered a large menu into Snap's, gourmet fast food.
• Changing the fast food concept of large menus and processed food by focusing on the best of both worlds, offering the fast food concept with a focused menu.
• For more information click here.

4618,The Orchid,"

Casual kosher deli with a dining room serving Mediterranean dishes, sandwiches & vegetarian entrees.

column2: • With a contemporary decor and terra cotta color scheme, The Orchid is located in the quaint town of Metuchen, right in the heart of central New Jersey.
• In fact, the restaurant is a block off Route 27 (Middlesex Avenue) and just minutes off Exit 10 of I-95.
• Owner Dalia Barness has been giving the restaurant her own personal touch since August, 2000.
• When picking the name, she wanted to have something that would reflect the uniqueness of the restaurant.
• Since she loves flowers, she came up with the The Orchid. Dalia enjoys talking and listening to her customers, always aiming to please.

• The environment is friendly and in the summer months, patrons can sit outside. With their comprehensive lunch and dinner menu, you will discover a delicious combination of authentic Middle Eastern dishes, a wide array of vegetarian choices, a full line of deli products and an American-style kosher cuisine.
• Their varied menu is also full of appetizers and side dishes.

• One can choose from Kishka and Kibbe to Basmati Rice and Kasha Varnishkas. Entrees such as the chicken Marsala, Polynesian chicken and Moroccan fish are all house specialities and highly recommended.
• With excellent service and a commitment to customer satisfaction, their talented chefs will serve you only the finest foods with a variety of flavors even the pickiest palate is sure to enjoy.
• Whether you're stopping in for a quick sandwich on the go or bringing the family in for some comfortable and delicious dining, The Orchid has just what you're looking for.
• And if you’re planning an intimate business luncheon or a lively family reunion, they can help you.
• They offer catering services and banquet facilities for groups both large and small.
• For more information click here.

11696,The Hot Bagel Bakery,"

Their daily goal is to produce the best tasting bagels you'll ever eat.

column2: • They use an old fashioned barrel mixer to create the perfect bagel crunch.
• They also hand roll every bagel to create their signature texture and taste.
• The bagels are boiled and then baked in a revolving oven. The Hot Bagel Bakery takes pride in every bagel they sell.
• Supervised by Jersey Shore Orthodox Rabbinate.

11679,The Butchers Steakhouse,"

Delicious food and great portions of amazing steaks.

column2: • You can see their menu here.
• Unique place with a very large outdoor seating area surrounded by lovely tiki torches.
• Delicious and unique steaks.
• Atmosphere is very nice, and has a great fireplace!
• Supervised by Jersey Shore Orthodox Rabbinate.

column2: • Glatt Kosher restaurant. Shomer Shabbat.

column1:
10815,Chikies French fries and Chicken Bar,"

Casual restaurant suitable for families.

column2: • Glatt Kosher restaurant.
• Founded in January 2007, Chickies is a Kosher takeaway restaurant in Teaneck, New Jersey.
• Stays open later than most food establishments and will alter the menu and create specialised products, based on feedback received and requests.

• Chickies offers chicken cutlet sandwich, wrap, salad, one of  20 flavours of wings both fried or grilled or their homemade side dishes (hand-cut french fries, sweet potatoes fries, breaded mushroom bites, homemade onion rings, etc.)
• Check their menu here.
• Located 11 miles northwest of Manhattan.
• KOF-K Heschcher.

4587,Ottimo,"

Restaurant offering affordable prices, yet an expensive touch.

column2: • Ottimo Cafe is under the kosher certification of The Kashrus Council of Lakewood.
<li>This cafe is an upscale all-dairy restaurant that masterfully combines the casual

column1: and the fine to create the most exquisite dining experience.

column2: • Located in Howell, a suburb of Lakewood, New Jersey, Ottimo is like an island of culinary excellence amidst a buzzing metropolis. Step out of your hectic routine and into a world of heavenly food and a most comfortable ambience.
• Opened to the public at the end of 2011, Ottimo Cafe has brought a whole new meaning to the words cultured and sophisticated.
• Executive Chef Jason Cappetta, a graduate of the prestigious Johnson & Wales University College of Culinary Arts, helps bring a fresh and modern approach to classic Italian and American cuisine.
• He takes pride in the fact that all the food is made from scratch - from the pastas to the sauces - nothing is pre-made.
• Ottimo's menu offers lunch, dinner, and healthy options, so it’s suitable to every palate.
• The gnocchi, salmon dumplings and teriyaki are all house specialities and come highly recommended.
• For more information click here.

4660,Mocha Bleu,"

Casual kosher spot with a modern vibe serving pizza, sushi, pasta, fish & other familiar fare.

column2: • Open since November 2009, Teaneck’s Mocha Bleu is a place where guests choosing their dishes are assured that one chef is responsible, and is an expert in the cuisine that comes from their kitchen.
• Specialities at this patisserie, bistro and café, range from breads, pasta, sushi, fish, and pizza from a cherry-wood burning oven.

• Owner Naftali Abenaim, an award-winning fashion designer, was inspired by the glossy, spare style of French Architect Philippe Starck, outfitting the eatery with Starck’s Louis Ghost chairs – transparent and comfortable armchairs.
• While the colours in the restaurant’s name was inspired the brown-bronze chrome tables adorned with cerulean-blue drinking glasses.
• For more information click here.

column1:
4648,Noah's Ark,"

Long-standing kosher eatery serving a variety of sandwiches, soups, steaks & traditional favourites.

column2: • Noah’s Ark is a traditional delicatessen with a southern twist that has found its home on Cedar Lane in Teaneck, New Jersey for almost three decades.

• Noam Sokolow, the owner, says, “We take pride in providing a terrific dining experience to every guest, every time. We treat strangers as friends and friends as family. After 28 years, we still strive to continue a legacy of excellence.”
• The legacy of excellence is backed by awards from the Jewish Standard and Best of Bergen for best kosher deli, best pastrami, best knishes, best matzo balls, and best burgers.
• Noah’s hot, juicy corned beef was voted best in the U.S. The sweet and sour tongue is a crowd pleasing delicacy, while the Romanian Tenderloin Steak has won over the hearts of Noah’s customers.
• The rack of BBQ beef spare ribs are guaranteed to have you licking your fingers and smacking your lips, and Noah’s Ark always has extra napkins handy.

• Both Northerners and Southerners rave about the southern fried chicken - best fried chicken north of the Mason-Dixon line, the Lone Star Special - burger deluxe topped with homemade “Texas” chili, and their Hushpuppy “Puppy Love” - a frankfurter wrapped in a potato knish.
• Try the pear crumb cake, their signature, homemade chocolate chip cookies, or for the more health conscious, their sugar-free, baked apple for dessert.
• For more information click here.

4636,Shelly's Cafe,"

A dairy kosher cafe with a homey feeling.

column2: • Shelly's Cafe, on Cedar Lane, in Teaneck, New Jersey, wants you to consider them your dairy ""home away from home.""
• This cafe has been open for over two decades and is still as dedicated to their customers as they were the day they opened.
• Owners Shelly and Noam Sokolow promote their dishes as those your own Jewish mother would make, especially their award winning Sunday brunch.

• The brunch menu, served on Saturday night and Sunday mornings, includes specials such as the Mediterranean Shakshouka with roasted eggplant, feta cheese, tomato, onion, pepper, the Double Battered French Toast using Texas French Toast sticks, seasonal berries, whipped cream, and Vermont maple syrup.
• The Jewish Standard and Best of Bergen have both rated Shelly's Sunday Brunch as the best brunch in Bergen County.
• For more information click here.

column2: • Glatt restaurant.
• A menu always evolving with new additions is the result of months of in-depth research and countless menu tastings to ensure that every bite meets standards of excellence.
• Contemporary decoration and a casual environment, probably ""dressy"" in evenings.
• Located one mile north of Lakewood Township.
• Heschcher.

column1:
9513,"Kosher Food Mart, Delta Gas Station, New Jersey","

Kosher food mart at a Delta Gas station

column2: • Kosher food mart at Delta Gas station in Lakewood, NJ.
• For quite a long time, kosher eating voyagers have needed to manage with chips and pretzels, however, that may have changed! Some gas stations are offering kosher products.
• In this one, in particular, you may find parve and dairy products.
• Located in Lakewood, 54 miles east of Downtown Philadelphia.

column1: ",,,,,,,,"Food,Store,Supermarket,Delivery/Pickup",,"100 Madison Ave, Lakewood, NJ 08701, EE. UU.",North America,USA,,New Jersey,,,moderate,40.0911246,-74.2169467,,,+1 732-363-2233,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,1/7/2018,,,,,

12350,Yapchik Restaurant & Takeout,"

Casual and contemporary restaurant. Takeouts or eat in.

column2: • Glatt.

• Yapchik, named for a special deli dish, popular in Jerusalem, made with a combo of deep-fried potato pudding fused with succulent chunks of meat, favoured amongst the post-midnight crowds of Yeshiva boys eating out after an intense week of studying Talmud, to schmooze and relax.
• Located in the centre of the heavily Orthodox Yeshiva New Jersey Township of Lakewood.

• Yapchik offers sandwiches and hand formed burgers, a full open buffet & salad bar. Authentic upscale cuisine with an exciting wide array of appetisers and a full menu of unique Yapchik-style main dishes.
• Their full shabbos spread is also available every Thursday & Friday, offering from prime cuts of beef, lamb & poultry, to the crunchy schnitzel, kugels & dips.
• Contemporary decoration, good for groups, families or solo dining.
• Check their menu here.
• Heschcher.

column1:
13709,Ma'adan - New Jersey,"

Takeaway and delivery services available. Offering vacuum packed meals.

column2: • Glatt takeaways and deliveries.

• For over 20 years Ma’adan has been serving Kosher takeaway to the NY metropolitan area. Located five miles west of George Washington Bridge in Teaneck, NJ, they are a one-stop shopping destination for all your Kosher culinary needs.
• Vacuum packed travel meals are available. No seating on premises.
• Check their menu here.
• Heschcher.

column1: ",,,,https://maadan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/gl_26-400x250.jpg https://maadan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/gl_23-400x250.jpg https://maadan.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/gl_34-400x300.jpg,,,,"Delivery/Pickup,Food",,"446 Cedar Ln, Teaneck, NJ 07666",North America,USA,,New Jersey,,,moderate,40.8888181,-74.0219104,Va'ad HaRabbanim - Rabbinical Council of Bergen County (RCBC),,(201) 692-0192,https://maadan.com/,,https://www.facebook.com/MaadanCatering/,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,16/10/2018,,,,,

4676,Etc. Steakhouse,"

Intimate steakhouse provides guests with farm-to-table fare in a relaxed, white-tablecloth surrounding.

column2: • Opened in February of 2009, Etc. Steakhouse offers an intimate and elegant dining experience with uniquely magnificent food and exceptional personal service.
• The owners, friends Chef Seth Warshaw and Yisachar Novoseller offer their customers something different than what they have become accustomed to.

• Whether it’s an amuse buche for every table, on the house of course, or maybe a melon sorbet palate cleanser between the appetizer and entrée course, again on the house - they try to make the dining experience just that, an experience.
• They have a great philosophy: “If we can’t do it great, then it’s not worth doing. Our goal is to serve great food and provide great service. We want to be the best and we strive to do just that.”

• The restaurants name is actually an acronym of the family names. Eva is his youngest daughter, Tzippy is his wife, and Carmela is his oldest daughter, and they all know that you will be in good hands with Seth at the helm.
• Seth received his culinary training at the Institute of Culinary Education in Manhattan, NY. There, he was educated under some of the finest chefs in the culinary industry.

• He quickly became known for his unique dishes and his ability to pair ingredients, tastes and textures to create culinary masterpieces. It must have paid off as Seth won the 4th Annual Culinary Competition at the 2011 Kosherfest.
• Chef Warshaw’s passion for food, and desire to please his clientele is apparent in all of his distinctive dishes.
• For more information click here.

4609,Cherry Grill,"

Offering a unique combination of kosher steakhouse and Asian favourites.

column2: • In late 2013, Cherry Grill merged with Barclay Cafe to mark Cherry Hill’s largest Kosher Chinese, Sushi-Steakhouse restaurant, located in the Barclay Farms Shopping Plaza.
• Since 2009, Chaoxing Lin, originating from Fuzhu, China, established Cherry Grill running one of the only Glatt Kosher meat restaurants in the area, which is just 15 minutes from Philadelphia.
• Being a family friendly, yet elegant restaurant, Cherry Grill offers a pleasant comfortable experience for the families in the area.
• They have a great philosophy that if your favourite Asian dish is not on the menu, please tell your server and they will be glad to prepare it for you!
• For more information click here.

5096,Restaurante Kasher da Barros in Rio de Janeiro,"

Friendly and convenient takeout restaurant.

column2: • Meat restaurant.
• Friendly restaurant located near the Hebraic Club and purposely intended to assist the Jewish community.
• There are hotels nearby and kosher supermarkets in the area.
• Most of the menu is prepared for takeaway, but you can eat in if needed.
• For more information on the Portuguese menu click here.
• Hotel delivery is an option, for more information in Portuguese click here.
• They have a ton of good reviews on their Facebook page. Seems to be a good economical choice.
• Enquiries.

Please read the following text that it's on its website:

Although we have no Mashgiach and open on Saturday, we have committed ourselves to the following: No use of non-kosher animals (we don't use though kosher slaughtered meat). Complete separation of meat and dairy products during the preparation and cooking process. We offer as meat alternative kosher fish and vegetarian meals. Additionally, we offer kosher Israeli wine and beer.

column2: • Open on Shabatt
• KOSHER STYLE
• They use non kosher meat.
• Their slogan says ""Israeli Specialities"", having a menu offering a culinary Sephardic cuisine.
• They also offer vegan and vegetarian meals. For more information click here.
• Restaurant located near the local Chabad and within walking distance from Berlin's main attractions.
• The restaurant has been receiving a lot of media attention and the local's reviews are very good in general.
• Enquiries.
• Kosher vegetarian restaurant.
• It is a casual, but nicely decorated, restaurant, looks perfect for lunchtime.
• They offer catering services. For more information click here.
•  From their site:

column1: Get to know the new Israeli cuisine, dip a soft and warm handmade Pita bread in a Jerusalem style hummus dish, carefully made with your favorite hot topping, enjoy a finely chopped vegetable salad with extra grilled halloumi, or a crunchy homemade falafel wrap with Tahini sauce! Discover special dishes like mujadara – a piquant rice-lentil dish or shakshuka – poached eggs in tomato sauce with feta and herbs served upon a sizzling hot pan to the table.

column2: • Enquiries.

column1:
5177,Sohar´s Kosher Restaurant in Frankfurt,"

*NO LONGER KOSHER*
Restaurant in the Jewish community centre of Frankfurt.

column2: • Meat restaurant.
• Fancy and well-decorated restaurant. Looks like an excellent place for business or couples travelling.
• From their site:

column1: With our restaurant in the ""Jewish community center Frankfurt"", we are centrally located and easily accessible in the heart of the Westend.
Just come by and treat yourself with one of our Israeli or international dishes. You can enjoy a glass of Israeli Red or white wine from the Golan Heights.

Our team can provide a service for either a small celebration or a business lunch. In our restaurant, we offer space for up to 100 guests. Our room is available for larger parties of up to 500 guests. Call us and reserve a table.

column2: • Delivery is available. For more information contact here.
• Enquiries.

5184,Restaurant Die Kurve in Dusseldorf,"

Mediterranean restaurant in Dusseldorf.

column2: • Israeli restaurant & Jewish specialities.
• Located in the city of Dusseldorf, in the downtown area, near hotels and major city attractions.
• Fancy and well-designed lounge with an interesting Mediterranean menu. For more information click here.
• Enquiries.

column1:
5161,Restaurant Eisntein,"

Well decorated and fancy Israeli restaurant.

column2: • From Ashkenazi to Sephardic cooking.
• Classic decoration, looks like a good place for business or couples travelling.
• From their site:

column1: The Restaurant Einstein in the Israelitische Kultusgemeinde at St.-Jakobs-Platz is centrally located and is easy to reach in the heart of the old city, just a short walk from Marienplatz. The only Glatt kosher restaurant of the city, the kitchen is characterised by Jewish-Israeli and international specialities. Highest quality under the rules of Kashrut – unique in Munich.

The kitchen is under the strict supervision of the Munich and Upper Bavariarabinate. Our Maschgiach supervises the observance of kashrut during kitchen operating hours. All meals are also available for takeaway.

We will be pleased to consult you on our exquisite selection of Israeli kosher-mevuschal wines that are available by the glass. Let yourself be seduced by the delicious fruit aroma of red, rosé and white wines- not only from the Golan Heights. Prosit-Lechaim!

column2: • Enquiries.

column1:
5218,Hummus & Friends Israelite Restaurant,"

Vegetarian, vegan & kosher hummus dishes freshly prepared daily.

column2: • Israeli restaurant with excellent reviews for their hummus and pitas.
• Conveniently located in downtown Berlin not so far away from Alexander Platz.
• From their site:

column1: Our Restaurant Hummus & Friends located in Berlin Mitte with views of the TV tower to the left and the new synagogue to the right. You can reach us at any time directly on-site, by phone or via email. Their team is glad to assist you at any time.

5210,Beth Cafe,"

Non-profit cafe house, run by the local jewish community.

column2: • The Beth Café is a non-profit institution of the Jewish community.
• As an integral part of the municipality,  it is intended to provide a kosher catering facility for the Jewish population of the city and their guests.
• Israeli and Jewish specialities are offered, such as hummus, falafel, bagels, gefilte fish & horseradish, Medschádera, and Matze dumplings.
• The Beth Café is also used for celebrations and events and can accommodate up to 100 people. In fine weather, it is possible to sit in the leafy courtyard.
• This place is a must!
• For further information click here.
• Check the menu.

column1:

Casual and well located kosher and vegan restaurant.

column2: • Casual restaurant offering kosher, vegetarian and vegan dishes.

• Catering services and takeaway are available.
• They also have rooms for rent, so lodging could be considered.
• Take a look at their menu here.

Meat, parve and vegan restaurant.

column2: • Elegant place, seems appropriate for business travellers and couples.
• To see their menu click here.
• From their site: Our beautiful modern restaurant offers delicious dishes from the kosher kitchen. The in-house Simcha beer is now also available on tap.
• You can contact them directly here.
• Kosher catering services available.
• From their site:

column1: An old, but incorrect saying says: ""If something tastes good, it may be not kosher.""
At Top Kosher & Gourmet, we are the proof that the kosher kitchen can offer a delicious dining experience for every occasion.

column2: • Top Kosher & Gourmet offers everything from individual services to a full-service organization, i.e. on request, we gladly accompany you when selecting a location, advise you in detail and find the best solution for you and your guests.
• Catering is provided for up to 1500 people.
• Media Information.
• Enquiries.

• Touristy location.

12593,DAR IMA ( מסעדה כשרה מרקש ),"

The restaurant has not yet received a kosher certificate but the meat comes from a kosher butcher shop and a product under the supervision of the OU.

column2: • First Kosher restaurant in Marrakech,  Moroccan Jewish cuisine, but also prepares specialities to curious gourmets.
• Located 2 miles west of downtown Marrakesh. 150 miles south of Casablanca.

• Kosher Without Borders is designed to help you find Kosher food made to Orthodox standards anywhere on Earth. We also list non-Orthodox providers and closed establishments to clear up any doubts you might have, if you come across them while searching online.
• Small restaurant offering an Atmosphere that is very welcoming with modern stylish decor, simple menu and great food.

5848,Melamchik,"

Parve and lacteo X freshly made with love.

column2: <li style=""list-style-type: none;"">
• Parve and milk restaurant.
• Since 2010, Golden Spork winner Chef Lang has been serving both quality interpretations of classic dishes and daring new ventures into the uncharted territories of food.
• Pacific Tavern's interior was designed by the award-winning Hayden Collective.
• The multi-level restaurant offers the choice to observe passers-by in the glass-encased Cascade Bar on the 2nd floor.
• You can watch the art of cooking as it occurs in the open-kitchen dining room.
• Salads, ceviche, and dips are the house speciality.

5928,Lula by Darna,"

Excellent kosher meat restaurant in Panama.

column2: • Fine food establishment, there is always plenty to choose from at Lula by Darma, fresh ingredients and rotating weekly selections help keep menu colourful.
• Takeout, seating available outside and inside, free off-street parking.
• Provides both food and service with care, and an attention to detail that will make your mealtime a delight.
• Offers meat, dairy and Pareve products, from main dishes to different types of desserts.
• Spanish menu.
• Enquiries at: lula@darna.com.pa.
• Address: Avenida Samuel Lewis, Plaza Obarrio.
• Phone: (507) 209.4820.
• This place is permamently closed.

Local dining style with Israeli Cuisine in one restaurant.

column2: • Meat restaurant.
• This restaurant has a varied menu that combines local dining style with Israeli Cuisine.
• Located next to Chabad of Cyprus, at the Jewish Centre in Larnaca.
• Near hotels and close to Lanarca downtown area.

column1:
6289,Glattaste Kosher Food Delivery Service,"

Kosher food deliveries where orders must be made and paid for at least 24 hours before needed.

column2: <li style=""list-style-type: none;"">
• Glattaste prepares and delivers Kosher food in Cyprus, attending all Chabads in the country.
• All orders must be made and paid for at least 24 hours before, and only Monday to Thursday.
• Orders can be delivered on Friday until 2 pm, but orders are not taken on this day.
• Shabbat meals and Challah can only be supplied on Friday after 2 pm.
• To order and view the menu, click here.
• Information on Kosher food in Cyprus, click here.
• More questions? Email to: kosher@jewishcyprus.com or contact them via Whatsapp.

column1:
10909,Blue Lagoon,"

Kosher Chinese restaurant with affordable prices.

column2: • Chinese restaurant with catering services available.
• You can eat in or oder to takeaway. The takeaway meals are carefully packed in special containers.
• During lunch time there is a special business menu with more affordable options.
• To check their menu click here.

column1:
10853,Mama Mia,"

Pizzeria and restaurant with varied menu.

column2: • Pizzeria and restaurant with friendly staff and quick service.
• The thin, italian pizza is delicious but you can also order fish and chips, salads, and more.
• Takeaway services available.
• Delicious meals and friendly staff.
• Menu available in English here.
• Dairy pizza place and vegetarian fast-food restaurant, selling falafel and salad.
• Closed during the summer on Shabbat and during the winter is open 2 hours after the end of Shabbat.
• Israeli style restaurant offering the usual mix of falafel and schnitzel.
• Kosher shop on premises.
• Catering services available and Shabbat meals to go.
• It is always a good idea to call ahead and confirm opening times before you go.

10903,Hoffy's Restaurant,"

Stylish restaurant offering traditional Yiddish cuisine.

column2: • Restaurant known by their traditional Yiddsih cusine in their stylish restaurant that focuses on Kosher Yiddish dishes based on simple ingedients and sophisticated taste.
• The Hoffman brothers serve attractive dishes containing different kinds of meat and fish and copious vegetarian dishes with tasty vegetables.
• You can get to know this exquisite facet of international gastronomy in a relaxing atmosphere.
• Catering services available.
• You can also order online here as they deliver ready meals throughout Europe.
• Check their Facebook page for more details.

column1:
10650,O Délices d’Alice,"

Restaurant founded by siblings. Varied menu and friendly staff.

column2: • Family restaurant founded by siblings Anita and Milko. In tribute to the maddening cravings of their sister Alice's senseless dishes, it is her name that now gives life to this atypical restaurant.
• Friendly staff and varied menu.
• Seating available inside and outside.
• You can check their Facebook page for more details.

Antwerp's Beni Falafel voted 'best falafel place in the world'.

column2: • This restaurant is located on Lange Leemstraat, two metro stops from Central Station.
• Named after Beni Barnatan, an Israeli who came to Antwerp in 1967 to see a girl he’d met when she was on holiday in Israel. He intended to stay two weeks; he’s still there half a century later.
• The food is great, everything is fresh, including the buns, which are made in-house.
• The hummus is perfectly seasoned and light; the products are Kosher, vegan or vegetarian, and gluten-free.
<li>

column1: World Bnei Akiva, a Jewish youth movement active in 24 countries asked to rate the quality of their favourite local falafel, and the winner was Beni Falafel.

6581,Grins Vegetarian Cafe,"

Modern and friendly café bar and deli in univeristy campus, open to all.

column2: • Vegan restaurant.
• Located on the Vanderbilt University campus in the Schulman Center for Jewish Life, accessible to all.
• Modern and friendly environment, offering not only regular menu, but daily internationally-inspired specials as well.
• The menu includes grilled sandwiches, soups, salads of all sorts, vegan cookies and muffins.
• You can also choose from their special dishes, like Chile Relleno, Szechuan Noodles and Indian Veggie Curry.
• They open during the school year. To see their calendar for Special Closings, click here.

6594,Kosher Pita Grill,"

Modern restaurant with live music and it's Kosher.

column2: • Meat restaurant.
• Modern and friendly place. A great spot to enjoy live music and burgers, pitas or salads.
• The restaurant serves lunch and dinner, but you can also stop by for drinks in the evening or an afternoon coffee.
• Kosher Pita Grill is fully waited, with seating outdoors for those who wish to dine in the sun.
• Takeaways available.

7080,"Jewish Community Centre, Hong Kong","

Jewish Community Centre in the heart of Hong Kong.

column2: • The Jewish Community Centre is conveniently located in the Mid-Level area on Hong Kong Island.
• With superb facilities, they are known as the heart of the Jewish Community in Hong Kong.
<li>

column1: The JCC boasts two Kosher restaurants and a Kosher retail outlet.

column2: <li>

column1: COFFEE SHOP  a Glatt Kosher meat restaurant with a wide choice of items on its menu.  It is open for lunch and dinner on a daily basis.

column2: <li>

column1: WATERSIDE DAIRY RESTAURANT located on Level Two of the JCC and offers dairy and fish dishes on its menu. Note: Not all the items in this restaurant are Chalav Yisroel. The opening hours of the Waterside varies.  It is advisable to call ahead.

column2: <li>

column1: RETAIL SHOP  dry goods from the USA and Israel, freshly baked bread and cakes and frozen meat and chilled dairy products. Call ahead for opening hours.

column2: • Deliveries and takeouts are available.
• You can contact them directly at enquiries@jcc.org.hk.

7062,Mul Hayam - Glatt Kosher Restaurant,"

Mul Hayam is Kehilat Zion's restaurant, strictly Glatt Kosher kashrut lamehadrin.

column2: • Strictly Glatt Kosher kashrut lamehadrin.
•  Caters to tourists, business people and the local community looking for a Kosher meal in Hong Kong.
• Offers a combination of traditional Jewish, Middle Eastern, European and Asian food.
• Takeaway: available all day from 8:00 AM - 10:30 PM.
• Specially prepared food for travellers. Frozen food is also available.
<li>

column1: You can enjoy Shabbat meal in a festive atmosphere!

column2: <li>

column1: They are open on Friday night after Arvit and Saturday morning after Shacharit.

column2: <li>

column1: To make reservations for Shabbat meals, please email kzionhk@yahoo.com, or call:
(852) 2366 6364 (office) or (852) 2368 0061 (Synagogue).

column2: <li>

column1: Donations and sponsorships are always welcome. To donate click here.

Restaurant in the heart of Jerusalem

column2: <li>

column1: Violin in the Square is an elegant chef's restaurant, which emphasizes meat dishes, and also serves fish, seasonal salads and breads, baked especially for you.

column2: <li>

9901,"The Eldan Hotel, Jerusalem","

City-centre hotel within walking distance of Mamilla Mall.

column2: • Great location, and great hotel for the price.
• 75 smoke-free guestrooms.
• Coffee/tea in a common area.
• Air conditioning.
• Daily housekeeping.
• Garden.
• Front desk safe.
• ATM/banking services.
• Laundry service.
• Meeting rooms.
• Multilingual staff.
• Free newspapers in the lobby.
• Luggage storage.
• Free buffet breakfast, wifi and parking.
• Heart of Jerusalem.
• Tower of David Museum of the History of Jerusalem - 13 min walk.
• Garden Tomb - 20 min walk.
• Machane Yehuda Market - 24 min walk.
• Western Wall - 24 min walk.
• Dome of the Rock - 24 min walk.
• Temple Mount - 25 min walk.
• Israel Museum - 35 min walk.
• Knesset - 36 min walk.
• Mamilla Mall - 7 min walk.
• Jerusalem Great Synagogue - 8 min walk.

7281,Kikar HaMusica,"

A secret hidding in plain sight!

column2: • Kikar Hamusica is hiding in plain sight. A few steps away from Kikar Zion, walk down Yoel Moshe Salmono St, past Tmol Shlishom. Look for this sign and turn right:

• There are a number of really really good restaurants, including a French bakery. Many nights you will find live music playing. Having walked down that street countless times and we missed the sign EVERY time.
• What are your thoughts? Let us know by writing a review or leaving a comment below.

9266,"Crepes & Waffles Heladeria Centro Chia, Bogota","

Only ice cream is Kosher. Chain of restaurants in Colombia that specialises in crepes, waffles and ice cream.

column2: <li style=""list-style-type: none;"">
• Dairy. Pas Yisroel. All flavours are Kosher except for ""Chicle"" and ""Ron con Pasas"".

• Crepes & Waffles is a very popular chain of restaurants in Colombia that specialises in crepes, waffles and ice cream. The restaurants are not difficult to find, most of them are found in malls in the major cities, although we will list only the stores that offer Kosher ice cream.
• Ice cream menu in Spanish.
• This store, in particular, is at Centro Comercial Chia, Bogota.

column2: • Dairy. Pas Yisroel. Parve.
• All flavours and waffle cones are Kosher certified.

• Michelle Il Gelato Artigianale makes their own ice cream every day. They use Belgian chocolate, Madagascan vanilla, and fresh fruits. 30% less sugar and 18% less fat than premium traditional ice cream, no artificial colourings or preservatives. 100% natural.
• The menu is in Spanish.
• Located in Unicentro Mall, 2 miles west of Downtown Bogota.

9414,Comunidad Hebrea Sefaradí de Bogotá,"

Kosher deliveries and takeaways by request only.

column2: • Offers deliveries and takeaways of Kosher breakfasts, lunches, and dinners that must be requested in advance.

• The guidelines of this community have always been Orthodox, preserving the Sephardic cultural traditions and organising activities, events, courses and conferences that allow the continuity and transmission of Judaism to the new generations.
• Located in Los Rosales, 5 miles south of Downtown Bogotá.
• You can contact them here.

Modern ice cream store with nice decor.

column2: <li style=""list-style-type: none;"">

• Ice cream store of 100% handmade products. Specialises in unique combinations of flavours with an ancestral tradition. Gelatos and artisanal popsicles, cakes, cookies, and baked empanadas are sold at the premises.

• The menu is in Spanish.
• Located 3 miles west of Downtown Bogotá.

column1:
8084,Edible Arrangements,"

Cholov Stam Fruit arrangements, smoothies and treats store.

column2: <li style=""list-style-type: none;"">
• Dairy Chalav Stam. Pareve.
• They offer fruit arrangements, chocolate dipped fruits, smoothies, and sweets.

• Their fruit arrangements and gifts are always made fresh daily, using fruit that’s grown and picked to their standards. And, they have a variety of gourmet chocolate dipped fruit, like chocolate dipped strawberries, apples, pineapple, bananas, oranges, and pears.
• They can arrange fruit bouquet or dipped fruit boxes for a special occasion.
• Located at Stein Mart Festival in Richmond, 9 miles west of Downtown.
• For more information about their products click here.

8048,Mam's Best Food,"

Great Israeli style restaurant in Key West.

column2: • Casual outdoor restaurant with a varied Kosher menu.
• Food served by none other than ""mam"" herself. Sandwiches and falafel at Mam’s is top notch.
• Seating available outside, so you can enjoy your meal with Prigat and a nice conversation.
• Catering services and deliveries available.
• Keep in mind that Mam's closes early (6:30 PM).
• Seating available outside without A/C.
• KWB's staff has visited Mam's restaurant, and it's exactly what its name sounds... like eating at mom's.

8054,Cafe at The Weinstein JCC,"

Cafe restaurant in the Weinstein JCC.

column2: • Meat Glatt Kosher.
• The Cafe is Central Virginia's only Kosher Breakfast & Lunch cafe offering prepared meals and fresh & local ingredients.
• Menu items include freshly made soups, salads, sandwiches, and more. The Cafe is located inside Weinstein JCC and is open to the general public, members and non-members alike.
• The Weinstein JCC is located 8 miles northwest of Downtown Richmond and 4 miles away from exit 27 W to merge onto I-495 W toward Silver Spring coming from I-95 on your way to Miami.

column2: • Dairy and Chalav Stam.
• Indian vegetarian restaurant.
• Established in 1998.
• 100% meat, egg, smoke and alcohol-free.
• If you're vegan, food can also be made without any dairy products on request.
• The restaurant also has a grocery store with a diverse range of Indian pastries and spices. All the delicious sweets are made fresh and you can also order these for catering.
• Located in Renton, 12 miles south of Downtown Seattle.
• Teudah.

8238,Holy Smokes Righteous Eats,"

Kosher food cart parked in a 76 gas station.

column2: • Glatt Kosher smoked BBQ food.
• Tasty, fresh, creative and hearty. The meat is cooked to perfection. The condiments and sides are unique and flavorful. It’s what you’d expect from some of the best Kosher food carts in Portland.
• For more information about their menu, click here.
• Located at SW Beaverton Hillsdale Hwy, 8 miles southwest of Downtown Portland.

column1: ",,,,"https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/745162bd-5404-4d9a-bd06-3d5adc81dc7d/IMG_0235%202.jpeg/:/cr=t:0%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:100%25",,,,Restaurant,Meat,"3679, 3975 SW Beaverton Hillsdale Hwy, Portland, OR 97221",North America,USA,,Oregon,,,moderate,45.4853202,-122.7178062,Oregon Kosher,https://oregonkosher.org/,(503) 706-1006,https://holysmokes.house/,,https://www.facebook.com/HolySmokesRighteousEats/?ref=bookmarks,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,22/5/2018,1/11/2020,,,,

8232,Dairy Hill Ice Cream,"

Casual dairy and vegan ice cream store.

column2: • Dairy, not Chalav Yisroel.
• Oregon Kosher supervises the production of many of their items.
<li>Most of their products are sourced from:
• Alpenrose Dairy.
• Umpqua Dairy.
• Coconut Bliss - certified organic, dairy free, soy free, gluten free, vegan ice cream.
• Red Wagon Creamery - all natural, organic ice cream.
• Sift Bakery - vegan, gluten, soy & GMO-free.
• Masconi Cones - gluten - free waffle cones and bowls.
<li>Their menu consists of:
• 30+ Flavors of Alpenrose Ice Cream.
• Vegan Options from Coconut Bliss.
• Waffle, Cake and Sugar Cones  (gf).
• Waffle Bowls  (gf).
• Custom Ice Cream Cakes.
• Custom Ice Cream Sandwiches  (gf, v).
• Ice Cream Sundaes.
• Banana Splits.
• Milkshakes.
• Malts.
• Floats.
• Hand-Packed Pints & Quarts.
• Fresh-Baked Cookies, Brownies & Rice Krispy Treats  (gf, v).
• Great place for kids and family.
• Located in Hillsdale, 5 miles south of Downtown Portland.

8245,Cafe @ the J,"

Cafe and deli at the Mittleman Jewish Community Centre.

column2: • Dairy (mostly Cholov Stam) & Parve.
• Cafe at the J is Portland's only kosher dairy restaurant certified by Oregon K and offers sandwiches, soups, salads, pizza, falafel, pasta, bagels, coffee, and drinks.
• It is located inside the Mittleman Jewish Community Centre. 15 miles south of Downtown Portland.
• For more information on their menu, click here.
• On tuesday evenings the Cafe shuts down its dairy kitchen, and instead operates out of the catering kitchen, offering a meat menu.

8249,Bowery Bagels,"

Casual store at Portland, selling genuine NY style bagel bakery.

column2: • Pareve.
• Bagel store located in NW Broadway, Downtown Portland.
• You can eat-in or takeaway, for information on the menu, click here.
• You can have breakfast, bagels, and sandwiches for lunch.
• Kosher pareve cooking and baking is supervised by Rabbi Shlomo Truzman.
• They bake Challahman challah in Portland, sell in select retail locations around the city, and ship to anywhere in the United States.
• You can order here to get a kosher taste of Portland delivered directly to your home.

• They will ship you fresh challah by USPS Priority Mail.  In most cases, you will receive it within two days of shipment.  They recommend that you eat your challah right away or freeze it and defrost it when you need it.
• Challahman challah is available at retail locations throughout the Portland area.  To see the nearest location to you click here.

column1:
8220,Sunny's Legendary Frozen Yogurt,"

First and only Oregon Kosher certified frozen yoghurt shop.

column2: • All yoghurt is Kosher Dairy. Not Chalav Yisroel.
• Not all toppings are Kosher, please refer to the approved list of kosher toppings located in the store. Those toppings are located in a special Kosher divider.
• Sunny’s Legendary Frozen Yoghurt is Portland’s only provider of frozen yoghurt cakes.
• You can choose from their pre-made cakes or create your own with the help of a Sunny’s cake consultant.
• All pre-made cakes are Oregon Kosher and available gluten free.
• You can enjoy Mud Pie, Cookies n Cream, Strawberry Shortcake, and Vanilla Celebration. Very generous slices are also available.
• Located at Vermont hill, 6 miles southwest of Downtown Portland.
• You can see their different flavours here.

8214,Safeway Grocery Store,"

Grocery store with both indoor and outdoor seating available.

column2: • Glatt Kosher meat.
• They have a full-service kosher bakery and expanded kosher sections for wine, dry goods, frozen goods, fresh meat, and cheese.
• The bakery features customisable cakes, cupcakes and more while the deli offers a variety of party trays, made to order.
• At the butcher-block, you’ll find an assortment of meat, seafood, and sushi.
• They have a restaurant area where you can enjoy coffee, eat deli or drink cold beverages.
• Located in Multnomah, 6 miles south of Downtown Portland.

8337,Izzy´s Brooklyn Bagels California Av.,"

Bakery offering more than 30 different varieties of bagels. Chalav Yisroel.

column2: • Izzy's Brooklyn Bagels Bakery offers more than 30 different varieties of bagels, so their customers can enjoy not only traditional choices, but special and gourmet bagels as well.
• Cholov Yisrael.
• Deli, pastries, sandwiches and vegetarian food.
• Open on Shabbat.
• Bakery and cafe with takeaway available.
• For more information about the menu click here.
• They are located in Palo Alto, 35 miles south of Downtown San Francisco.

8343,Frena Bakery and Cafe,"

Bakery specialising in Mediterranean savoury pastries.

column2: • Not cholov Yisroel, but they have almond milk for the coffee. Pas Yisroel.
• Frena's recipes include traditional and homemade dishes, cooked to the recipe from the owner's grandfather Mosheh would have cooked it.
• Eat-in, takeaways and deliveries are available.
• They offer salads, pastries, bread, sweets and donuts.
• For more information about their menu, click here.
• Located at 6th street in Downtown San Francisco.

8280,Sabra Grill Restaurant,"

San Francisco’s only kosher restaurant with a Mashgiach on premises, opened since 1996.

column2: • Meat restaurant. Mashgiach on the premises.
• This restaurant is certified for kosher dining and serves Israeli & Mediterranean cuisine, including skewered meats & falafel.
• For more information about their eat-in menu, click here.
• Shabbat takeout menu, click here.
• Located in Gran Avenue, Downtown San Francisco.

column2: • Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!
• Strictly kosher dining throughout the academic year.
• Featuring glatt-kosher meat Sunday through Thursday.
• Open brunch 10-2 and dinner 5-9. All you can eat for one cheap price.
• Only the kosher station kiosk is kosher, not the entire hall.
• Have you been here before? Share your tips with us!
• Are you the owner? Claim your listing!

12734,The gourmet shop - Barbados,"

Supermarket and delicatessen, offering some Kosher products

column2: • This is a small market that ALSO carries some Kosher products.
• Located 11 miles north of Chabad of Barbados, and 7 miles north of downtown Bridgetown.
• The Gourmet Shop is not associated with Chabad.
• Pro tip: Call in advance to verify their stock.
• The Gourmet Shop - Barbados is often compared to Harrods Food Hall on a little corner shop, catering to your every culinary need.
• Kosher Without Borders is designed to help you find kosher food made to Orthodox standards anywhere on earth.
<li>We also list non-Orthodox providers and closed establishments to clear up any doubts you might have,

column1: if you come across them while searching online.

",,,,https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.18169-9/14237477_976452862464653_5283611482997336470_n.jpg?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=09cbfe&_nc_ohc=I3hO64GkBlkAX9AHr-l&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&oh=c5c4d63de39c45d5dd54b591fbfa4f36&oe=61BB8241 https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.18169-9/12541050_816008945175713_3262938619346056472_n.jpg?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=e3f864&_nc_ohc=xJtMeEOP_C0AX_S_XGQ&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&oh=a6b440abed49b65589a4edd7cff2e88c&oe=61BE0466,,,,"Catering ,Supermarket",,"#5 Chattel Village, Highway 1, BB24045, Holetown, Barbados",Central America,Barbados,,,,,moderate,13.1839840,-59.6378340,,,+1 246-432-7711,https://www.thegourmetshopbarbados.com/,gourmet888@caribsurf.com,https://www.facebook.com/thegourmetshopbarbados/,,friday,custom,09:00,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""17:00"";}",custom,09:00,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""17:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""09:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""17:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""09:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""17:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""09:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""17:00"";}",,,,,,20/9/2018,28/7/2021,,,,

19551,hongkongbanjum.com,"Hongkongbanjum.com is one of the renowned Korean restaurants in San Diego. We are providing you the delicious Chinese food and noodle at the best prices. Check out our menu now by visiting our website.

8433,Kosher in Paradise,"

Great Kosher food, excellent service, affordable prices in a cozy space.

column2: • Vegan, Israeli style restaurant.
• Located in the Chabad House of Puerto Rico at Isla Verde, 8 miles east of Old San Juan.
• For more information about their menu, click here.
• Run by Rabbi Levi and Rochel Leah Stein.
• Pre-ordered meals can be eaten at Chabad in comfort. China and cutlery included. All sit down meals at Chabad have a 15 percent service charge.
• For delivery and takeaway services click here.

column1: ",,,,https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/131391283_5605984989442387_786633642178182050_n.jpg?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=a26aad&_nc_ohc=kXw5Lm2AwuIAX-dMLBG&tn=8xwR0EZvVxQK3iol&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&oh=163dd04275d870f328f3f446616348c2&oe=61BE8C5A https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/131589273_5605984979442388_7052619496238358246_n.jpg?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=a26aad&_nc_ohc=DOwlX2Wr92wAX_cJXCX&tn=8xwR0EZvVxQK3iol&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&oh=851b8d98fb1763ec8b951d6c84306944&oe=61BE398F https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/89013099_4031260673581501_9030931255448829952_n.jpg?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=8bfeb9&_nc_ohc=bUhwPPyDx3oAX-WTQfk&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&oh=22beea883146f0849db42d62b38ab28a&oe=61BF1FDB,,,,"Catering ,Delivery/Pickup",Pareve,"18 Calle Rosa, Carolina, 00979, Puerto Rico",Central America,Puerto Rico,,,,,moderate,18.4440425,-66.0157914,Chabad Of Puerto Rico,https://www.jewishpuertorico.com/templates/articlecco_cdo/aid/266798/jewish/About-Us.htm,+1 787-253-0894,https://www.jewishpuertorico.com/templates/articlecco_cdo/aid/2121882/jewish/Kosher-in-Paradise.htm,orders@jewishpuertorico.com,https://www.facebook.com/pages/Kosher-in-Paradise/570183079671322,,thursday,custom,11:00,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""18:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""11:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""18:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""11:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""18:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""11:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""18:00"";}",closed,,,closed,,,closed,,16/5/2018,28/7/2021,,,,

10274,Lutati’s Shabbeskitchen,"

""A taste of home, away from home.""

column2: • Meat restaurant with catering and delivery services available.
• You can eat a full meal at the restaurant according to a daily menu at a fixed price of € 9.10.
• They can deliver breakfast and Shabbat meals to your hotel.
• Their Pessach menu is varied and full of great options for you.

column1:
9555,Padani,"

Kosher food and products from Israel for good prices.

column2: • Great hummus options as it comes in many flavours.
• Fresh pita and challah bread.
• Varied options of ready-to-serve meals.
• 2 minutes walk from the Chabad House, opposite the Prego Pizzeria and Bakery.
• Delivery service available.

column1:
10237,Prego Pizzeria,"

Pizzeria and restaurant in the heart of Vienna.

column2: • Pizzeria also offering falafel and fresh pastries.
• Delivery service available.
• Located on the street opposite to Padani shop.
• 2 minutes walk from the Chabad House.

column1:
8760,Novellino,"

Small and cozy Italian restaurant with a wide menu.

column2: • Dairy.
• Italian restaurant with a varied menu presenting delicious options from soups, pizzas, pasta, fish, and more.
• Quick service and friendly English-speaking staff.
• They offer Mediterranean, vegetarian and vegan dishes that are prepared exclusively fresh.
•  In addition, you can treat yourself to a variety of sushi from 17:00 on Mondays to Thursdays and from 12:00 on Sundays.
• A cozy place where you can book for small events such as Sheva Brachot, a birthday party or simply for a family get-together.

column1: ",,,,https://scontent-hou1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/34102358_2036305703289772_4255673091180462080_n.jpg?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=e3f864&_nc_ohc=Q8fEfZleU_kAX8JzeRg&_nc_ht=scontent-hou1-1.xx&oh=e4b30a545caa0fb3b8391ccfbbbd08ba&oe=61BC5A45 https://scontent-hou1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/182080114_2833721013548233_2974689030366059039_n.jpg?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=8bfeb9&_nc_ohc=ZI6bfRr-kHoAX_OpnGB&_nc_ht=scontent-hou1-1.xx&oh=b4f25cd6915ec504cd80781ac8c05155&oe=61BC646B https://scontent-hou1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/147831985_2773952862858382_179007085927441663_n.jpg?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=8bfeb9&_nc_ohc=1CfxzzWt81AAX-BjUi3&_nc_ht=scontent-hou1-1.xx&oh=934f14b66c3ac327442740b2f2fb0926&oe=61BABC26,,,,"Pizzeria,Restaurant",Dairy (Cholov Stam),"Zirkusgasse 15, 1020 Wien, Austria",Europe,Austria,,,,,moderate,48.2156215,16.3834520,Under the Kashrut of Rabbi Schwartz,,+43 1 2128169,https://www.novellino.at/,,https://www.facebook.com/novellinorestaurant/,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,3/7/2018,30/1/2020,,,,

10222,Shefa Markt,"

Breakfast and a range of fresh pastries in a Kosher supermarket.

column2: • The café of Super Market 'Schefa' offers breakfast and a range of fresh pastries.
• Delivery service available.
• You can contact them by email: shefa.markt@gmail.com.

column1:
10095,Ohel Moshe,"

Traditional European bakery, with mini supermarket.

column2: • Cozy place offering coffee, breakfasts and fresh pastries.
• Cafe and minisupermarket where you can sit and enjoy a coffee (with cholov yisroel milk).
• Located in the street opposite to Kosherland.

column1:
11352,Shelanu,"

Welcome to a delicious world of Middle Asian vegetarian cuisine in Vienna.

column2: • Nice restaurant famous for its delicious falafels.
• Shelanu literally means ""ours"" in Hebrew. A word that stands for their concept.
• They cook freshly on a vegan basis according to our own recipe free of any preservatives.
• Shelanu is a family business where every member helps but the meals are mainly cooked by Mrs. and Mr. Sadikov.
• Everything that is cooked comes from family recipes and is passed on from generation to generation.
• Check their menu here.
• You can email them at: info@shelanu.at.

column1:
10246,Snack bar CHEZ BERL,"

Meat deli specialities: Meat dishes according to daily menu.

column2: • Berl Einhorn's meat butcheries offers dishes according to daily menu.
• The restaurant has a Kosher and meticulous European menu with small and large dishes that can be taken home or to the hotel.
• Shawarma on Tuesdays and Thursdays.
• This place is permanently closed.

column1:
9560,Sanatorium Maimonides Zentrum,"

Restaurant with delivery services available.

column2: • Restaurant in a Jewish home facility.
• Their cuisine suits any need, from normal to diabetic, and light food.
• Deliveries available in Vienna everyday. For same-day deliveries, the order must be made by 09:00 AM.
• On Jewish holidays they also provide hot dinner on request.
• Lunch daily menu – Groups please call in advance.
• Their diet also includes allergen information.
• You can also contact them by email: office@maimonides.at.
• Mea Shearim, is Hebrew and means ""a hundred gates"", these stands for the varied menu of food and drinks as well as for the creativity that the chefs redevelop every day.
• Cozy seating, hand-crafted artwork, and the bar all come together to give you the perfect way to enjoy your time at Mea Shearim.
• Cold dishes as well as eccentric ""rolls"" of various kinds, fresh Nigiri and Sashimi, grilled fish and meat specialities with different Asian herbs, exquisite spices and sauces.
• You can email them: welcome@mea-shearim.at or contact them via Facebook.
• Glatt restaurant.
• The Shabbeskitchen wants you to feel at home. Their restaurant is set up in a living-room concept.
• You will find a comfortable seating corner to have a coffee, as well as a bookshelf with books about Judaism, beautiful curtains and family pictures on the wall.
• Located 1-mile southeast away from downtown Vienna.
• Heschcher.

column1:
11430,Bistro Chez Berl - Bernat Ainhorn Butcher,"

Small bistro with butcher.

column2: • Butcher and bistro.
• Seating available inside.
• Have you been there? Let us know in the comments below.

column1: ",,,,,,,,Restaurant,Meat,"1020 Vienna, Große Stadtgutgasse 7",Europe,Austria,,,,,moderate,48.2205213,16.3819920,Rav A.Y. Schwartz - Glatt (Orthodox of Vienna),,+43 1 2140392,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,26/7/2018,29/1/2020,,,,

9471,Bahur Tov,"

Jewish, Asian & International cuisine, all in one place.

column2: • The name of the restaurant means good boy, with these words the owner, Asher Davidov, was often praised by many people.
• After spending a lot of time in the community, Davidov was asked to open a restaurant for Jewish, Asian & International cuisine.
• Restaurant, bar and café.
• Great service with a varied menu.
• They're famous for their hummus and falafel.
• Very good customer reviews overall, as they say it on their website, ""the team is pleased to pamper you.""
• Takeway and catering services available.

column1:
10242,Konditorei Neunteufl,"

Cafe and bakery offering varied and delicious products.

column2: • Whether it is a wedding cake, your own castle or a football field, the more unusual and individual, Konditorei Neunteufl staff are your confectioners.
• You will find a large number of different pastries partly seasonal fresh baked.
• Their Maschgicha is wife Israel Diuk-Welman.
• You can email them here: konditorei@ihr-konditor.at.

column1:
11358,Yudale,"

Nice restaurant with clean and quiet ambience.

column2: • Clean and pleasant ambience in a quiet area.
• Excellent reviews with phrases like: ""good service, nice owners, great price.""
• Varied menu with delicious options.
• You can email them at: mail@yudale.at.

column1:
10278,Alef-Alef,"

A classic Jewish restaurant located in the Jewish community building.

column2: • Attractive place with good food.
• You'll get to try the original schnitzel.
• You can have a magnific Shabbat with your family, just make sure to check availability with them.
• After dinner you can enjoy an amazing dessert as they offer a varied menu for any cravings you may have.

column1:
10248,Kosher Deli,"

Meat deli and catering with meat dishes according to daily menu.

column2: • Meat deli and catering offering meat dishes depending on daily menu.
• Fast delivery service in the area.
• Seating available inside
• Ready-to-eat Shabbos meals.
• Shawarma on Mondays and Wednesdays.

column1:
11302,Pizza & Co,"

Pizzeria with takeaway and delivery services available.

column2: • Pizzeria with 16 options for you to choose from. Cholov Yisroel.
• Takeaway and delivery services available.
• Seating available inside.
• Chips, soup, and falafel are also part of the menu.
• Located on the corner of Van Leyenberghlaane - close to Cheiderschool and Beth Shalom old agehome.
• Easy to get there by Tram 5, Metro 51, and Bus 354, all stopping at Van Boshuizenstraat stop. You can also take Bus 62 and get off at Van Nijenrodeweg stop.

column1: ",,,,https://scontent-hou1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/181648377_2917524021838996_4551135369813967339_n.jpg?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=e3f864&_nc_ohc=pd80cOVM3ocAX8Pp9Q4&_nc_ht=scontent-hou1-1.xx&oh=28496c1d0bfee31621b57d08658b9721&oe=61BBCE99 https://scontent-hou1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/205375916_2955747944683270_3463829213770967229_n.jpg?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=8bfeb9&_nc_ohc=J6--K5n0txYAX_u1kZ1&_nc_ht=scontent-hou1-1.xx&oh=b23acfcf514c8df295538646e2f395d2&oe=61BC03D1 https://scontent-hou1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/183744562_2921537551437643_1280492559362145216_n.jpg?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=8bfeb9&_nc_ohc=Y8JZPnVvRncAX9nKRTx&_nc_ht=scontent-hou1-1.xx&oh=80ab16dce58b5d7ca9d6f1b02e35291f&oe=61BC87AE https://scontent-hou1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/193509164_2936777539913644_4054804534312830802_n.jpg?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=8bfeb9&_nc_ohc=ZZtLMYCwpowAX_Qk57i&_nc_ht=scontent-hou1-1.xx&oh=c5be773bec6216439beb0779e80d1e07&oe=61BAB4CA,,,,Pizzeria,Dairy(Cholov Yisroel),"Kastelenstraat 105-A, 1082 EB Amsterdam",Europe,Netherlands,,,,,moderate,52.3259829,4.8792955,Amsterdam Ashkenazi & Sephardi rabbinical supervision,,+31 20 404 4453,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,30/7/2018,,,,,

11298,Rimon Deli - Bakery and Supermarket,"

Bakery and supermarket in Amsterdam.

column2: • Well-known Kosher bakery, and supermarket selling dry goods, meat, dairy and frozen products.
• Food for shabbat can be bought on Fridays or catered to hotels.
• You can find baked goods, cakes, sandwiches and toasts.
• Seating available inside and outside.
• Visit their Facebook page for more details on their baked goods.
• The restaurant located in Kastelenstraat 65, called Grand Cafe Rimon, is closed and now there will be a Sushi restaurant (NOT KOSHER) in the same location.

column1:
11167,Vos Kosher Catering,"

Catering company delivering meals for tourists.

column2: •  With over 25 years of experience in Kosher catering, this company also provides complete Kosher meals – even for 1 person – to private individuals, companies and even other caterers.
• They also deliver Kosher meals, sealed per plate, to (almost) any location – hotel, restaurant, etc.
• If you are invited to a non-Kosher restaurant, you can let the restaurant contact them to order a Kosher meal.
• They have an inhouse maschiach on the premises.
• You can email them at: info@voskoshercatering.nl.

column1: ",,,,https://scontent-hou1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/79934066_2312450965526807_4957569561659441152_n.jpg?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=730e14&_nc_ohc=O9bDPIzHj58AX-bK5Xt&tn=8xwR0EZvVxQK3iol&_nc_ht=scontent-hou1-1.xx&oh=8f23d563e53b2e3f6aad444f9261c169&oe=61BDF1B0 https://scontent-hou1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/48405835_1723018887803354_6059254026275389440_n.jpg?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=cdbe9c&_nc_ohc=QXB_rsE5OqYAX8xj0WG&_nc_ht=scontent-hou1-1.xx&oh=ad426f8fd59a4e8c1331dc6c91b334a6&oe=61BE2AB1 https://scontent-hou1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/48385312_1723018024470107_2134880921168379904_n.jpg?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=cdbe9c&_nc_ohc=gWOFYFVsr18AX9Z50Dd&_nc_ht=scontent-hou1-1.xx&oh=333212f47a81d8fcd7c8979102f5353a&oe=61BC1840,,,,"Catering ,Food",,"Spinnerij 73, 1185 ZS Amstelveen, Países Bajos",Europe,Netherlands,,,,,moderate,52.2809620,4.8330922,Rabbinate of the Jewish Community of Amsterdam / Rabbinate of the Portuguese-Israeli Community of Amsterdam,,+31 20 471 4525,http://www.rolandvos.nl/,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,31/7/2018,,,,,

11292,David's corner,"

Kosher bakery, grocery and sandwich shop in Amsterdam.

column2: • Dairy delicatessen, Kosher supermarket  selling dry goods, meat, dairy and frozen products.
• You can find sandwiches, takeaway meals, salads, and wine.
• Catering services available.
• Seating available outside.
• You can email them at: david@DavidsCorner.nl.
• Easy to get to by Tram 5, Metro 51, Bus 354, and Bus 62, getting off at Van Boshuizenstraat stop.
• Hacarmel is a glatt kosher Israeli-Jewish gourmet restaurant.
• They are known for their delicious grilled meat and fish dishes, but you can also choose from a wide range of vegetarian dishes.
• In Hacarmel you can also enjoy tasty pita platters or soups.
• After your dinner you can enjoy one of their delicious desserts, including blintzes with parve ice cream, fresh fruit, coffee or tea.

column1:
19374,Meat Me Kosher,"

Israeli cuisine in the South Amsterdam.

column2: • Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!
• Have you been here before? Share your tips with us!
• Are you the owner? Claim your listing!
• This place is permanently closed.
• This place is permanently closed.
• Casual meat restaurant with seating available inside.
• Eat-in or takeaway.
• Quality food, decent portions.
• Hummus is amazing.
• To get there you can take Tram 5, Metro 51, Bus 354 or Bus 62, always get off in the Van Boshuizenstraat stop.

column1:
11163,Jacobs Koshere Catering,"

Company with many years of experience catering for tourists' requirements.

column2: • Jacobs opened in 1990 and since then has been catering for tourists and any Jewish event, including Friday evening and Shabbat meals.
• Preparation of meals for groups and individuals who visit the Netherlands, especially during the summer months.
• If necessary, meals can be delivered to hotels in and around Amsterdam, in time for Shabbat or weekday meals.
• They will also endevour to deliver meals further beyond the Amsterdam region, where necessary.
• The meals are delivered on sealed disposable plates.
• Jacobs also offers takeaway products, such as: chulent, chopped liver, roasted chicken, sausage roll, chicken ragout, meat and chicken croquettes, meatball’s, lasagne, and more.
• You can email them at: info@jacobskosjerecatering.nl or call their mobile +31-618-085315.

column1:
12306,Fröhlich Bakery,"

Traditional bakery with takeaway services. Seating available.

column2: • Dairy.

• Fröhlich preserves the atmosphere of peaceful cafes in Pest.  Apart from the excellent, delicious cookies and a cup of coffee, the business meetings and constant exchanges between the crowd, make it happen.
• Their menu is diverse and constantly renewable.
• Casual environment, family and group friendly, good for solo dining.
• Located 1.5 miles west of downtown Budapest.
• Heschcher.

column1: ",,,,,,,,Bakery,,"Budapest, Dob u. 22, 1072 Hungary",Europe,Hungary,,,,,moderate,47.4983333,19.0611993,Rabbi Slomó Köves Rabbinate of the EMIH,,+36 1 266 1733,http://www.frohlich.hu/,,https://www.facebook.com/Frhlich-Cukrszda-209377082453485/,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,10/10/2018,,,,,

11064,Tel Aviv Cafe,"

Tasty food and friendly staff.

column2: • Restaurant selling light meals, bread, pizza and milk products.
• Tasty breakfast omelet, sandwiches, cakes and pastries.
• Lovely service with friendly staff.
• Free wifi and seating available inside.
• Catering services available.
• Check their Facebook page for further details.
• This place is permanently closed.

column1:
11059,Frohlich Cukrászda,"

60-year-old cafe keeping its nostalgic coffee house atmosphere.

column2: • Classy 60-year-old cafe with amazing menu.
• The Fröhlich Confectionery is a true Kosher delicacy in Hungary, selling delicious flódni, chanukkai donut, Purim Haman’s ears, and other Jewish pastries.
• Check their Facebook page for more details.

11069,Hanna,"

Well-known restaurant with amazing meals at affordable prices.

column2: • Great restaurant with reasonable prices.
• The hechsher is overseen by Rabbi Shmuel Eliezer Stern, and given by Rabbi Menachem Meir Hakohen Adler and Rabbi Avraham Chaim Meir Gestettner, all from Bnei Beraq.
• Meals for Shabbat need to be paid in advance. Check their Shabbos dinner and lunch menu here.
• Catering services available, click here for more details.
