11076,Carmel Restaurant,"

Great restaurant mixing Hungarian and Jewish tastes in every meal.

column2: • Great restaurant with almost 30 years of history. Glatt meat.
• On the menu you can find the mix of traditional Hungarian and Jewish tastes and you can also choose from Israeli salads or other specialities as well.
• Check their Facebook page for more information.
• Their menu is varied and delicious.
• Shabbat dinner and lunch available for pre-booked guests.
• You can email them at: carmel@carmel.hu.

column2: • This place is permanently closed.

column1:
10534,Restaurant Holbeinhof,"

Friendly staff serving delicious meals in a retirement centre.

column2: • Restaurant inside a retirement centre in the heart of the Bachletten-Holbein district.
• People who live in the Holbeinhof itself or in the vicinity, young and older visitors, passers-by and employees meet here often.
• Besides coffee, refreshments and patisserie, they serve delicious fish dishes and vegetarian meals daily.
• Takeaway and catering services available.
• For reservations call:  061 270 68 10.

column1:
10484,EMS Les Marronniers,"

Friendly staff serving delicious meals in a retirement home.

column2: • Restaurant and bakery with catering services inside a retirement home.
• If you wish to organise a conference, a seminar, a wedding, an anniversary, a Bar or Bat-Mitzva, you can rent their new multipurpose room Maryse and Philippe Nordmann.
• The kitchen is subject to the strict rules of the Kashrut under the supervision of the Chief Rabbi of the Israelite Community of Geneva, Itzhak Dayan.
• All dishes are made in the EMS Les Marronniers with fresh and premium produce.
• Delicious hallots craft and Ts donuts of Hanukkah.
• You can reserve your meal of Shabbos or your meal of the week by calling them or by email: reception@marroniers.ch.

column1: ",,,,https://www.google.com/maps/uv?pb=!1s0x478c64d071308bbb%3A0xf6ebe30af26c23cf!3m1!7e115!4shttps%3A%2F%2Flh5.googleusercontent.com%2Fp%2FAF1QipNGh5HbU1GX29AbzEVToZvBu842cJ5uK1yZvngV%3Dw90-h160-k-no!5sEMS%20Les%20Marronniers%20-%20Google%20Search!15sCgIgAQ&imagekey=!1e10!2sAF1QipObdmWvlMV-6ggLJij4GOQ0Ixcx12_d5dfDgRm2&hl=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjUoJLC4aL0AhUonGoFHZbCD40Qoip6BAhZEAM&cshid=1637267800785470,,,,"Bakery,Restaurant,Catering ","Meat,Pareve","Chemin de la Bessonnette 9, 1224 Chêne-Bougeries, Switzerland",Europe,Switzerland,,,,,moderate,46.1961134,6.1889318,Chief Rabbi of the Israelite Community of Geneva,https://www.comisra.ch/en/casher/,+41 22 344 87 60,http://www.marronniers.ch/,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,8/7/2018,30/1/2020,,,,

10419,Fein & Schein,"

Modern restaurant with high quality Kosher meals.

column2: • Elegant restaurant with catering and takeaway services available.
• It is a modern and pleasant ambience where you can enjoy fresh and homemade Kosher food.
• Get to know the Israeli / Ashkenazi cuisine or enjoy typical Swiss dishes or vegan menus.
• The desired dishes are freshly prepared on-site in accordance with religious specifications.
• You can contact them by email here: fein-schein@hispeed.ch.
• Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!
• Have you been here before? Share your tips with us!
• Are you the owner? Claim your listing!

column2: <li>This place is permanently closed.

column1:
8765,Le Jardin,"

Fine dining under the canopy of an exquisite garden.

column2: • A restaurant with delicious specialities, from Châteaubriand steak, to lamb and the finest international cuisine.
• Kosher meals can be ordered directly to one of Geneva's hotels.
• Catering services available.
• Offers french and oriental cuisine.
• Whether it is for a business meeting, a moment of family sharing, dinner with friends, the entire team will strive to make this moment unique and memorable.
• You can also email them to restaurant@comisra.ch.

column1:
10426,Babi's Bagel,"

Bagels, delicious spreads, flavourful soups, and even fresh salads, all in one place.

column2: • Vegetarian-friendly and dairy restaurant specialising in authentic American bagels, delicious spreads, flavourful soups, and even fresh salads.
• Whether you're looking to grab a quick bite, or enjoy the company of friends, Babi's Bagel offers a warm, pleasant atmosphere overlooking the breathtaking Klopstockwiese Park.
• Excellent service and delicious food.
• Catering services available.
• You can contact them by email: info@koscherbagel.ch.

column1: ",,,,https://scontent-dfw5-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t31.18172-8/19466411_1321966707921079_5622118429239062217_o.jpg?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=9267fe&_nc_ohc=80vu8a_sC6kAX_Xnjcs&tn=8xwR0EZvVxQK3iol&_nc_ht=scontent-dfw5-1.xx&oh=1bd59376b763d3d0de7d4efa3593b67f&oe=61BDCC40 https://scontent-dfw5-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/180961174_3801078083343250_6483665787238933150_n.jpg?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=8bfeb9&_nc_ohc=XMRhPy0deRkAX-CXflJ&_nc_ht=scontent-dfw5-1.xx&oh=88067308d8ffabca4babf47dd7db5e41&oe=61BCA3CB,,,,"Catering ,Restaurant","Dairy (Cholov Stam),Pareve","Bederstrasse 102 8002 Zurich, Switzerland",Europe,Switzerland,,,,,moderate,47.3617416,8.5258785,"Agudas Achim Zurich, Harav Shaul Breish",https://www.chabadswitzerland.com/templates/articlecco_cdo/aid/274103/jewish/Jewish-Tourist-Info-for-Zurich.htm,+41 43 222 46 59,https://www.babisbagel.com/home,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,9/7/2018,30/1/2020,,,,

10479,Ketori Restaurant,"

Kosher Japanese restaurant in the heart of Geneva.

column2: • Kosher sushi bar in Geneva. Parve.
• Great service with friendly staff.
• Menu available only in French, click here.

column1:
10405,Ma'adan Bakery,"

The only Jewish bakery in Switzerland.

column2: • Offers an assortment of Kosher breads, baked goods, cakes and pastries.
• Twelve people work daily to provide fresh and tasty bread and delicious sweets every day to the locals, as well as the general population and various shops.
• The purity of the food is meticulously respected in the Ma'adan Bakery. What can not be produced is strictly controlled under Jewish supervision.
• Orders online, catering, and deliveries available.
• This place is permanently closed.

column1:
10460,Restaurant of the Community Center - Lausanne,"

Friendly staff and quality food in the restaurant inside the Jewish Community Center.

column2: • Restaurant serving a daily menu or à la carte meal each day from Monday to Friday at noon, without reservations.
•  On request, the restaurant can open in the evening or at any other time (minimum 10 people).
• Seating available inside and outside.
• The restaurant also offers a catering on or off the premises (possibility for delivery).
• You can contact them by email: centre@cilv.ch.

18792,Bruster's Real Ice Cream-Sandy Springs,"

Real Ice Cream.

column2: • Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!
• Have you been here before? Share your tips with us!
• Are you the owner? Claim your listing!

8669,Fuego Mundo,"

Casual restaurant with seating available outside and inside.

column2: • Meat restaurant, South American cuisine.
• A healthy taste of Latin America...wood-fire grill, gluten-free, dairy-free, hormone-free, grass fed beef, vegetarian-friendly.
• Fuego Mundo offers prepared kosher items for sale in Atlanta’s Hartsfield-Jackson Airport (ATL) at kiosks in Concourse A.
• For information on their lunch menu ( Mon – Fri: 11 am to 3 pm), click here.
• For information on their dinner menu, click here.
• Located in The Prado Mall, 12 miles north of Downtown Atlanta.
• Heschcher.

8691,A healthy touch Café,"

Breakfast, lunch and dinner place at the Marcus Jewish Community Center of Atlanta.

column2: • Dairy Cholov Stam. Glatt meat restaurant.
• This restaurant is located in the Marcus Jewish Community Center of Atlanta.
• You can visit A Healthy Touch Café at Zaban Park in the Zaban-Blank building.
<li>Summer hours:
• For information on their menu, click here.
• A Healthy Touch Café will also offer prepared foods to go! Frozen items and Shabbat dinner.

column1: ",,,,,,,,Restaurant,"Meat,Dairy (Cholov Stam)","5342 Tilly Mill Rd, Atlanta, GA 30338, USA",North America,USA,,Georgia,,,moderate,33.9459120,-84.3048911,Atlanta Kosher,http://kosheratlanta.org/,+1 678.812.3985,https://www.atlantajcc.org/interior-pages/about-the-mjcca-a-healthy-touch-cafe/,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,4/7/2018,21/1/2021,,,,

column2: • Dairy and Parve baked goods, and candy. Not character Yisroel.
• This is one of several retail stores where cookies are baked the ""old fashioned"" way and everything is made from scratch.
• Located in Perimeter Place, 14 miles northeast of Downtown Atlanta.
• For information on the different cookies, click here.
• All of Ali's Cookies products are certified Kosher under the Orthodox supervision of the Atlanta Kashruth Commission (AKC).
• Products are either dairy or non-dairy made on dairy equipment (DE). Products are Kosher for year-round use, excluding Passover.

• This is one of several retail stores where cookies are baked the ""old fashioned"" way and everything is made from scratch.
• Located in Emory Village, 6 miles northeast of Downtown Atlanta.
• For information on the different cookies, click here.

• Products are either dairy or non-dairy made on dairy equipment (DE). Products are Kosher for year-round use, excluding Passover.

10513,The Kosher Gourmet,"

Butcher, deli with takeaway services available.

column2: • Full-service Glatt Kosher catering and takeaway.
• At this place you can find quality meats, dairy products, and dry goods.
• Serving since 1983.
• You can pick up a deli sandwich for lunch on the go, or call in an order ahead of time and they'll make dinner for you.
• The Kosher Gourmet has a combination of different and varied types of raw and prepared foods.
• Located at Briar Vista, 7 miles northeast of Downtown Atlanta.
• Executive menu.
• Teudah.

column2: • Meat restaurant.
• Caffe Eden's cuisine and meals are supervised constantly at the restaurant.
• The menu consists of classic turnover, meatballs, burgers, New York burger, meat pita and crispy lahmacun.
• On Wednesday, special chicken doner day is offered to those who prefer chicken.
• Caffe Eden, specialities are liver and lamb dumplings presented only on special occasions.
• Offers freshly prepared varieties to takeaway.
• Caffe Eden also provides delivery service to hotels in Bebek, Gayrettepe, Beşiktaş, Arnavutköy, Kuruçeşme, Ulus, and Etiler.
• They consider when it is not best to leave your hotel, so the delivery service is scheduled based on this customs.
• A different feature of the Caffe Eden is that between 15.00 and 17.30 hours except for Sunday, a 20% discount is applied to the menu items.

• Security in the Jewish community of Istanbul is very tight.  Be prepared to be questioned or to complete forms, or by giving details and references to your address in Turkey and the dates and times you wish to visit.
• Please call for reservations and opening hours information at given phone number.

Kosher certified hospital cafe and restaurant.

column2: • Meat. Pareve.
• This is the hospital's cafe.
• The Chief Rabbinate of Turkey and The Turkish Jewish community choose and authorise this institution for eating kosher in Istanbul.
• Serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, coffee, and drinks.

• Security in the Jewish community of Istanbul is very tight.  Be prepared to be questioned or to complete forms, or by giving details and references to your address in Turkey and the dates and times you wish to visit.

9226,La Casa Catering ( Sisli Kosher Restaurant ),"

Glatt meat restaurant.

column2: • Glatt Meat restaurant.
• Serves lunch every day, except for Saturdays, in the outbuilding of Şişli synagogue.  Offers a daily special, there are Iskender and doner kebab options on Sundays.

• Security in the Jewish community of Istanbul is very tight.  Be prepared to be questioned or to complete forms, or by giving details and references to your address in Turkey and the dates and times you wish to visit.
• Please call for information and opening hours at given phone number.

13185,Kosher Delight Glatt Kosher Catering and Restaurants - Krakow,"

Only Glatt Kosher restaurants in Poland.

column2: • Glatt Kosher cuisine. Certified by Badatz Chasam Sofer, headed by Rabbi Dov Landau.

• Nearly seven decades after the demise of Polish Jewry, Poland has once again become a key destination for Jews seeking to explore the rich Jewish heritage of a country where Jews thrived for over 1,000 years.
• In response to the growing demand for Glatt Kosher quality foods, the Etziony family in 2009 opened Kosher Delight in Poland.
• Full-service catering and restaurant operation able to respond to the needs of individual travellers as well as large groups.
• All of the food in the facility is prepared by professional chefs who are experienced in preparing diverse menus, including European and Israeli (Mediterranean) cuisine.
• The chefs cook and bake meals daily as per the specifications of groups and individual tourists.
• All Kosher Delight prepared foods that are sent to hotels and other locations are double sealed and stamped with our certification so that they may be warmed in an oven or microwave.
• The meals can be packaged in various sizes of one or three portions or customised to meet the request of customers.
• Krakow: In this historic city, Kosher Delight's large dining hall is located in the Kazimierz Jewish Quarter, at 18 Kupa Street near the Chabad House and Chabad Center.
• The Krakow location can accommodate up to 150 guests. In addition to their own dining facility, Kosher Delight provides catering in other locations, including area hotels.
• In the Hotel Wilga on 16 Przedwiośnie Street, they have their own kitchen under hashgacha. Kosher Delight also provides glatt Kosher meals to tourists staying in the hotels in the area.

• Auschwitz: To accommodate the many groups who visit the city of Oswiecim, site of the infamous death camp, Kosher Delight provides Kosher meals in hotel Dialog Centrum, which is adjacent to the Holocaust museum.

• Lublin: A visit to the city of Lublin and its famed restored Yeshivas Chachmei Lublin is always an inspiration. With advanced arrangements, Kosher Delight can arrange to deliver kosher meals to the local hotels or to the yeshiva itself for groups.
• They are also located in Lodz and Warsaw.
• Teudah.

column1:
13203,Kosher Delight Glatt Kosher Catering and Restaurants - Lodz,"

Only Glatt Kosher restaurants in Poland.

column2: • Glatt Kosher cuisine. Certified by Badatz Chasam Sofer, headed by Rabbi Dov Landau.

• Nearly seven decades after the demise of Polish Jewry, Poland has once again become a key destination for Jews seeking to explore the rich Jewish heritage of a country where Jews thrived for over 1,000 years.
• In response to the growing demand for Glatt Kosher quality foods, the Etziony family in 2009 opened Kosher Delight in Poland.
• Full-service catering and restaurant operation able to respond to the needs of individual travellers as well as large groups.
• All of the food in the facility is prepared by professional chefs who are experienced in preparing diverse menus, including European and Israeli (Mediterranean) cuisine.
• The chefs cook and bake meals daily as per the specifications of groups and individual tourists.
• All Kosher Delight prepared foods that are sent to hotels and other locations are double sealed and stamped with our certification so that they may be warmed in an oven or microwave.
• The meals can be packaged in various sizes of one or three portions or customised to meet the request of customers.

• Kosher Delight's main commissary is in the city of Lodz. In addition, the facility features three large dining rooms which can accommodate up to 250 people. The Kosher Delight food complex is located next to the Linat Orchim Hotel (with approximately 100 beds).

• Auschwitz: To accommodate the many groups who visit the city of Oswiecim, site of the infamous death camp, Kosher Delight provides Kosher meals in hotel Dialog Centrum, which is adjacent to the Holocaust museum.

• A visit to the city of Lublin and its famed restored Yeshivas Chachmei Lublin is always an inspiration. With advanced arrangements, Kosher Delight can arrange to deliver kosher meals to the local hotels or to the yeshiva itself for groups.
• They are also located in Warsaw and Krakow.
• Teudah.

column1: Cafe, Restaurant and Catering in Warsaw, Poland.

column2: • Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!
• Have you been here before? Share your tips with us!
• Are you the owner? Claim your listing!

column1:
13250,The Nosh,"

Casual and friendly Cafe. Fast service and nice menu.

column2: • Dairy.

• The Nosh, a Kosher Cafe is the first Kosher eatery in Tarnow in some seventy years. Thousands of Jewish tourists visit Tarnow every year as this was, in many ways, a cradle of Jewish life in Poland.
• Those who maintain a Kosher diet had nowhere to dine while in Tarnow, until now. Groups who did stay in Tarnow had to bring Kosher food from Krakow or Warsaw, a tiresome and expensive effort.
• The Nosh – a Kosher Cafe, has been established to address this issue but most certainly not exclusively for Jewish tourists.
• The first reference to Jewish life in Tarnow dates back to the mid-1400’s. Jewish immigrants were welcomed and protected by various kings and lived side by side with their Christian neighbours.

• The building that houses the “Nosh” was, during WWII, the outside wall of the Jewish Ghetto, established by the Nazis. The cellars and attics hid many Jewish families, protected all too often by their Christian neighbours.
• Take a short walk around the corner to see the “Menorah Gates”, built by the original Jewish owner. When closed, they create a welcoming site of Jewish life in Tarnow.
• Modern and contemporary, casual environment. Family friendly.
• Their menu evolves around Jewish dishes, inspired by their grandmothers of European descent and especially from Poland and Hungary. Combined with modern day dishes from Israel and North America.
• Located in downtown Tarnow.
• 360 View.

column1:
13197,Kosher Delight Glatt Kosher Catering and Restaurants - Warsaw,"

Only Glatt Kosher restaurants in Poland.

column2: • Glatt Kosher cuisine. Certified by Badatz Chasam Sofer, headed by Rabbi Dov Landau.

• Nearly seven decades after the demise of Polish Jewry, Poland has once again become a key destination for Jews seeking to explore the rich Jewish heritage of a country where Jews thrived for over 1,000 years.
• In response to the growing demand for Glatt Kosher quality foods, the Etziony family in 2009 opened Kosher Delight in Poland.
• Full-service catering and restaurant operation able to respond to the needs of individual travellers as well as large groups.
• All of the food in the facility is prepared by professional chefs who are experienced in preparing diverse menus, including European and Israeli (Mediterranean) cuisine.
• The chefs cook and bake meals daily as per the specifications of groups and individual tourists.
• All Kosher Delight prepared foods that are sent to hotels and other locations are double sealed and stamped with our certification so that they may be warmed in an oven or microwave.
• The meals can be packaged in various sizes of one or three portions or customised to meet the request of customers.

• Warsaw: Kosher Delight's dining facility in the Polish capital is located in the Jewish Community Center at 2 Grzybowska Street, adjacent to the famed Nozyk synagogue. With a capacity of 180 guests, the facility serves as a huge restaurant in season or an appropriate venue for large groups.
• In addition, Kosher Delight can also provide catering services in other dining rooms in the area. It provides kosher catering for all hotels in Warsaw.

• Auschwitz: To accommodate the many groups who visit the city of Oswiecim, site of the infamous death camp, Kosher Delight provides Kosher meals in hotel Dialog Centrum, which is adjacent to the Holocaust museum.

• Lublin: A visit to the city of Lublin and its famed restored Yeshivas Chachmei Lublin is always an inspiration. With advanced arrangements, Kosher Delight can arrange to deliver kosher meals to the local hotels or to the yeshiva itself for groups.
• They are also located in Lodz and Krakow.
• Teudah.

14425,COCA - Typical Sicilian Ice Cream,"

Small place known for the great quality of the product and good prices.

column2: • If you visit Poland, you most visit COCA; this place isn't a Kosher restaurant, but they sell the best Kosher certified ice cream.
• Their most popular ice creams flavours are chocolate, grapefruit and pistachio.
• Mainly open in Spring and Summer.
• Approved by the Chief Rabbi of Poland.

column1:
19035,Bekef Restaurant,"

Israeli kosher / kosher cuisine in the heart of Warsaw.

column2: • You will find well-known and popular Mediterranean dishes, so popular in Israel.
• They speak Polish, Hebrew and English.

14408,Bagel Shop - Beigelių krautuvėlė,"

Serves breakfast, lunch and coffee.

column2: • Bagel shop located on the 1st floor of the Lithuanian Jewish community.
• The bagel shop serves Bagel Lox, bagels with several sauces, among the most requested are eggplant katsilim sauce, hummus and also come with a variety of cheese and olives.
• Their visitors describe Bagel Shop as a nice place, and characterized to have a very kind waitstaff.
• The place has a lot of books to delight their customers while they wait (a little time) for their fresh bagels.

column1:
11459,The Greys Ave Deli,"

Auckland’s largest stockist of Kosher food and only Kosher cafe.

column2: • Greys Ave Deli established in 2008 as the first Kosher café / deli in New Zealand.
• The deli offers a wide range of Kosher speciality goods from all over the world including meat, chicken, cheese, and fresh Challot every Friday.

• They also supply airline meals to major airlines that fly out of New Zealand and other ports in the Pacific, but they are not necessarily strictly Kosher. Additionally they advise you to contact your airline first as they are the ones who will make the necessary arrangements.
• You can contact them by email at shop@ahc.org.nz or the kitchen calling 09 777 7423 or emailing them at greysavedeli@ahc.org.nz.

9564,Rachel’s Café,"

Great place to enjoy Kosher lunch inside or outside.

column2: • Rachel’s Café is the only full-time Kosher lunch spot in the metropolitan area (supervised by the Vaad Hakashruth of Kansas City).
• Located inside Village Shalom, Rachel’s is open to the public, offering the perfect place to grab a casual lunch with friends or family.
• Rachel's Café provides comfortable indoor seating as well as a shaded patio area to enjoy your meal outdoors.

Casual restaurant, burgers in menu, seating inside, great for families.

column2: • Glatt Kosher restaurant.
• Maple Grill is renowned for its fresh and healthy dishes and fabulous, friendly service.
• Specialising in Kosher and modern West Coast cuisine, including authentic dishes served in an intimate and slick ambience.
• Exclusive parties are perfect for up to 80 guests in location. This includes a great venue, fantastic food, bar service and various entertainment options.
• Serving burgers & Mediterranean-inspired entrees in contemporary surroundings. For information on their restaurant menu, click here.
• Shabbat takeaway.
• Holiday takeaway.
• Located 2 miles southwest of downtown Vancouver.
• BCK Kosher Hechsher.

9637,Nava Creative Kosher Cuisine,"

Cafe at the JCC Vancouver.

column2: •  Dairy and Pareve, not Cholov Yisroel.
• Takeaway  & delivery – Private parties, Shabbat, holidays, and lifecycle events.
•  Visitors to BC – Visiting Vancouver, Whistler & Victoria? Order Kosher meals to be delivered directly to your hotel or tour company.
• Café serving vegetarian breakfast, lunch, and snacks. Weekly features include Mexican Day, Thai Day, and Israeli Day.
• Nava Cafe is conveniently located in the lobby of the Jewish Community Centre. Great spot to re-energize after your workout, relax during your lunch break, and treat your kids after school.
• Their menu consist of: salads, sandwiches, light meals, cheese pizza, veggie pizza, sushi, salmon with rice and steamed vegetables, daily soup & chili.
• For the sweet tooth: brownies, fruit & nut clusters, muffins, cookies, assortment of Cakes and pastries.
• They also offer daily chef specials throughout the week such as Shakshuka and Imam Bayildi.
• For more information on their menus, click here.
• The JCC is located 4 miles south of downtown Vancouver.
• BCK Kosher Hechsher.

9628,Delicatessen Omnitsky Kosher BC,"

Grocery store, deli, and restaurant.

column2: <li style=""list-style-type: none;"">
• Grocery store, Glatt Kosher restaurant, and deli. This place is an all-in-one.
• The restaurant offers casual dining with a focus on healthy ingredients including gluten-free hot dogs, smoked meats, as well as freshly made sides and salads.
• The store carries a large selection of grocery and packaged goods.

• Omnitsky Kosher was founded in the early 1900s on Selkirk Avenue, in Winnipeg, Manitoba. Louie Omnitsky, the original owner, brought from Europe traditional recipes to serve the vibrant Jewish community of Winnipeg. Omnitsky Kosher then moved to British Columbia and has been established in Vancouver since 1997.
• Many of the original recipes are still used. The corned beef, pastrami, and smoked meats are still made individually by hand.
• Omnitsky Kosher has been chosen as one of the best Kosher restaurants in Vancouver.
• Located 4 miles south of downtown Vancouver.
• For information on the restaurant menu, click here.
• BCK Kosher Hechsher.

9659,Garden City Bakery,"

Traditional bakery in Richmond BC, Canada.

column2: • Pareve.
• This place is a traditional neighbourhood bakery, located in Richmond BC, Canada.
• Offers all kinds of baked goods and treats.
• BCK Kosher Hechsher.

9678,Carriage House Inn / Bakery / Calgary 3.5 star,"

3.5 star hotel with a Kosher certified Cholov Stam Bakery

column2: • 3.5 star hotel.
• This hotel offers an in-house bakery with freshly baked Kosher-certified baked goods and other treats. You can stop in any time for a freshly-baked snack - also available for takeaway.
• From elaborate, custom wedding cakes, to warm challah bread; a dedicated pastry team will create to compliment any occasion.
• The Carriage House Inn contains several restaurants which are NOT kosher. Only the Kosher Kitchen & Kosher Bakery items are under the Alberta Kosher hechsher. Look for the ABK logo.
• AB Kosher Hechsher.
<li>The Carriage House Inn offers:
• 157 smoke-free guestrooms.
• 2 restaurants and 2 bars/lounges.
• Outdoor pool.
• Ski storage.
• Fitness centre.
• Massage/treatment rooms.
• 24-hour business centre.
• 24-hour front desk.
• Air conditioning.
• Daily housekeeping.
• Computer station.
• Lobby fireplace.
• Free buffet breakfast, wifi, and parking.
• Located 6 miles south of downtown Calgary, Canada.

column2: • This place is the Kosher food Kiosk in the JCC Calgary.
• Karen's Café is not cholov yisroel and not necessarily pas yisroel. The tuna and salmon provided are OU certified (but not necessarily bishul yisroel).
• Located 7 miles south of downtown Calgary.

12564,Bliss Bake Goods,"

Specialises in being Kosher, dairy and nut free.

column2: • Pareve.
• Only dairy and nut free Kosher bakery.
• They also specialise in vegan options.
• Traditional bakery, no seating available.
• Takeaway vegan meals available.
• You can check their list of products here.
• Located 4 miles west of downtown Edmonton.
• Heschcher.

Comfot food, good for family and friends.

column2: • Dairy. Cholov Yisroel.
• West Edmonton Mall's Cafe Levi features dishes such as fresh salads, signature sandwiches, and handcrafted pizza.
• Also offering vegetarian, or gluten-free options.
• Eat in or takeaway.
• Seating available outside, contemporary decoration, casual and family friendly.
• Good for solo dining.
• Check their menu here.
• Located on the second level on Europa Boulevard, 7 miles west of downtown Edmonton.
• Heschcher.

9742,Hyman's Seafood,"

Hyman's Seafood is a casual, local family owned non-Kosher-restaurant offering a Glatt Kosher menu by Chabad

column2: • This place is an exceptional Non-Kosher restaurant that offers pre-prepared Glatt Kosher (double wrapped) meals for the local Chabad.
• 100% of the proceeds are donated directly to the Chabad.
• For information on the Kosher menu, click here.
• Hyman's have been at the same location for over 126 years. Starting out as a wholesale dry goods store then changing to Hyman's Seafood in 1987.
• Great decoration, and excellent environment. They have a wide variety of Kosher options and can prepare an assortment of deli platters to be picked up for a shiva home.
• Located in Charleston, 55 miles east of I-95, exit 86A.

9936,"Manhattan Pizza; Pasta, Subs & Pizza","

Pizza shop with home-made pasta dishes, subways sandwiches and salads - Chalav Israel

column2: • All dairy products are Cholov Yisroel.
• Breads and other wheat products are Pas Yisroel and prepared from scratch.
• Best ingredients to life: Pizza and family.
• Feast on some of their most popular dishes like the Margherita Pizza, Eggplant Parmesan, the Rock Island Grinder Sub, and the ever-famous Fettuccini Alfredo!
• Under Supervition of Vaad of Phoenix

column1: ",,,,https://www.google.com/maps/uv?pb=!1s0x872b12bc1b875c2b%3A0x78073049eae744fb!3m1!7e115!4shttps%3A%2F%2Flh5.googleusercontent.com%2Fp%2FAF1QipM0xvIkbQBS_FhbQ6jjhrmZ9vjPbtK_sbzO7a4Q%3Dw120-h160-k-no!5sManhattan%20Pizza%3B%20Pasta%2C%20Subs%20and%3B%20Pizza%205224%20N%207th%20St%2C%20Phoenix%2C%20AZ%2085014%20-%20Google%20Search!15sCgIgAQ&imagekey=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiGFgfqlTXVFFDJexDVvd5908cuJa1PBiE4Fnt&hl=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiOkcWhtKD0AhXmRTABHb-7C10Qoip6BAhjEAM,,,,Pizzeria,Dairy(Cholov Yisroel),"5224 N 7th St, Phoenix, AZ 85014",North America,USA,,Arizona,,,moderate,33.5139433,-112.0652541,Vaad of Phoenix,http://www.kosherphoenix.org/,(602) 248-8086,http://manhattanpizzeria.com/,,https://www.facebook.com/manhattanpizzaandsubs/,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,17/7/2018,1/9/2020,,,,

9761,Segal's Oasis Grill & Kosher Foods,"

The Oasis Grill at Segal's is a meat restaurant where wine, beer and spirits are served in a luxurious bar.

column2: • The only Kosher market, butcher and restaurant in Phoenix for many decades.

• They have expanded their dining room, added a full sized bar, feature live music, a hooka bar, and are now nearly finished adding a large outdoor patio, so their guests will be able to soon enjoy the best of sunny Phoenix, Arizona’s famous warm weather and breath-taking sunsets.
• Under Supervision of the Phoenix Vaad HaKashrut
• Did we miss anything? Let us know in the comments below!
• Have you been here before? Share your tips with us!

column2: • 613 Grill offers top of the line catering for all ocassions.
• You can check 613 Grill's menu here and here.
• Middle-Eastern cuisine available in 613 Grill.
• 613 Grill is able to help you with office parties, Bar/Bat Mitzvah, weddings, Shabbat and birthdays.
• Under Supervision of the Phoenix Vaad HaKashrut
• Glatt restaurant offering Bukharian cuisine.
• A small restaurant in north Phoenix Arizona with friendly staff.
• Bukharian cuisine is a distant Kosher cuisine of the former central Asian State Emirate of Bukhara (now Uzbekistan).
• Cafe Chenar serves foods like grilled kababs, meat and potato stuffed pies, salads, and soups that have Russian, Muslim, Uzbek and Korean influences.
• The atmosphere is cozy but rich looking. (Source)
• Family friendly, good for couples or solo dining.
• Located 18 miles north of downtown Phoenix.
• Heschcher.

9943,La Bella Pizza,"

Great pizzeria with a varied menu - Chalav Israel

column2: • Pas Israel. Chalav Israel.
• Fresh and healthy food. All made possible by their flavour, innovation and, most importantly, by keeping a Kosher kitchen.
• Catering and private parties available.
• The pizza is delicious! You will love the Pesto Margarita pizza.
• Certified by Vaad of Phoenix

9749,Kitchen 18,"

Their food is fresh, healthy, and carefully prepared for your wellness and peace of mind.

column2: • At Kitchen 18 the food is prepared according to Glatt Kosher standards.
• Their meats are 100% Kosher, all natural and grass-fed, the kitchen is dairy free.
• Breads and pastries are prepared from scratch.

9735,B.B. Jacob Food Service,"

Takeaway meals in Savannah, Georgia.

column2: • Glatt meat. Takeaway meals only.
• Individual meals are prepared daily and sandwiches are served on a challah roll.
• All orders include a pickle spear, choice of either homemade cole slaw or potato salad.
• Their goal is to provide you fresh food made same day. To do this, they ask you to place your order between 9 am and 2 pm on the given day.
• Orders can be placed by:

column1: 1) Adding to your shopping cart and proceeding through the checkout process here. Click on a product, add to cart.

column2: • Pick up of sandwiches and daily meals can be made one hour after ordering. Pick up of Shabbos/Yom Tov meals and sides is prior to 1:00 pm Erev Shabbos or Yom Tov.
• Location of pick up is at the kitchen of the BB Jacob Synagogue. Click here for map.
• For information on the individual meals, click here.
• Located in Savannah, Georgia, 11 miles east of I-95. Exit 99.

9779,"Geliberman´s Deli & Grille Kosher Mart, Restaurant","

Rabbi-supervised mart, bread, wine & fresh meat, plus a restaurant with self-serve lunches.

column2: • Glatt Kosher restaurant.
• Gleiberman's Kosher Mart and Restaurant is your one-stop Glatt Kosher food provider in Charlotte, North Carolina.
• They have a complete Glatt Kosher grocery store with a Glatt Kosher deli and Take Home Food Department as well as a Glatt Kosher Fresh Meat Department.
• The Restaurant is self-serve, Sunday through Friday, and dinner is full service on Sunday only.
• For information on their menu, click here.
• Located 8 miles southeast of Charlotte, North Carolina.
• Congregation Ohr HaTorah - Chabad.

column2: • This restaurant is permanently closed.

column1:
9872,Jerusalem Grill,"

Grocery store and restaurant with the Cholov Yisreal pizza shop next door.

column2: • Glatt Kosher meat.
<li>

column1: This place is a grocery store and also a restaurant. They offer Cholov Yisroel pizza shop next door.

column2: <li>

column1: For over 12 years, Jerusalem Grill and Grocery of Greater Daytona Beach has been the Kosher restaurant of choice for residents and visitors in the towns of Ormond Beach, Daytona Beach, Jacksonville, Orlando, Kissimmee, and Palm Coast. it is also a Kosher Market.

column2: <li>

column1: Centrally located in Ormond Beach, just minutes from 'The 95', with only a few minutes to the beach as well! Jerusalem Grill Grocery and Pizza shop welcome you to a delicious and enjoyable feast.

column2: • Jerusalem Grill Glatt Kosher Resturant serves the finest authentic Kosher Mediterranean and Israeli cuisines.
• They can also cater and host your events and celebrations. Jerusalem Grill provides takeaway and delivery services to most major hotels and Central Florida.
• For information on their different menus click: meat, dairy, and Shabbat.

• Glatt Kosher.
• Friendly and casual environment.
• Dine-in, deliveries and takeaways are available.
• They have three different menu offers: Gili's, business and dinner.
• For further information on their menus, click here.
• Located in downtown Jacksonville and only 1.5 miles from exit 353B  I-95.

9880,Sabra Café,"

Dairy Cholov Yisroel and Vegetarian restaurant and bakery

column2: • MOST (BUT NOT ALL) Dairy products are Cholov Yisroel & Pas Yisroel (all products are to be considered dairy).
• Sabra Cafe is a restaurant with many vegetarian options. Absolutely no meat or meat products are served, or even brought on the premises!
• Sabra Cafe offers catering and fresh homemade bakery!
• For information on their menu, click here.
• Located in Mandarin, 21 miles south of downtown Jacksonville, and 3 miles from Exit 337 I-95.
<li>

column1: Not everything is Cholov Yisroel.

9980,Max's Kosher Cafe,"

Casual and friendly burger restaurant.

column2: • Glatt Kosher Meat.
• In 1994 Max’s Kosher Café was created as a Kosher fast-food casual restaurant.
• The restaurant is very spacious and can accommodate large groups.
• The menu includes shawarma and falafel, hamburgers, deli sandwiches, fried chicken, soups and salads, and a great dinner menu.
• Max’s also operates in several venues including FedEx Field, Nationals Park, and even the National Mall.
• For information on their menu, click here.
• Located 9 miles north of downtown Washington DC, and 3 miles from exit 31 I-495 on your trip to Miami.

9963,Oh Mama Grill,"

Falafel, shawarma and kabob restaurant.

column2: • Glatt Kosher meat.
• Shawarma, falafel and kabob specialists.
• Small, casual and friendly falafel spot with eat-in and takeaway available.
• Seating available outside.

11283,Tov Pizza,"

Cholov Yisroel pizzeria. Eat in, deliveries and takeaways available.

column2: • ""The most famous pizzeria in Baltimore,"" Jeff Cohn from BaltimoreJewishlife.com.
• Cholov Yisroel dairy restaurant.
• Their menu features all different kinds of pizzas.
• Customers can order regular, gluten-free, 12 to 18-inch size pizzas, with an array of toppings.
• Casual and friendly environment, suitable for families.
• You can eat in, order a delivery or takeaway.
• For information on their menu, click here.
• Located 9 miles northwest of downtown Baltimore. 11 miles frp, from Exit 49, I-95.
• KOF K Certification.

10164,A la Karte,"

Restaurant with takeaway and deliveries available.

column2: • Glatt Kosher. There is a Mashgiach Temidi on premises during all meal preparation. This certificate is valid until December 31, 2018, and is renewable at that time.
• This place offers a boutique cuisine where you can shop speciality prepared foods either for takeaway or eat-in.
• For delivery and pick up policies, click here.
• Located in Philadelphia, 12 miles west of Turnpike taking exit 6 for I-276 toward Penn.

10197,Monster Yogurt,"

Some Kosher (Non-Cholov Yisroel) yoghurts are available.

column2: • Monster Yogurt ""Scary Tastes Good"", is the have-it-all yoghurt shop.
• Monster offers a variety of flavours and more than 70 toppings for their delicious yoghurt and sorbet.

• The yogurt is dairy but the sorbet is non-dairy made on dairy equipment and labeled DE. (Alert to Kosher consumers: There is no waiting period after eating meat when eating a DE product. The DE product must not be eaten on the same plate as meat but can be consumed immediately following the meat meal.)
• Please note: there is a party room that is not under Kosher supervision but arrangements can be made by the owner, Ava, to order Kosher pizza for your party and of course yoghurt for dessert.
• Dallas Kosher Certification

12719,Kosher Palate,"

BBQ, deli and groceries, all in one place.

column2: • Kosher Palate serves many needs: They offer full-service catering, grocery, BBQ, and deli.
• The grocery items include pre-checked produce, meat, and dairy products.
• There is a large variety of Kosher products, meats, and Cholov Yisroel dairy products.
• Casual environment, no seating available.
• Takeaways available.
• Located 14 miles north of downtown Dallas.
• Heschcher.

10399,Fino,"

Trusted as Dallas’ kosher dairy, vegetarian restaurant for 15 years. Cholov Yisroel.

column2: • Dairy Cholov Yisroel.
• Trusted as Dallas’ Kosher dairy, vegetarian restaurant for 15 years, Fino offers an array of Italian and American foods.
• They’re known for their pizza and famous fries as well as their robust restaurant and catering menus.
• Fino is under the rabbinical supervision of the VAAD Hakashrus of Dallas (Dallas Kosher DK).
• Catering services available.
• Their hard cheeses are Cholov Yisroel, and their “meat products” are soy based.
• Family owned.
• Dallas Kosher Certification

Dallas, TX 75248",North America,USA,,Texas,Dallas,,moderate,32.9783572,-96.7844833,VAAD Hakashrus of Dallas,https://www.dallaskosher.org/,'+1 (469) 899-6844,http://www.danelorest.com/,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,10/7/2018,1/1/2021,,,,

column2: • Oahu Kosher prepares meals in a kitchen supervised by Chef Yudi Weinbaum.
<li>

column1: Menu Availability:

column2: • Weekday Menu items are available to order for delivery on Monday through Thursday. All orders must be placed 72 hours prior.
• Shabbat Menu items are available to order for delivery on Wednesday through Friday. All orders must be placed 72 hours prior.
• Please note that they do not deliver to neighbouring islands on Saturday or Sunday due to Sabbath observance.

column1: Delivery to Neighbour Islands:

column2: • Delivery is available to Kona, Hilo, Maui (Kahului), and Kauai (Lihue) airports.

• In order to facilitate multiple-order deliveries, please enter your desired delivery date for each item added to your cart. You do not need to select a delivery time as orders will be available for pickup all day as described below.

• Orders will be available for pickup from Aloha Cargo at the airport selected. Orders will remain refrigerated and available for pickup on the date of delivery at your convenience from 6am-7pm. Click here for the address of Aloha Cargo at your local airport.

• For Multiple-Delivery Orders, please add delivery charges below to your cart for each separate delivery being requested. For single-delivery orders, delivery charges are selected upon checkout. Please note that this fee includes delivery to Honolulu airport and flight to the neighbor island.
• For information on the weekday menu, click here.
• For information on the Shabbat menu, click here.

10465,Bretzel Bakery,"

Not all products are Kosher, ask in store for a list. Cozy bakery & cafe with seating available inside.

column2: • Not all products are Kosher, ask in store for a list.
• Irish Pride bread and buns are Kosher pareve.
• Exception is  the soda bread. Bread with Omega 3 (eg Kids VITA) & Iced Logs, are not Kosher. Kingsmill and Sunblest bread are certified Kosher.
• This bakery has a very pleasant environment with a very nice decoration and style.
• Located at 1.5 miles south of downtown Dublin.

12253,Milk + Honey Kosher,"

Great restaurant, famous for their wraps and pizzas.

column2: • Dairy restaurant. Cholov Yisroel, Pas Yisroel, and Kemach Yoshon.
• Well-known for their bagels, wraps, salads, and pizzas.
• Catering, delivery and takeaway services available.
• OU certification.
• You can find them in Broadway too.

11631,West Side Wok,"

Chinese and Thai takeaway specialists.

column2: •  Chinese & Thai Glatt Kosher takeaway.
• This place was formerly known as Gan Asia, soon will reopen as West Side Wok.
• They offer a premier Asian Cuisine on the Upper West Side of Manhattan. In conjunction with Konata Sushi, serving Kosher Chinese, Thai, & Japanese in NYC.
• Takeaway and delivery speacialists.
• Located 4 miles north of the Empire State Building.

• Avrohom Marmorstein received Semikhah from Beth Medrash Govoha of Lakewood, New Jersey. He is a member of the National Council of Synagogue Rabbis of Agudath Yisrael. He is the author of Halachos of the Seder, Halachos of Purim, and Bartenura and co-author of Yad Yoledes.

12220,Mendy’s Grand Central,"

Located in Grand Central food court. Famous for their juicy corned beef and pastrami sandwiches.

column2: • Glatt Kosher delicatessen and restaurant serving the New York City area for over 25 years.
<li>Largest chain of Glatt Kosher restaurants in the country, known for perfecting the art of deli in this branch (located in the Grand Central food court) and in their other four locations:
• Mendy’s Crown Heights.
• Mendy’s Deli & Restaurant.
• Mendy’s Atrium.
• Mendy’s Rockefeller Center.
• Whether it's a business lunch, quick bite, or celebration, they are always ready to serve you.
• They offer takeaway, delivery and catering services. 15% OFF in your first online order.
• Try their juicy mouth watering hamburgers served with homemade fries. Make it a King David and beef it up with some freshly sliced hot corned beef.
• To organise an event with them, email at: mendysevents@gmail.com.
• Check their menu here.

12012,Chennai Garden,"

Kosher certified restaurant, but open on Shabbat.

column2: • Kosher Without Borders is designed to help you find Kosher food made to Orthodox standards anywhere on Earth.
• We also list non-Orthodox providers and closed establishments to clear up any doubts you might have, if you come across them while searching online.
• Indian vegetarian restaurant, specialising in Rava Dosai, Masala Dosai, Utappam served with best udipi style sambar and coconut chutney.
• Certified, but open on Shabbat.
• Deliveries available within 10 block radius.
• You can order online here.

column2: • Great restaurant known for their Kosher buffalo wings.
• Try their 12 different flavours for buffalo wings.
• Catering, takeaway and delivery services available.
• Check their menu and order online here.
• Follow them on Facebook to see any updates and offers.
• You can email them at: buffalo2go@gmail.com.

11649,B&H Dairy Kosher Restaurant,"

Certification is questionable. Open on Shabbat.

column2: • Non-Orthodox Rabbi certification.
• Kosher Supervision: Rabbi Andre Malek in 5724 11th Avenue, Brooklyn, New York 11219. Phone: (718) 314-5815.

• From their website: B&H Dairy is one of the oldest Kosher dairy lunch counters remaining in New York City. It was opened in 1938 by Abie Bergson and Sol Hausman (B&H) and the interior and menu have changed little since.
• Kosher Without Borders is designed to help you find Kosher food made to Orthodox standards anywhere on Earth.
• We also list non-Orthodox providers and closed establishments to clear up any doubts you might have, if you come across them while searching online.

column2: • Seasons is a Kosher supermarket that invites you to shop for a wide variety of gourmet Kosher foods available at their stores. Including online shopping and delivery
• They offer Kosher grocery and gourmet food, fresh meat and fish, deli, bakery, fresh fruits and vegetables, dairy, yoghurt, cheese, ice cream, and more.
<li>They have seven other locations:
• Lakewood.
• Baltimore.
• Lawrence Express.
• Lawrence.
• Queens.
• Clifton.
• Scarsdale.

12154,Village Crown,"

Kosher catering services available for Shabbat.

column2: • Village Crown is NYC's experienced casual Kosher catering company, offering fresh and abundant menu selections of breakfast pastries & bagels, sandwiches & salads, hot buffets & appetiser platters.
• A.K.A. Esprit Events.
• They also provide special menus for Shabbat, the Holidays, baby namings, Kiddush, for both private clients, synagogues, and corporations.
• You can email them at: info@villagecrown.com.

12014,Ahimsa Garden,"

Supervised by Orthodox Rabbi, but open on Shabbat. Consult your rabbi before eating here.

column2: • Kosher Without Borders is designed to help you find Kosher food made to Orthodox standards anywhere on Earth. We also list non-Orthodox providers and closed establishments to clear up any doubts you might have, if you come across them while searching online.
• Ahimsa is a place to be nourished by simply prepared vegan, vegetarian and Kosher food that comes from family recipes.
• Check their menu here.
• They are available on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.
• You can vist their other location in Thompson St.
• Email them at: ahimsagarden@gmail.com.
• Certified by Orthodox Rabbi, but open on Shabbat.

10550,Abaita,"

Kosher dairy eatery offering fish, pizza, pasta, and more.

column2: • Great restaurant offering a varied menu.
• ABAITA means in both North Italian dialect and Hebrew language “the home.”
• They work in an open kitchen, with a wood burning oven, using different techniques and seasonal ingredients.  All to create handmade fresh food and bring warmth and exciting flavours to the table.
• You can call or text them to their phone.
• For special events email them at: host@eatAbaita.com​​​​​​​​​.
• For general enquiries email them at: we@eatAbaita.com.
• Check their Instagram account for more details.

12213,Mendy’s Deli & Restaurant,"

Famous for their juicy mouth-watering hamburgers served with homemade fries.

column2: • Glatt Kosher delicatessen and restaurant serving the New York City area for over 25 years.
<li>Largest chain of Glatt Kosher restaurants in the country, known for perfecting the art of deli in this branch and in their other four locations:
• Mendy’s Crown Heights.
• Mendy’s Grand Central.
• Mendy’s Atrium.
• Mendy’s Rockefeller Center.
• Whether it's a business lunch, quick bite, or celebration, they are always ready to serve you.
• They offer takeaway, delivery and catering services. 15% OFF in your first online order.
• Try their juicy mouth watering hamburgers served with homemade fries. Make it a King David and beef it up with some freshly sliced hot corned beef.
• To organise an event with them, email at: mendysevents@gmail.com.
• Check their menu here.

13056,Kasbah Kosher Restaurant,"

Steaks, burgers, delicatessen. Great environment.

column2: • Glatt Kosher restaurant.
• Steakhouse and sushi in Manhattan NYC.
• Middle Eastern style combined with American dishes, offers both dine in and delivery services.
• Great environment, casual and family friendly. ""Dressy"" at nights.
• Located 1 mile west of Central Park.
• Heschcher.

10555,Jerusalem Cafe,"

More than just great New York style pizza!

column2: • This restaurant and pizzeria is more than just great New York style pizza, they have a varied menu where you can find delicious meals at affordable prices.
• Jerusalem Cafe is Kosher Chalav Yisrael and Pas Yisrael.
• Delivery to your office, home, or meeting space is available. Minimum spent amount: $10.

12149,Koshe Poke,"

One of the best places in the city to grab a poke bowl for lunch or dinner.

column2: • Since Summer 2016, Koshe Poke opened up a counter within Eden Wok Manhattan.
• A poke bowl, is a Hawaiian dish that combines raw fish, vegetables, sauces and toppings. There is an array of sushi as well which makes the perfect meal for those on the go.
• Poke (pronounced poh-keh), a raw-fish salad, is like the hamburger of Hawaii, ubiquitous at family gatherings, parties, tailgates, and supermarket delis across the islands.
• Orthodox Union certified.
• Delivery and takeaway services available.

column1:
12159,Ess A Bagel,"

Restaurant certified, but open on Shabbat.

column2: • Kosher Without Borders is designed to help you find Kosher food made to Orthodox standards anywhere on Earth.
• We also list non-Orthodox providers and closed establishments to clear up any doubts you might have, if you come across them while searching online.
• Ess-a-Bagel was established in 1976 by Florence and Gene Wilpon and Florence's brother Aaron Wenzelberg.
• Supervised by Tablet-K, but open on Shabbat.
• Menu available here.

13665,Kosher Bagel Delight,"

Cholov Yisroel. Dairy traditional bagel bakery, serving breakfast and lunch.

column2: • Chalav Yisrael, Kemach Yashan & Pas Yisrael. All the dairy products behind the counter are Chalav Yisrael and they only use Kemach Yashan.
• Fresh baked Kosher bagels and salads every day.

• They bake hot Kosher bagels on their premises in the Five Towns. You can design your own salad from a wide array of fresh vegetables ready for you to enjoy. You can add any variety of fresh vegetables and pay one price.
• Casual and friendly environment. Traditional bagel bakery.
• Located 8 miles east of JFK International Airport.
• Heschcher.

13678,Mike's Burgers,"

Restaurant offering amazing burgers. Takeaway services available.

column2: • Glatt restaurant.
• After a devastating fire, Mike's Burger has reopened.
• It has become a popular Kosher spot with a cozy seating area for burgers piled with toppings & other American-style meals.
• Casual and group friendly, good for couples or solo dining.
• Located 6 miles west of JFK international airport.
• Heschcher.

12248,Milk + Honey Kosher (Broadway),"

Great restaurant, famous for their bagels, wraps and pizzas.

column2: • Dairy restaurant. Cholov Yisroel, Pas Yisroel, and Kemach Yoshon.
• Well-known for their bagels, wraps, salads, and pizzas.
• Catering, delivery, and takeaway services available.
• OU certification.
• You can find them in 45th street too.

10609,Tiberias NYC,"

Chalav Yisrael - Kemach Yashan - Masghiach Temidi

column2: • Located in Midtown, Tiberias is a purveyor of fine Kosher dining and catering.
• Tiberias opened in 2011 and is the only kosher restaurant in New York with full service 24 hours a day, 6 days a week.
• Varied menu offering sushi, pasta, salad, dessert, coffee, and sandwiches.

13667,Ahuvas Grill Express,"

Quick bite grill in a casual modern environment.

column2: • Glatt restaurant.
• Ahuva’s Grill is a family owned and operated business offering authentic Yemenite Israeli cuisine.
• Every dish is prepared by Ahuva Tsadok, a Yemenite Israeli who is well qualified in cooking the finest Mediterranean food.

• Relying on her many years of cooking as well as her roots, Ahuva offers traditional dishes such as kebabs, falafel, shawarma, schnitzel, soups, and salads.  All dishes are prepared from scratch, using the finest Glatt Kosher meats and fresh, high-quality ingredients.
• Family friendly. Cozy restaurant.
• Located 4 miles west of JFK International Airport.
• Heschcher.

12067,Blossom,"

Certified vegan restaurant, but open on Shabbat.

column2: • Kosher Without Borders is designed to help you find Kosher food made to Orthodox standards anywhere on Earth.
• We also list non-Orthodox providers and closed establishments to clear up any doubts you might have, if you come across them while searching online.
• Vegan restaurant.
• Blossom  is certified Kosher by the International Kosher Council under the supervision of Orthodox Rabbi Zev Schwarcz.
• Restaurant open on Shabbat and with no mashgiach on premises.
• You can email them at chelsea@blossomnyc.com.

11953,Barnea Bistro,"

High-end and fine dining Glatt Kosher restaurant.

column2: • Glatt Kosher restaurant.
• From their site:

column1: Barnea Bistro fuses select seasonal ingredients and flavors with warm service and sensuous design. Chef Joshua Kessler, in collaboration with his passionate, inventive team, opened Barnea to invite diners inside a creative, immersive and elevated eating environment. It is a space that celebrates sense and enjoyment: evolving menus blended with crafted cocktails, curated beverages mixed with musical atmosphere, delicious sounds absorbed into decor—where the texture is everywhere and the kitchen is open, with everything to show.""

column2: • Great contemporary decoration, seating available outside, good for solo dining.
• Check their menu here.
• Located less than 2 miles away from the Empire State Building.
• Kashrus.

11975,Cafe 11 - Broadway,"

Great restaurant with friendly staff. Famous for their sushi.

column2: • Restaurant and sushi bar, well known for their suhi rolls and varied dishes.
• Takeaway, delivery, and catering services available.
• Cafe 11 is certified by the OU, with all product Pas & Cholov Yisroel.
• Check their menu here.
• Order online here.
• You can also visit them at their Midtown location.

column2: • Dairy.
• Schmoozer’s Café is open to the public in Winnipeg, serving breakfast, lunch, and supper.
• The menu offers a wide selection of traditional and modern items and the kitchen is under the supervision of OU.
• Schmoozer’s specialises in catering Kosher food for all occasions: Shiva meals, birthdays, business lunches and their own “Kosher-to-Go” menu for every day.
• Located at the Rady JCC in Winnipeg, Canada.

11393,Grandma Alla by Chabad,"

Kosher meals to takeaway.

column2: • Glatt meat and Pareve.
• Grandma Alla by Chabad offers Kosher takeaway and catering options like a healthy and traditional meal, from homemade gefilte fish to baked goods.
• Offers gluten-free  and nut-free items.
• Conveniently located at Chabad of Winnipeg.
• For information on their menu, click here.
<li>Their menu covers:
• School day meal plans.
• Friday sales.
• Shabbat meals.
• Takeaway lunches.
• Custom-made cakes.
• Passover meals.
• Holiday speciality items.
• Dessert tables.
• Daily bakery items.
• Catering for events.

11384,Desserts Plus Restaurant Cafe and Deli,"

NO LONGER KOSHER

Desserts Plus – which was operating under the supervision of Rabbi Yossi Benarroch, the spiritual leader of Adas Yeshurun Herzlia, Winnipeg’s main Orthodox synagogue, on behalf of the Orthodox Union – withdrew on Nov. 1. (Source)

12301,Dinitz Glatt Kosher,"

Cozy restaurant near to many synagogues.

column2: • Glatt restaurant.
• First and only Kosher restaurant in Prague fully approved and constantly supervised by the chief rabbinate of the Czech Republic.

• Dinitz has been setting the standards leading Prague Kosher world for several years, it's the most popular Kosher restaurant in Prague amongst local Jews & even non-Jewish guests not without reason.
• They offer an excellent value for money ratio, allowing all guests to enjoy Kosher food in Prague and they're also known for their special culinary experience.
• This little Jewish jewel serves also visitors who seek to keep kosher in Prague, this is the place to meet local community members whilst enjoying a Kosher vacation in Prague.
• Located just behind the Spanish synagogue and at a short walking distance to all synagogues in Prague.
• Offering meat and Parve dishes.
• Takeaway, delivery, and Kosher catering services available.
• Casual environment, small but cozy.
• They also offer Shabbat dinners: 4-course meal, wine for kiddush & a home-baked Challa pieces of bread for all guests & unlimited soft drinks. (approx: 35 U$D - 22GBP - 29Euro)
• Saturday lunch can also be prebooked in Dinitz. (approx: 30 U$D - 19GBP - 25Euro)
• Due to the sanctity of Shabbat, these meals need to be booked and paid in advance, as the demand for a limited number of seats in Dinitz Prague Kosher restaurant is very high.
• We recommend to reserve at least a week before arriving - if possible even earlier.
• Heschcher.

column2: • Dairy Cholov Yisroel / Pas Yisroel.
• At this place, you can enjoy waffles, pastries or omelets for breakfast.
• If you go for lunch or dinner try their French onion soup, lightly spiced croutons, all topped with mozzarella cheese.
• You can also order any of their salads (Caesar, Israeli and Greek, to name a few), as well as their Israeli dishes, such as falafel, malawah, and burekas.
• Casual and family-friendly environment.
• Located 11 miles northeast of downtown Philadelphia.
• Heschcher.

13698,"Grand & Essex Market - Bergenfield, NJ","

Kosher grocery store.

column2: • GrandAndEssex.com online supermarket invites you to shop for a wide variety of gourmet foods available at their Kosher store.

• Kosher grocery and gourmet food, fresh meat and fish, deli, bakery, fresh fruits and vegetables, Kosher dairy like yoghurt, cheese, ice cream, and more. The best quality Kosher food products and prepared Kosher meals.
• Currently delivering in Teaneck, Bergenfield, New Milford, Englewood, Tenafly, Fair Lawn, Fort Lee, Passaic, Clifton, Upper Manhattan, Bronx, Riverdale.
• Little Italy is a pizza spot within the supermarket where pizza is sold and is certified by Va'ad HaRabbanim - Rabbinical Council of Bergen County (RCBC).
• The store is located 13 miles northwest of Manhattan.
• Little Italy Heschcher.

13860,Giddy's Pizzeria,"

Pizzeria with takeaway and delivery services available.

column2: • Dairy.

• Offeringa varied menu, from french fries to pizza, soups to hero bread, mozzarella sticks to sauces and dressings, as well as herring, hummus, dips, and more. All made fresh right in their restaurant.
• With over 28 years of wide-ranging experience, owners Gideon Finkelstein and Lawrence Margolin bring us a fresh take on a pizzeria.
• Their food is always made fresh to order as the customer deserves.
• With hand-cut French fries and homemade sauces, you can enjoy the classic pizza experience with great flavour.
• For the more adventurous palette, Giddy’s makes pizzas with faux meats such as the “BBQ Chicken” Pizza, the “Philly Cheese Steak” Pizza, and faux seafood entrees such as “Shrimp Scampi” over pasta.

• Looking to be healthy whilst the rest of your party wants pizza? If you can resist the more indulgent options, Giddy’s has you covered with a full menu including fish entrees such as tilapia marsala, grilled salmon, and variety of fresh salads!
• Hearts are even denoted on the menu to guide you toward these healthy selections. Whilst you’re there, check out the 9 different types of herring and 10 different dips to try (all Pareve!).
• Casual environment, family and group friendly.
• Check their menu here.
• Located 1 mile away from I95 Exit 9. Head south on NJ-18 S.
• Heschcher.

13847,"Jerusalem Pizza - Highland Park, NJ","

Casual Cholov Yisroel Kosher spot. Pizza & sandwiches to sushi & falafel.

column2: • Dairy Cholov Yisroel.
• All products should be considered dairy. Pizza and all cooked dairy foods use Chalav Yisrael products.
• Vegetables and vegetable products are certified by Vaad's standards of inspection.
• They have a diverse menu ranging from pizza & sandwiches to sushi & falafel.
• Casual, family friendly, good for kids.
• Located in Highland Parks, 3 miles west of I95, exit 9.
• Heschcher.

13842,Deli King of Clark,"

Opens on Shabbat. Casual deli and restaurant.

column2: • Meat restaurant. Opens on Shabbat.
• This place is a full service and family-friendly Kosher delicatessen, restaurant, and caterer, that has been run by a family for over thirty-three years.
• Casual environment, good for groups or solo dining.
• Located in Clarkton Shopping Center, 6 miles west of I 95, Exit 12.
• Heschcher.
• Kosher Without Borders is designed to help you find Kosher food made to Orthodox standards anywhere on Earth.
• We also list non-Orthodox providers and closed establishments to clear up any doubts you might have, if you come across them while searching online.

11817,Sylvia's Gourmet Candy and Coffee,"

Cholov Yisroel sweet store.

column2: • Nice store selling certified Kosher products that will be shipped in original packaging if possible. J.S.O.R certifies all repackaged items and gift baskets. J.S.O.R is a strict Orthodox rabbinical council based on the Jersey Shore.

• All products from their store come to them in the original package under the OU, OK, Star K, Scroll K, CRC. Pretzels are Pas Yisrael and Yashan. Products will be marked dairy or parve and are not Cholov Yisroel unless otherwise specified.
• At this place you can enjoy a coffee whilst you browse their selection of sweets.
• Great decoration, excellent reviews.
• Check the sweets and chocolate offers.
• Located 30 miles west of I-95 exit 9.
• JSOR Hechsher.

20221,Qool,"

Unfortunately, this business closed due to the COVID-19 Pandemic.

column2: • This place is permanently closed.

column1:
12616,"Restaurant Jerusalem, Sofia","

 Taking care of all your Kosher needs in Bulgaria!

column2: • Meat Restaurant
• Dairy Bar
• Eat-in Shabbat Menu that must be pre-paid: 60.00 лв per person
• Certified by the local Chabad.
• First authentic Israeli restaurant in Sofia.
• Located near the entrance to the Sredica metro station in the TZUM shopping centre.
• The restaurant offers Israeli dishes and is divided into a meat restaurant and a dairy bar, as well as a store that concentrates all the Kosher ingredients in Bulgaria.
• Casual environment, family-friendly, good for solo dining.
• Located in downtown Sofia.

column1: ",,,,,,,,"Shabbat Meals,Restaurant",Meat,"Maria Luiza 2 str. Tzum shoping center. Ground floor, 1000, Bulgaria",Europe,Bulgaria,,,,,moderate,42.6983934,23.3229765,"Rabbi Yosef Solomon, Chabad of Bulgaria.",,+359 88 415 7377,https://www.facebook.com/Jerusalemmkosherfood/,,https://www.facebook.com/Jerusalemmkosherfood/,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,26/9/2018,27/1/2020,,,,

12637,New York's Finest Bagels,"

Food truck selling Kosher certified products.

column2: • This is a food truck and is not Kosher certified, but sells Kosher certified products imported from the USA.
• Local Chabad approves and recommends this place.
• Kosher meat is currently available, but they usually offer Glatt Kosher meats such as cold cuts (turkey, bologna, and others) as well as chicken.
• The meat served by the restaurant is Glatt Kosher (mostly Hod Golan or Empire Kosher) and is shipped in via the U.S.
• Because all meat is imported, there may be times when some items may not be available.
• Check their menu here.
• Their locations may vary.
• Seating available.

column1:
12650,East Coast Bakery,"

Traditional bagel bakery. Opens on Shabbat.

column2: • Pareve.
• East Coast Bakery's freshly baked bagels are ready for you every day so as to guarantee their freshness.
• They also make Challah bread, loaves and rolls.
• All of their bread is certified Kosher Parve by the Chabad of the Maritimes.
• Casual, no seating available.
• Located 1 mile south of downtown Halifax, NS, Canada.

12695,Indian Delight,"

Indian/Pakistani, vegan and vegetarian menu in a mall food court.

column2: • Dairy.
• In downtown DC, near Farragut West station, you will find this small place that offers Indian vegetarian food. From Masala Dosas to Palak Paneer, from Mango Lassis to Vindaloo.
• Casual, good for families with children, groups or solo-dining.
• Located in downtown Washington, DC.
• Teudah.
• Heschcher.

13255,Shouk - Mt. Vernon Triangle,"

Opens on Shabbat. Middle Eastern and vegan cuisine.

column2: • Pareve. Vegan. Opens on Shabbat.
• Shouk is an Israeli eatery with two locations in the capital. Shouk is the Hebrew word for market, referring to the open-air fresh markets common in Israel and the Middle East.
• They offer middle eastern-inspired vegan sandwiches, dips, salads & snacks in a stylish, counter serve. Check their menu here.
• Modern and contemporary decoration. Casual fast food environment.
• They are also located at Union Market.
• 1 mile east of downtown Washington.
• Teudah.
• Check more details about DC Kosher on the Ohev Sholom National Synagogue's website.
• Ohev Sholom National Synagogue's clergy.
• More information? This is a Washington Post article about it.
• Kosher Without Borders is designed to help you find kosher food made to Orthodox standards anywhere on earth.
• We also list non-Orthodox providers and closed establishments to clear up any doubts you might have, if you come across them while searching online.

column2: • Dairy. Parve.
• You can find them roaming around DC if you like Indian vegetarian food. From Palak Paneer to Masala Dosa to Pau Bhaji, they've got you covered!
• For information on their current or future locations, you must check their tweets on Twitter, or their posts on Facebook.
• Casual, perfect for a quick bite, no seating available.
• Teudah.

12783,Too Toast,"

Food cart serving Kosher meals around NYC.

column2: • Vegetarian.
• Too Toast is a food cart serving up meals in New York City.
• They sell vegetarian items including falafel pita or plates with hummus, tahini, BBQ sauce, ketchup, sriracha, and hot sauce toppings; burgers and French fries.
• No seating available.
• Location may vary, you need to follow them on Instagram for information on their schedule and locations.
• Heschcher.

13066,Nava's Kosher Kitchen,"

Casual and family friendly, an everyday restaurant.

column2: • Glatt Kosher restaurant.
• Nava’s Kosher Kitchen is a family owned and operated Kosher Israeli restaurant.
• Dishes are prepared fresh daily.
• All ingredients are bought daily at a local Kosher market.
• Nava’s is a full service Shabbat Kiddush to dessert, takeaway & caterer for all occasions.
• Their menu changes daily.
• Located in Davie, 24 miles north of downtown Miami.

column1: ",,,,https://media-cdn.tripadvisor.com/media/photo-p/11/ed/37/a2/the-best-kosher-restaurant.jpg https://scontent-mia3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.18169-9/11351233_374377366098038_5310920212265913288_n.jpg?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=cdbe9c&_nc_ohc=zRsUUszSB6oAX-Y4MZC&_nc_ht=scontent-mia3-2.xx&oh=8c283c358e4615b28fb52855e0c52d13&oe=61B4465B https://scontent-mia3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.18169-9/11351293_374377426098032_3954009501628279219_n.jpg?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=cdbe9c&_nc_ohc=7jfTU1seLMsAX_UUB8d&_nc_ht=scontent-mia3-2.xx&oh=fa5f82f5d410620d9006e1ca4fa35825&oe=61B63B52,,,,"Shabbat Meals,Restaurant",Meat,"5021 South State Road 7 #203, Davie, FL 33314, USA",North America,USA,,Florida,Davie,,cheap,26.0599346,-80.2082977,ORB,https://orbonline.org/category/restaurants/,+1 954-588-3701,https://navaskosherkitchen.com/,,https://www.facebook.com/Navas-Kosher-Kitchen-170008686534908/,,monday,custom,11:00,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""18:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""11:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""18:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""11:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""18:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""11:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""18:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""11:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""16:00"";}",closed,,,closed,,4/9/2018,9/8/2021,,,,

13364,Melekh à Pizza,"

Traditional pizzeria. Seating available outside and inside.

column2: • Dairy.
• Mehudar cheese Makabi on demand.
• Traditional pizzeria with seating available outside and inside.
• They offer takeaway and delivery services.
• Modern and contemporary decoration. Good for families with children.
• Located 3 miles Southeast of downtown Marseille.
• Heschcher.
• Dairy.
• Traditional pizzeria.
• Dine in, takeaway and delivery.
• Located 3 miles southeast of downtown Marseille.
• Heschcher.

13407,La Maronaise Café,"

Modern environment, French cuisine. Seating available outside or inside.

column2: • Dairy.
• French cuisine. La Maronaise café is renewed and offers you a menu created by their chef Jeremy Tavernier essentially based on fresh products and all desserts are homemade.
• Modern and contemporary. Good for groups and families. Can be good for solo dining.
• Located 6 miles north of downtown Marseille.

column1:
13344,Le Huitième Sud,"

American food. Seating available inside and outside.

column2: • Glatt restaurant.
• The 8th Sud has a new look! Discover or rediscover this place of conviviality on the walk Pompidou between the David and the ledge, in the 8th district.
• A completely redecorated space, a subtle blend of design and Baroque, a warm atmosphere perfect for a moment of relaxation. An address to remember!
• Mixed environment, casual for lunch and fancy at evenings. Good for couples and businessmen. Late night bar.
• Located 3 miles south of downtown Marseille.
• Heschcher.
• Shosh and Chookie’s Fresh-Mex is Houston’s first Kosher dairy food truck, offering a variety of breakfast tacos on homemade tortillas and other Tex-Mex favourites.
• They are open for breakfast and lunch on weekdays at locations in the heart of Houston’s Jewish community, and they are available for special events at your location.
• Hours and location are set weekly. Call, text, or follow them on Facebook to check their schedule or to book the truck.

column1: ",,,,,https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1583868161943-29a9ec42256e?ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1171&q=80,,checked,Restaurant,,"7701 W Bellfort Ave, Houston, TX 77071, USA",North America,USA,,Texas,Houston,,moderate,29.6556127,-95.5115216,Houston Kashruth Association,http://kosherhouston.org/kosher-in-houston/,(832) 409-4760,https://www.facebook.com/ShoshnChookie/,,,,monday,custom,08:00,14:00,custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""08:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""14:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""08:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""14:00"";}",custom,"a:1:{i:0;s:5:""08:00"";}","a:1:{i:0;s:5:""14:00"";}",closed,,,closed,,,closed,,31/10/2018,1/1/2021,,,,

column2: • Green Vegetarian offers dairy vegetarian comfort food including nachos, salads, enchiladas, veggie burgers, wraps, falafel, burritos, quesadillas, sandwiches, smoothies, cupcakes and daily specials.
• Their mission is to serve delicious and affordable vegetarian comfort food to their diverse community of customers.
• The team strive to provide a wide range of options for vegetarians, vegans and omnivores alike in order to promote healthier choices in a fast-food world.

13211,Cafe at the J / Laykie’s Gourmet,"

Enjoy delicious coffee, Kosher pastries, muffins, gourmet salads, and more.

column2: • Restaurant located in Evelyn Rubenstein Jewish Community Center of Houston.
• They offer a wide culinary variety of meat, dairy and pareve items and will customise each menu specific to your special celebration.
• Enjoy delicious coffee, Kosher pastries, muffins, gourmet salads, sandwiches, made-to-order panini and more.
• Friendly staff, quick service.
• Superb cuisine, highly trained staff, creative, trendy event ideas and personal service are what make Laykie’s Gourmet unique.
• Catering services available.
• Run by a fifth generation baker, 3 Brothers Bakery is the oldest Kosher bakery in Houston, serving both pareve and dairy.

• Including custom designed wedding, bar mitzvah and special occasion cakes. Eastern European and New York style pastries, dessert cakes, danish, coffee cakes and Eastern European breads (rye, pumpernickel, challah, bagels) provided daily.
• Ceremonial challahs (3, 6, and 10 pound plus custom shapes) available by special order. Commercial accounts welcome, as well.
• The Braeswood location is the only certified Kosher branch of 3 Brothers.

column1:
13290,New York Bagel,"

Bagels, muffins, and more. Catering services available.

column2: • New York Bagel offers fresh-baked pareve pas yisroel bagels, challah, dairy muffins and cookies.
• Produce different dairy cream cheeses and assorted fish platters for events.
• All items in the refrigerators are Kosher.
• Catering services available.
• The restaurant next door is NOT under supervision.

column1:
13220,Taste of Tel Aviv - My Pita,"

Fresh pita and salads. Delicious meals.

column2: • My Pita offers fresh pita and other baked goods that are all pareve and Pas Yisrael.
• The restaurant menu includes shwarma, mixed Israeli grill, shishkabob and falafel, chicken, fish and more.
• My Pita offers numerous salads including hummus, israeli salad, tabuli, beet salad, cole slaw, pickled salads, matbucha, tahini and aubergine (eggplant).

column1:
13886,Genesis Steakhouse & Wine Bar,"

Steaks & seafood in a stylish, lounge-lit dining room, with a life-sized tree & a wine bar.

column2: • Glatt restaurant.
• Genesis offers great options for any occasion.
• Offering 101 seats in the main dining room, a 40 person secluded wine room or an 80-seat multi-media Grand Banquet room.
• They require business casual attire. Reservations are recommended, but not compulsory.
• Dressy environment. Good for couples and businessmen.
• Located 11 miles southwest of downtown Houston.
• Check their menu here.
• Heschcher.

column1: ",,,,https://scontent-mia3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/148847204_2826008137641536_1191674559359813959_n.jpg?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=8bfeb9&_nc_ohc=UQvwyk7IkOgAX9o2k2C&_nc_ht=scontent-mia3-1.xx&oh=147e7b6230d1de1e3aa31b7310f81601&oe=61B3AE46 https://scontent-mia3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/46128306_2182651445310545_352477971593822208_n.jpg?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=cdbe9c&_nc_ohc=v6aqzAjFko0AX-tDLhR&_nc_ht=scontent-mia3-2.xx&oh=ca3a9371ca7f3e1ae32e8d0d70074c99&oe=61B5E302 https://scontent-mia3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/239497399_2959704387605243_4472982136083940902_n.jpg?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-5&_nc_sid=730e14&_nc_ohc=YzU_u1SJp5UAX_MgNkq&_nc_oc=AQmqbR0dmGSUv4YoTdAt7FBOKw_OkeGbt7VeehRLvLTkhIVma_VwIWsTDCfuEpQ04b4&_nc_ht=scontent-mia3-1.xx&oh=ff954a24166b85a3840f55dbd2ee369e&oe=61949248,,,,Restaurant,Meat,"80 Braeswood Square, N Braeswood Blvd, Houston, TX 77096",North America,USA,,Texas,Houston,,moderate,29.6787848,-95.4783348,Houston Kashruth Association,http://kosherhouston.org/,(713) 665-2222,https://www.genesissteakhouse.com/,,https://www.facebook.com/GenesisSteakhouse/,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,10/10/2018,1/1/2021,,,,

13327,Dino’s Mediterranean Cuisine,"

Enjoy the taste of Israel! You can either dine in or order to takeaway.

column2: • Dino’s is a family owned and operated restaurant who’s focus is Middle Eastern and Israeli cuisine.
• Their chef and owner Dino has been in the kitchen since the age of 7 and is truly passionate about his job.
• In addition to the regular daily menu, Dino prepares a daily home cooked meal for that day's special.
• These specials include cous cous, stuffed peppers and cabbage, koubeh, and the list goes on.
• Their menu is designed in a way that everyone in the family can find something to eat.
• In Dino's you can also find vegetarian and healthy items.
• Come and enjoy the taste of Israel! You can either dine in or order to takeaway.
• They also do catering for any occasion and offer all different types of food from Moroccan to Asian!

column2: • Saba’s provides a multitude of items, ranging from sushi to pizza, fresh fish to Israeli entrees.
• With a variety of pizzas, pastas and paninis you could never go wrong with Saba’s.
• Known as the oldest Kosher restaurant in Houston, they are committed to provide the highest quality and best varieties of Kosher dairy and pareve foods to the Jewish community.
• Fresh-baked pas yisrael challah on Fridays and erev Yom Tov are available with pre-order.
• Catering services available.
• Check their Facebook page for further details.
