column1:
13237,Hotel da Musica - Porto,"

Deluxe hotel with Kosher restaurant services available.

column2: • The avant-garde Hotel da Música is much more than a hotel design: combining modernity and comfort, in a symphony with notes of culture, gastronomy and tradition.
• The lines projected in 1949 - by the line of, the architects Fortunado Leal, Cunha Leão and Morais Soares - welcomed a lively market, in a picturesque mixture of flavours and aromas.
• The hotel has electric car chargers and the Tesla vehicles that are located in the garage, are available for free use upon availability and prior reservation at the front desk.

• The Kosher Corner is part of Hotel da Música and is located inside Mercado Bom Sucesso. It is the very first store with Kosher products opening in the country, both for guests and the general public.
• Created in partnership with the Jewish Community of Porto and aims to make Kosher products known to the general population. Porto Kosher Store follows the Jewish law regarding opening times.

• Matzo bread, dolma (rolls with vegetables), or tahine (pasta with sesame seeds), sandwiches, wines, juices, cakes, and water are some of the products that the store has to offer. Kosher food is not new at Hotel da Música since meals are served à la carte in the Kosher Corner (upon reservation).
• The Hotel da Música is certified in Kosher food and prepared for the specific service.

• The appropriate training was given to the Hotel da Música employees and they are able to deal with the Jews and their specific customers. There is a central kitchen where meals come with a rabbinical seal, for units across the country.
• The kitchen had an intervention required to become Kosher, proper according to Jewish religious law.

<li>The operation of the kitchen, the connection of equipment and processes for selection and preparation of the food are checked and supervised by a mashgiach, a Jewish religious supervisor dedicated to the obligations on a day-to-day.

column1: The products and ingredients used for the preparation of the dishes are able to meet the highest standards required of Jewish clients, because by its nature or hold the highest rabbinical certifications: Chalav Israel Glatt Kosher, Afiat Israel, etc.

column2: • Hotel da Música provides to the clients a Jewish menu consisting of the best Portuguese cuisine and vegetarian meals.
• The Jewish cuisine of Hotel da Música can be experienced by tourists from all nations and by the general population.
• The entire project is coordinated by Rabbi Daniel Litvak, whose supervision is recognised by the Grand Rabbinate of Israel and large bodies of kashrut worldwide.
• The Hotel is Located in downtown Porto, next to Mouzhino de Alburquerque Plaza.

13464,Pizza Trouville,"

Read carefully. Not a Kosher restaurant BUT Kosher pizza (Chalav Stam) is available 3 times a week.

column2: • This is not a Kosher pizzeria but on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday they make Kosher pizza stam under supervision only in this branch.
• Kosher menu available during those days from 19:30 a 23:30 hs.
• Kosher Without Borders is designed to help you find kosher food made to Orthodox standards anywhere on earth.

column2: • This synagogue is part of Instituto Yavne, a Jewish school.

13472,613 House,"

This use to be a  restaurant offering Glatt Kosher meals in Uruguay but now is only for Catering - Take away.

column2: • 613 House was part of Algranati House, a company focused on Kosher products in Montevideo.
• You can contact them by email: infouy@algranatigroup.com.
• Check their Facebook page for further details.
• Use to be known as the only Glatt meat Kosher restaurant in Uruguay.
• Only for Catering.

column1:
13499,Armon Suites Hotel,"

Jewish owners. Hotel with Kosher restaurant.

column2: • Modern 4-star hotel, owned by Jewish family.
• Armon Suites is the only hotel in South America offering Kosher food service.
•  27 minute-walk from Chabad Uruguay.
• The location is wonderful - just five blocks to the mall, to the beach, and more.

13425,Zak the Baker,"

House-baked goods & light fare. Contemporary and modern.

column2: <li>Parve, Pas Yisroel granola all breads EXCEPT brioche. Dairy Chalav Stam, Pas Yisroel all pastries

column1: pie, dough, brioche. All meals are Bishul Yisroel.

column2: • Two mashgiach’s on staff 6 days/week.
• This bakery is a Kosher restaurant in the Wynwood neighbourhood of Miami, Florida.  Outstanding exterior decoration, modern and contemporary environment. Good for family, groups or solo dining.
• Located 4 miles north of Downtown Miami.
• Heschcher.

13806,Awafi Restaurant,"

Restaurant located in Chabad. Varied menu.

column2: • Va’ad Le’inyane Kashruth of Singapore and is Glatt Kosher.
• Restaurant located in Chabad Singapore.
• They offer a variety of foods and flavours ranging from Indian and Middle Eastern, to Chinese, and Western cuisines.
• Settle in for a gourmet meal in a warm, home style setting, conduct a business meeting over a light lunch, or take your fresh meal to go and enjoy it as you please.
• Open daily except for Saturdays and Jewish Holidays.
• To make a reservation click here.
• For more information email them at awafi@jwb.org.sg or call them to their mobile: 9088 0230.

14476,La Fabrique à Miam,"

Great lunch and dinner menu.

column2: • La Fabrique à Miam is characterised by a variety of gourmet and tasty dishes guaranteed without meat.
• Pizzas are available in many versions; and for the fish lovers: salmon pavé with spice honey or tuna steak with devil sauce.
• They also offer salad and sandwiches on the go!
• You can book a table any time.
• Suitable for families with children.
• Takeaway and delivery services are available.
• Ask about their catering service by email lafabriqueamiam@gmail.com.
• Here you can check all the menu.

column1:
14471,Aux Mille Saveurs,"

10 years of experience in the pastry and catering industry in Strasbourg.

column2: • At Aux Mille Saveurs you have a lot to choose from, in their varied menu, from chocolate bread, croissant, apple pies to mini desserts.
• You can also taste the delicious and practical lunch, Aux Mille Saveurs has an offer of sandwiches, toasted bagels, pizzas, salads, fricassee and tuna.
• They offer Shabbat meals to takeaway.
• For Shabbat, you can choose between different kemias (fried aubergines, harissa potatoes, coleslaw, mechouia and beans) and mini salt trays (mini pizzas, mini bagels and mini shuttles).

• You can order trays for your activities. Aux Mille Saveurs offers sweet trays (petits mixed fours, macaroni, cake) and a wide variety of savory dishes (mini pizzas, mini-shuttles, cabbages, club, mini bagels, mini hamburgers, mini wraps, canapés and Sushi).
• You can see the full menu here.

17408,Elli's Kosher Kitchen,"

Food and drinks in Dubai.

column2: • Dubai is a wonderful travel destination with good weather, excellent hotels, great hospitality and service. There are many exciting activities for tourists all year round.
• Although there are no kosher restaurants in Dubai, kosher food is now available through Elli's Kosher Kitchen (www.elliskosherkitchen.com)

• Elli's Kosher Kitchen was established in February 2019, after the formal launch of 2019 as the United Arab Emirates's Year of Tolerance in which the Jews of Dubai came to receive formal recognition.
• It is the first and only establishment in the UAE providing kosher food.

• It is a completely home-grown UAE establishment run by Elli, a South African woman and mother of 3 who has been living in Dubai for 6 years with her family. Having learned how to navigate the kosher environment in Dubai, and source kosher certified products, Elli has opened her kitchen to travellers to bring them kosher food from her home. In this way, Elli is extending the UAE's culture of warmth and hospitality to kosher travellers.

• As a private initiative, operating out of her domestic kitchen, Elli offers private kashrut with an impressive set of guests who have eaten in her kitchen (including Rabbi Yehuda Sarna - Chief Rabbi of the UAE and Chaplain of NYU in New York and Abu Dhabi; Rabbi Dovi Goldstein (CEO of Kashrut, Union of Orthodox Synagogues, South Africa); Rabbi Marc Schneier (Hamptons Synagogue), Rabbi Michael Shudrich (Chief Rabbi of Poland); Rabbi Mirkin, (Senior Inspector for Kashrut, Union of Orthodox Synagogues, South Africa) among others.

• A mashgiach trained by the Johannesburg Orthodox Beth Din (South Africa) works with Elli in ensuring all halachic standards are guaranteed in her food production and Elli is currently working on establishing a permanent base for her kitchen in a commercial space, which will allow her to gain hashgachah through the Johannesburg Orthodox Beth Din. Watch this space!
• Elli offers milchik and parev meals only as kosher meat is not yet available in Dubai.
• Milchik dishes are chalav stam.
• Food is ordered via the website and Elli delivers to your hotel making it easier for you.
• The baklava and Arabic sweets that Elli offers are delicious! These sweets are produced in the UAE and come with a hechsher from Star-K.
• Dubai is a safe destination to visit and is permissive of all forms of tzniut dress (including Hasidic dress)
• Israeli stamps in passports are not known to have been a problem.
• The UAE is a tolerant society that welcomes diversity and is the first country in the world to offer a Ministry of Happiness
• Hate speech and discrimination is not permitted in the UAE. Definitely a place to explore!
• To order food, contact Elli: info@elliskosherkitchen.com
• The UAE’s first kosher restaurant!
• Will specialise in kosher cuisine that complies with Jewish dietary laws (kashrut)
• Will be operated under the rabbinical supervision of Rabbi Levi Y Duchman
• Resident guests of the hotel will also be offered the option of kosher in-room dining services
• Heading the hotel’s culinary portfolio is executive chef Fabien Fayolle.
• Middle Eastern specialties such as hummus with tahini, baba ganoush, fattoush salad and lentil soup are also part of the menu.
• Armani/Kaf is open from Sundays to Thursday from 6.30pm-11.30pm. It will be closed for dine-in guests on Fridays but will offer a special take-away menu for Shabbat, the Jewish Sabbath.

17447,Sultan Kosher Palace Restaurant,"

UNBELIEVABLE Russian/Georgian restaurant in Sunny Isles Beach.

column2: • A KWB Staff member visited there and was amazed!
• Fairly priced.
• We are tired that Kosher food means pita and falafel!
• If you want to experience new dishes, this is the place for you.
• There are dozens of dishes on the menu that you probably haven't tried before.
• The staff truly cares and puts a lot of love into making their exotic dishes.
• We strongly recommend it.

22042,Cucina Dolce,"Cucina Dolce is a well-established wood-fired pizza house in Melbourne. We serve both traditional and gourmet pizzas with natural ingredients enough to make your mouths water. Aside from this dish, we also offer delectable entrees and pastries. All made wholeheartedly!

Cucina Dolce takes pride in its culinary experience and excellent customer service. With our fast-growing success in the food industry, we are expected to be the biggest among the many pizza restaurants in Melbourne. So, what are you procrastinating for? Indulge yourselves with the elite food hub now!

Consider yourself lucky in finding us! Our food and services will truly satisfy your craving. Contact us now at (+61) 03 9772 9091. 25411,Ariela’s Pizza & Kosher Kitchen,"

Vegetarian Restaurant and Pizzeria

column2: • Ariela's Pizza & Kosher Kitchen is your new favorite pizzeria located in Las Vegas, with a 100% vegetarian cholov yisroel kosher menu.
• The restaurant specializes in providing delicious and fully kosher meals to customers on a variety of restricted and specialty diets.
• They offer you vegetarian and vegan dishes and another dedicated to the kosher cuisine of South America.
